story:
La travesía comenzó hace ocho meses en las calles de Bogotá, en Chapinero y en La Candelaria y ahora quiere salir a recorrer Colombia. Ir en búsqueda de las historias y relatos detrás de los mejores granos de café del mundo: un escritor, una fotógrafa y un experto en café, recorriendo escondidos cafetales, escuchando y registrando esas pequeñas historias de los caficultores que le dan vida a uno de los símbolos del país y creando un libro de crónicas cafeteras. 
 

¡Súbete al bus!

 

RELATOS CAFETEROS – Una Travesía por Colombia

En octubre del 2016 fundamos Travesía con el fin de diversificar el conocimiento del mundo de los cafés especiales que se desarrolla en Bogotá. Pero el viaje, que llevaba por los mejores cafés del país, lo hacía sin salir de un par de barrios de la capital. Supimos que no era suficiente, necesitábamos descubrir y mostrar la historia escondida por cada uno de estos magníficos cafés. La historia detrás del grano, desde que es fruta y está en la mata, en la finca, más aún, la historia del campesino que es capaz de darle vida a este brebaje que tanto nos apasiona y que nos hace soñar.

Así nació este proyecto que hoy queremos financiar: hacer un libro de relatos, de historias y de crónicas para poder mostrar la esencia de lo que realmente esconde el mundo del café en Colombia, su lado más humano.

¿Cuántas historias hay detrás de cada grano de café en un país en donde hay más de quinientas sesenta mil familias cafeteras?

Nos propusimos entonces una travesía de seis meses, diez departamentos, innumerables buses, trochas, fincas, familias, culturas e historias. Ir, mochila al hombro, tan lejos como podamos, descubriendo las riquezas escondidas en cada finca, en cada rincón de estos cafetales, escuchando cada cuento, cada anécdota, cada historia. Y que de allí surja un libro.  

Esa es la razón de ser de este Crowdfunding.

 

¿QUÉ VAMOS A CREAR?

De la travesía surgirán dos productos:

El primero, un diario de viaje que podrá ser visitado, en tiempo real, en nuestro blog y redes sociales. Será el detrás de cámaras de la travesía: historias, fotos, videos o lo que nos deje la ruta. Todos podrán seguirnos y acompañarnos en nuestro camino: el trayecto lo iremos revelando a medida que avancemos por las rutas colombianas. Todo estará aquí: BLOG

El segundo producto será el libro. ¡Nuestro gran objetivo! Un libro de crónicas cafeteras que publicaremos al finalizar la travesía -tranquilo Carlos, te vamos a dar tiempo para que lo escribas- y que recogerá todas aquellas historias que nos crucemos por el camino y que cumplan con el propósito que nos planteamos.

EL EQUIPO QUE LE DARÁ VIDA AL PROYECTO*

Carlos Ospina: cronista, viajero apasionado, amante del café -mucho, tal vez- y bogotano de 26 años. Profesional del Externado con una maestría en Bélgica. Curioso por las historias que los otros tienen para contar y que nadie se ha detenido aún a escuchar. Cofundador de Travesía. Nuestro escritor le está apuntando -después de varios blogs, artículos, cuentos...- a su primer libro. Instagram: @carlos_ospina9 

Ana María Gómez: internacionalista de profesión, fotógrafa de corazón. A esta bogotana le apasiona viajar, la diversidad cultural, el arte, la gastronomía y la posibilidad de transmitir, a través de la fotografía, las historias de cada rincón de nuestro país y del mundo. Instagram:  @anagomsphotography

Alejandro Ospina: colombiano y economista apasionado -todavía más- por el café. Su historia de vida dio un giro tremendo cuando probó el café especial por primera vez y ahora se dedica a llevarle la mejor experiencia posible en cafés colombianos a quién quiera disfrutar de esta deliciosa bebida -y a quién no, lo convence- por las calles de Bogotá. Trabaja con caficultores, tostadores y baristas, y es el corazón y alma detrás de Travesía. Instagram: @alejo2300 @travesia_coffee 

*hay que decir también que este trabajo no sería posible sin muchas manos que se mueven tras bambalinas, haciéndolo con gusto y sin esperar nada a cambio. Ya llegará el momento y lugar justo para agradecerles. Sin ellos este proyecto no sería posible.

¡NUESTRO OBJETIVO!

Sencillamente, darle a los pequeños y medianos caficultores el lugar que merecen dentro de la historia colombiana; y al grano de café, el lugar que merece dentro de nuestra sociedad. Somos un país cafetero, dueño de los mejores cafés del mundo, que poco conoce de café. La gran mayoría de nuestros mejores granos son exportados y consumidos en el exterior. Cambiemos esto: descubramos el verdadero valor detrás de uno de los productos que más nos representa, apreciemos el café que tenemos y a quienes, muchas veces con grandes dificultades, lo producen.

¿CÓMO VAMOS A UTILIZAR LAS DONACIONES?

Los 3.000 dólares serán destinados a la creación de los dos productos:

Primero, financiar la travesía, el viaje por diez departamentos del país. Literalmente de sur a norte. 

Segundo, la redacción, edición y publicación del libro.

Todo el dinero recaudado será destinado al proyecto.

*** 

Este es nuestro proyecto, nuestro sueño y queremos agradecer profundamente a todos quienes nos quieran apoyar. Desde compartir este Crowdfunding en su Facebook, hasta hacernos una donación, todo cuenta y mucho.

Por ahora les dejamos una primera crónica, cuya primera parte ya habíamos dado a conocer y que hemos querido publicar completa aquí, como agradecimiento por todo su apoyo y para que se antojen y se enamoren de esta Travesía, tanto como nosotros. 

En busca del Jigual por Carlos Ospina

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

I had moved to Iowa a couple years ago to be closer to my wife's family, and was overjoyed by the number of writers and soon to be writers living and thriving in Iowa City. I was fascinated and sought to learn more about this literary oasis of the Midwest. In the winter of 2016, I pitched a magazine article concept to Writer's Digest about Iowa City being the UNESCO's City of Literature. The article is in the July/August 2017 edition of the magazine and you can find it in any bookstore or newsstand that carries the magazine. 

While I was creating the article I was finishing my book Cucamonga Valley Wine- The Lost Empire of American Wine Making with History Press . I pitched them the idea of creating a book that expanded on the history of Iowa City from a literature and writing point of view. 

Iowa city has produced some of the most renowned writers and playwrights in the world such as Kurt Vonnegut, Rita Dove, Marilynne Robinson, Jane Smiley, Ayana Maathis, Tennessee Williams, John Irving, and more. Iowa City has also produced over 30 Pulitzer Prize winners dating back to Frank Luther Mott in 1939 for his A History of American Magazines. 

In April of 2017, I signed on with History Press to begin the process of writing the book, and it has been a much larger undertaking than I had anticipated, but a challenge that I wholeheartedly welcome.  

As deadlines loom, I find myself in a bit of a fix. I need between 65 and 70 pictures to go along with my narrative, and the scanned items with permissions are due in mid July. I have found most of my pictures that will fit perfectly with the book from various archives, but to publish and use these photos is not free. In fact I must pay $50.00 a picture. ($3250-$3500). 

Like many publishers, History Press does not cover these expenses- and so I must raise them myself. Without the funds I am afraid I may not be able to continue with the book. 

This book is extremely important as next year, Iowa City will be the host of the other 20 countries who make up the other UNESCO City's of Literature around the world and they do not have a definitive book to give and sell at this momentous event. 

I have also conducted interviews with many of the important figures who made up the literary scene and made Iowa City what it is today including Hualin Nieh Engle- International,  multi- award winning author, and wife to Paul Engle, who was the pioneer of the Iowa Writer's Workshop. These people are getting up in age and I would hate to see their fantastic stories lost. 

I am an author of 13 books, a journalist who has written for the New York Times, Reuters, Today Show, and Bloomberg News. I have written for a number of magazines such as INC, Winemaker, and Writers Digest. 

Success as a writer does not mean riches. I am an artist, which means, to those who understand, I am not flush in money.  So this is a labor of love and passion at this point. I would not ask for assistance unless it was needed, but as you look at the perks you will see that you will get something for your generous support. 

Where do the funds go? 

The good news is that the funds will go directly to the Iowa City Library, the University of Iowa Special Collections, and the Iowa Historical Society- all of which are underfunded and  are non-profits. These funds are not being used in any other way other than that. Not only are you helping make this book a reality, you are directly supporting the arts. 

In return, I am offering perks such as sign copies of the book, acknowledgements in the book and as the campaign progresses even greater perks. 

If the goal is not reached, I will donate the funds to the institutions I mentioned above. 

If you cannot make a contribution at this time, please share this campaign with your fellow Hawkeyes and lovers of literature and history.

The article is in the July/August 2017 edition of the magazine and you can find it in any bookstore or newsstand that carries the magazine. 
While I was creating the article I was finishing my book Cucamonga Valley Wine- The Lost Empire of American Wine Making with History Press . I pitched them the idea of creating a book that expanded on the history of Iowa City from a literature and writing point of view. 
Iowa city has produced some of the most renowned writers and playwrights in the world such as Kurt Vonnegut, Rita Dove, Marilynne Robinson, Jane Smiley, Ayana Maathis, Tennessee Williams, John Irving, and more. Iowa City has also produced over 30 Pulitzer Prize winners dating back to Frank Luther Mott in 1939 for his A History of American Magazines. 
In April of 2017, I signed on with History Press to begin the process of writing the book, and it has been a much larger undertaking than I had anticipated, but a challenge that I wholeheartedly welcome.  
As deadlines loom, I find myself in a bit of a fix. I need between 65 and 70 pictures to go along with my narrative, and the scanned items with permissions are due in mid July. I have found most of my pictures that will fit perfectly with the book from various archives, but to publish and use these photos is not free. In fact I must pay $50.00 a picture. ($3250-$3500). 
Like many publishers, History Press does not cover these expenses- and so I must raise them myself. Without the funds I am afraid I may not be able to continue with the book. 
This book is extremely important as next year, Iowa City will be the host of the other 20 countries who make up the other UNESCO City's of Literature around the world and they do not have a definitive book to give and sell at this momentous event. 
I have also conducted interviews with many of the important figures who made up the literary scene and made Iowa City what it is today including Hualin Nieh Engle- International,  multi- award winning author, and wife to Paul Engle, who was the pioneer of the Iowa Writer's Workshop. These people are getting up in age and I would hate to see their fantastic stories lost. 
I am an author of 13 books, a journalist who has written for the New York Times, Reuters, Today Show, and Bloomberg News. I have written for a number of magazines such as INC, Winemaker, and Writers Digest. 
Success as a writer does not mean riches. I am an artist, which means, to those who understand, I am not flush in money.  So this is a labor of love and passion at this point. I would not ask for assistance unless it was needed, but as you look at the perks you will see that you will get something for your generous support. 
Where do the funds go? 
The good news is that the funds will go directly to the Iowa City Library, the University of Iowa Special Collections, and the Iowa Historical Society- all of which are underfunded and  are non-profits. These funds are not being used in any other way other than that. Not only are you helping make this book a reality, you are directly supporting the arts. 
In return, I am offering perks such as sign copies of the book, acknowledgements in the book and as the campaign progresses even greater perks. 
If the goal is not reached, I will donate the funds to the institutions I mentioned above. 
If you cannot make a contribution at this time, please share this campaign with your fellow Hawkeyes and lovers of literature and history.

story:
In Africa, just like in many other underdeveloped parts of the world, women are seen and treated as inferior to men in many ways. They are not allowed to do or say as they please because from a very young age they are raised with the mentality that they should respect and oblige to what the men in their life tell them to even if he is younger, with no questions asked.

Born and raised in England, I’ve been coming to Somalia from a very young age, but it wasn’t until September 2015 when I decided to live here permanently. It was my move to Somalia that has opened my eyes to many things, including how bad gender inequality really is.

The idea of starting a magazine has been playing on my mind for about 2 years now but I wasn’t 100% sure what I wanted it to be about. I’ve been looking for ideas ever since. Opening my online cosmetics store, getting married and becoming a mother has been my biggest inspirations on what I wanted my magazine to be based on.

That was the beginning of BE Magazine (BEM).

I want BE Magazine to inspire and motivate women. To let them know that we are not inferior to men, nor equal but we have our own worth. I want to be able to make as many women as possible feel confident and proud of their skin and body, to love themselves for who they are and also support one another. I want them to know they have a voice and that they are worthy.

I know the reason behind it sounds very cliché but there are a lot of women supporting women activities across developed countries; however, no one realises how much underdeveloped countries need this too.

Don’t get me wrong, BEM won’t be a magazine that fights for women rights or a feminists act. It is solely for the purpose of giving women something that they can call their own. Something entertaining, fun to read and is meaningful at the same time.

I will publish my magazine once every three months to start with; the first edition being published on January 20th. After that, it’ll be once a month.

The designing of BE Magazine will be done by my brother for now so thankfully I won’t encounter any designing cost. However, the funds I’m raising will go towards the publishing, distribution and equipment.

Thank you in advance.

P.s I know that not everyone will be able to contribute towards reaching my target, but please do feel free to share it with your friends, family, colleagues and everyone else you may know.

Every contribution will be of great help, big or small.

story:
Amazing Stories - the Special Edition

We're Amazing Stories and we've been bringing you new science fiction, digitally since 2012 and also print and audio since 2018. We're here to raise some money to go to the next level - a special all-color issue for the first issue of our second year with greatly improved print quality!

What Do You Get?

If you support our special edition campaign you will get discounts on subscriptions, but you can also get collectible cards, our famous comicbook, and lapel pins as well as the best in science fiction today. Science fiction that's fun and entertaining!

How about more details?

As we approach the first anniversary of the return of Amazing Stories as a print magazine, we are thrilled by what we have already accomplished.  We've published six digital editions, three print editions, one comic book, and released an audiobook.

So what's coming in this special edition? Glad you asked.

The award-winning Vincent Di Fate has agreed to be our cover artist!


Artist: Vincent Di Fate / www.vincentdifate.com

    Fiction By:

    Shirley Meier, Lawrence Watt-Evans, Paul Levinson, Jack McDevitt, R.S. Belcher, Dave Creek, Adam-Troy Castro, Sally McBride, Paul Di Filippo , Sean Chappell, Jack Clemons and Allen Steele

    Interior Artists:

    Melissa Des Rosiers, Ron Miller, Amanda Makepeace, Jon Eno, Tom Miller, Matt Taggart, M.D. Jackson, Chukwudi Nwaefulu, Oliva Beelby, and Vincent Di Fate.

    What You Get - in Detail!

    • You get, at least, to start our second year with an ALL COLOR Amazing Stories magazine for at least the first issue. Remember, each issue includes:
      • Original cover art.
      • Approximately 55,000 words of new, original, fiction, articles, interviews, and poetry!
      • Stories and articles from the best writers working today.
      • Original art for every story.
      • Additional original art to illustrate a selected story (typically the cover story).
    • When we hit our first stretch goal we'll use higher quality printing for the entire second year - for the SAME subscription rates!
    • Authors and artists will love our third stretch goal, which will allow us to pay them more.
    • Our fourth stretch goal will enable ALL ISSUES in our second year to be ALL COLOR.
    • We will be attending conventions and participating even more with the community this year. This is not a huge expense comparatively, but we need to cover this expansion as well because it's important to us to keep giving back to the community we love.
    • If you're an advertiser - this is a chance to get up to a full year of advertising at hugely discounted rates letting you reach thousands of proven, buying, fans for pennies each!

    The Impact of Amazing

    Historically Amazing was not only the first science fiction magazine, its original editor, Hugo Gernsback basically invented the field. We think we've also made a great start in our first year. We're bringing fun and exciting science fiction back to the fore of the genre in our magazine. We're showcasing new voices and new artists in greater numbers and greater diversity.

    • With just over $30,000 raised in our first crowdfunding we not only funded the first issue - but through careful costs management, we published for an entire year!
    • We also not only published a digital and print edition - but have started an audiobook for each issue's fiction as well.
    • We're successfully reaching out to the community to sell and run advertisements for authors, conventions and more - at prices that are easily affordable!

    Funding Goals

    • $35,000 - At this level, we can do the Special Edition in all-color with premium printing.
    • $50,000 - When we hit this we can pay for premium printing for EVERY print subscriber for EVERY issue in year two at no additional cost!
    • $75,000 - if we hit this we will raise our pay rates for authors and artists. This will make us one of the few magazines paying above SFWA rates to writers!  
    • $100,000 - We will go all-color for the entire year at this level.

    Risks & Challenges

    We had to face a major hurdle in our first year. We raised enough to cover one issue. But by careful management of our funds, finding more advertisers, and finding the best and most affordable printers we kept going throughout the entire first year.

    So what are the risks this time?

    • Same as before. Getting enough subscribers, more advertisers, and controlling our costs. We've done it before, we can do it again.
    • We've built the company out, we have long-term commitments from our suppliers, we've got more and more of the community behind us, and, gosh darn it, people like us!
    • Also importantly, we now have established relationships with some of the best writers and artists working today and they want us to succeed as well. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
    • Post the news on your social media accounts. 
    • Post the information on your blog.
    • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

    And that's all there is to it. C'mon, Scientifictioneers - let's make this happen!

    The Amazing Three - Steve Davidson, Kermit Woodall, and Ira Nayman

story:
BACKGROUND

My name is Tonya Tko and I'm a Self-Love Specialist. I help people get into meaningful satisfying relationships, and live the life of their dreams by first loving themselves. I use the power of hypnotherapy and Neurolinguistic Programming to help people experience immediate, lasting change.

Self-love is my passion because all love begins with self-love. I had a Near Death Experience (NDE) in 2007, and I realized there was a lot more to life than I previously thought. Since then I've become a Social Media Influencer (Youtube / Facebook / LinkedIn with more than 300K followers & 90 Million video views) tapping people on the shoulder to wake them up to loving themselves and each other.

My goal is to lift the Universal Vibration of the world

THIS BOOK WILL:

This book will help you re-write your subconscious programming and shift you into loving yourself deeply and fully.

  • SHIFT: Teach you the simple mind-shifts I used which (even on my darkest day) kept me connected to self-love and my worth as a human being.
  • CONFIDENCE: Give you the confidence to follow your dreams.
  • ABUNDANCE: Make your life feel richer, fuller and happier.
  • LOVE: Attract more love into your life.
  • MEANING: Answer questions about why you're here and the meaning of your life
  • TRAUMA: Help you process traumatic childhood experiences.
  • SELF LOVE: Fall deeply, wildly and completely in love with yourself.
  • CONTROL: Give you more power and control over your past, present and future.

WHAT I NEED:

  • $2,799: Hybrid Self-Publishing Contract
  • $1,789: For digital Press Release and media promotion
  • $1,500: Editing for spelling, grammar and words usage
  • $400: for Professional audiobook equipment
  • $1000: for 100 books for youth

 

WHAT YOU GET:

I am giving you all of the tools you need to completely re-write your subconscious mind: The book in eBook, paperback, audiobook. Hypnotherapuetic MP3s, Booklet of my Most Powerful Affirmations, Journal to chart your progress. Group Coaching. 1-on-1 Coaching, and bonuses to show your support. With options of autographing.

  • GROUP COACHING: Receive a pre-released ebook and weekly coaching in powerful intimate group. Dive into each chapter, and receive live help from Tonya Tko to work with you and help you shift into self love. 6 Weeks, 6 people.
  • 1-ON-1 COACHING: Group coaching, pre-released eBook, PLUS Personal private coaching with Tonya Tko. 6 Weeks, 1-on-1
  • PAPERBACK: Physical copy of book with soft cover
  • HARDCOVER: Physical copy of book with hard cover
  • AUDIO BOOK: Audio version of book
  • EBOOK: Electronic version of book

  • JOURNAL: 5"X8" blank journal to chart your progress
  • BOOKMARK: Full color bookmark as the perfect companion to your book

AFFIRMATIONS BOOKLET: My most powerful affirmations in a 5"x 8" full color booklet. 48 pages. Worded with NLP (Nuero-Linguistic Programming) to re-write the subconscious mind. These affirmations correspond with the chapters from Self Love book, and super-charge the self love journey. 

  • HYPNOTHERAPEUTIC MP3: Listen to the soothing tone of my voice in this Audio hypnotherapy. Reprogram your subconscious mind and better your life as you sleep. Hypnotic music vibrating at the theta wavelength & isochronic tones to transport suggestions past the conscious mind and into your subconscious. Choose one of the following

(a) Wealth & Abundance
(b) Peace & Serenity
(c) Restful sleep
(d) Personalized: {UPGRADE} Personalized  mp3. Including 1-on-1 interview to target your particular issue. Created with your name and special suggestions in your own words).

 

  • T-SHIRT: Baby Tee or Unisex T-Shirt acknowledging your status as a Knockout!
  • STICKER: Full color "I'm a Knockout Sticker"

  • AUTOGRAPHED PHOTO: 8" X 10" Full color photo of Tonya Tko hand-autographed. Photo printed on high quality luster paper, with vivid brilliant color and a special message to you.

 

  • ACKNOWLEDGEMENT: Have your name (and link*) placed on the Tonya Tko Website (TonyaTko.com) and acknowledgement for your contribution (*your link on Gold level & above)

Bronze ($5)
Silver ($50)
Gold  ($100)*
Platinum ($500)*
Diamond ($1000)*
Heart Levels ($99 for youth books)*

 

The Impact

Have you ever had the feeling that you were on the cusp of something HUGE!? This book is the launchpad in the massive platform of Self-Love I'm creating: Books, workbooks, hynotherepeutic audios, videos, live workshops, speaking at organizations, and a TED Talk. I plan to have a yearly retreat, as well as produce a web show of rapid hypnosis and speed coaching to help people change their lives in an instant.

  • To change the world we must first change ourselves
  • I have a huge platform of 300K social media followers who have changed their lives from my videos. Getting married, getting paid more, moving, traveling, following their dreams and overall loving themselves.
  • I've been making videos for 10 years, and now realize everyone learns differently:
    Visual: Videos & demonstrations
    Audio: Through hearing and listening
    Kinestetic: Through feeling and intuition
    Audio-Digital: Manually at live workshops and seminars

SHIPPING:

Shipping in the US  will have a flat rate of $1 for small packages, $5 for medium and $10 for large . International shipments will be charged a flat rate of $25 and $35 to cover the shipping cost. If you have a cheaper method of shipping, please let me know, and when it is time to ship your package if the rate is more than you paid I may contact you to see how you'd like to handle it. If its less, I will put something extra in your box.

Don't see your country listed? Reach out to me and we'll get it configured.

DELIVERY

  • Group coaching will begin when campaign closes
  • Acknowledgement will be placed on website after campaign closes
  • The final ebook and audiobook will arrive via email
  • Paperback & Hardcover books (including journal & affirmations booklet) will be delivered in November 2018
  • T-Shirts will be delivered in November 2018

Risks & Challenges

As with any book printing much of the timeline depends on the actual printing. It is the goal that the books will be ready by November 2018, however something unforeseen may delay that

  • I will share progress updates so that we all have the best information of when the books will be available.
  • If the physical books are delayed I will make sure everyone gets the eBook version until the physical books are printed.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share, subscribe and support the vision of raising the Universal vibration of the globe:

  • Share Share Share this campaign!
  • Buy a book for a friend
  • Join my personal mailing list.
  • Buy a block of books for people you know
  • Invite me to speak at your organization
  • If you want a package or combination you don't see, let me know
  • Subscribe to my videos on Youtube
  • Like my page on Facebook
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and Share this campaign!

And that's all there is to it.

STRETCH GOALS:

  • $6000: Thank You Video filled with tears & gratitude!

  • $8,000: Every order gets a hypnotherapeutic MP3! (Wealth, Serenity, or Sleep)

  • $10,000: Every shipped package gets an autographed picture!

BOOK GOALS

  • 4,000 BOOKS SOLD: I will drive to the Hay House headquarters in California, ask for a meeting with Reid Tracy (to have the book reviewed for traditional publishing contract!!) I will record the journey and post on social media.

Share, subscribe and support the vision of raising the Universal vibration of the globe:

Share Share Share this campaign!
Buy a book for a friend
Join my personal mailing list.
Buy a block of books for people you know
Invite me to speak at your organization
If you want a package or combination you don't see, let me know
Subscribe to my videos on Youtube

Like my page on Facebook

Use the Indiegogo share tools and Share this campaign!

And that's all there is to it.STRETCH GOALS:
$6000: Thank You Video filled with tears & gratitude!
$8,000: Every order gets a hypnotherapeutic MP3! (Wealth, Serenity, or Sleep)
$10,000: Every shipped package gets an autographed picture!
BOOK GOALS4,000 BOOKS SOLD: I will drive to the Hay House headquarters in California, ask for a meeting with Reid Tracy (to have the book reviewed for traditional publishing contract!!) I will record the journey and post on social media.

story:
My Qualifications:  I am an art journalist and local historian. Since 2011, I’ve published more than 10,000 articles on art, theater and indie film on my blog and in local newspapers and magazines. But I also am passionate about sharing stories about our early origins with the people who visit and live in the town of Fort Myers, Florida, where I live. 

The Project: About a year and a half ago, Robin Tuthill and I began researching and writing a new book (our second, but more on that later). It chronicles the birth and evolution of the Fort Myers Fire Department. But more, it recounts how Fort Myers grew from a dusty frontier town on the banks of the Caloosahatchee River in Southwest Florida into the tarpon and citrus packing capital of the world in spite of a series of devastating early fires. In the process, the book transports readers back in time, providing a glimpse into what life was like in Fort Myers between 1886 and 1915. We call the book Epic Fires of Fort Myers: How A Series of Early Fires Influenced the Town's Development.

The residents and visitors of any town benefit greatly from an appreciation of their origins. That is certainly true here. But Epic Fires of Fort Myers also provides pithy present-day fire prevention and life safety analysis and tips compliments of current Fort Myers Fire Chief John Caufield and Fire Marshal Jen Campbell, as well as former Chiefs Richard Chappelle and Bill Conrod. The insights they impart could one day save lives!

Funding & Perks: In the process of researching the book, so many new facts, figures and absorbing anecdotes surfaced that the book morphed from a single short historical into two spellbinding volumes. But that entails twice the publishing fees and printing costs than originally anticipated. The costs of publishing Vol. 1 are covered, and it will hit bookstores in early November. But while the manuscript for Volume 2 is done, an additional $6,250 is needed to get it to market.

For a variety of reasons, we have decided to self-publish Epic Fires of Fort Myers. After considerable market research and analysis, we chose to utilize the services of a Denver-based indie publisher by the name of Outskirts Press. The first $1,750 of this funding goal covers the publication fee that Outskirts charges. The balance represents the cost of printing up to 1,000 copies of the book.

To provide you with more than the personal satisfaction that goes with helping preserve and promote our town’s unique and fascinating history, I’m offering a number of perks, which you'll find to the right.

What's in Vol. 2: So what will you and other readers find in Volume 2 of Epic Fires of Fort Myers?

  • Chapter 1 covers the fire that destroyed the Lee County Packing House in January of 1914, but it also recalls that Fort Myers had a thriving waterfront back in the day – in fact, more business was transacted on the town’s bustling piers and wharves than in the business district itself!
  • In Chapter 2, readers will learn about the town’s most important steamship line, and how it lost its two most important vessels in the span of less than six months – the Planter to fire and the Mildred to a midnight ramming in the waters off Sarasota.
  • Chapter 3 treats readers to a recounting of the real-life game of monopoly waged in Fort Myers by Walter Langford, “Wild” Bill Towles, Harvie Heitman and Peter Tonnelier. Imagine, for a moment, scores of shopkeepers, customers and residents watching in open-jaw amazement as construction workers rolled the gargantuan entry stone of the First National Bank building down First Street like an army of ancient Egyptians. Or County Commission Chair Bill Towles standing guard with his shotgun as workers dismantled the old wooden courthouse under the light of a bonfire in order to thwart his opponents, including one Harvie Heitman, from getting another injunction to prevent the construction of the structure that now sits at the corner of Broadway and Main. But it was Peter Tonnelier who was poised to win the board game being played out in the streets of Fort Myers – until a fire burned down the Michigan Hotel and several of Tonnelier’s other buildings, almost taking the First National Bank, Earnhardt and Heitman-Evans buildings with them!
  • Chapter 4 revisits Fort Myers’ enduring love affair with Thomas Edison and the movie industry his kinetoscope spawned - and the rivalry that developed between the town’s two seminal theaters, the Court and the Grand. You won’t believe the inventive marketing ploys that Jno T. Hendry and K.A. Bryant came up with to gain a competitive edge, but all that came to a smoldering finish when the Grand went up in flames in February of 1915. But if you think that meant that Bryant won the contest, guess again. That’s when Harvie Heitman jumped in with his 500-seat Arcade Theater – the only one of the three that survives to this day.

You’ll see Fort Myers through fresh eyes as a result of this read. And for that reason, I hope you’ll join in my cloudfunding campaign to bring the book to market.

Our Previous Book: As I intimated earlier, Epic Fires of Fort Myers is not the first book that Robin Tuthill and I have partnered to publish. Three years ago, we teamed up to write Female Pioneers of Fort Myers: Women Who Made a Difference in the City’s Development. Available on Amazon and in the Edison & Ford Winter Estates gift shop, Female Pioneers tells the never-before-told and nearly forgotten stories of 24 women who helped settle Fort Myers and convert it from a coarse, crass cow town into a center for commerce and tourism. [You can find out more about this book here.]

Our Marketing Plan:  While both volumes of Epic Fires will be available on Amazon and in bookstores, we will promote the book primarily through speaking engagements before area social organizations, civic groups and gated communities. In fact, many of the groups who heard us speak about Female Pioneers have already invited us back with the new books.

Risks: The cost of publishing/printing Vol. 2 can always be paid out of the net proceeds realized upon the sale of Vol. 1. But that will delay the publication of Vol. 2 given that there's a limit on the number of speaking engagements we can do in a week, month or tourism season.

Other Ways to Help: If you’re not able to help financially, there’s still plenty you can do. Spread the word through social media, emails, word of mouth and the Indiegogo share tools. Invite us to speak to your group or organization. And by all means, get a copy of the books once they hit bookstores. It will change the way you see Fort Myers and enhance your trips downtown forever more.

I greatly appreciate your interest and help.

Tom Hall, Author

I greatly appreciate your interest and help.

story:
Short Summary

 

Hi, I am Caroline, global citizen, and good-mood enthusiast.

 

My book is autobiographical. It’s about finding my lost heart and soul. The newer, more relatable version of "Eat, Pray, Love",meets "Wild", meets "Walk in the woods" if you will.

 


100 industry professionals have received samples of the book and 87 came back with the combined feedback,
"There is no doubt, this book will be a success."

 

 

The Story:

  • on my 30th Birthday, left by the love of my life, one day before my best friend’s wedding in Cancun
  • fast Forward, 4 months later, leaving with nothing but a backpack and a teddy bear
  • running away from life
  • learning aura seeking in Nepal
  • attending 18 days a Vipassana meditation retreat in Thailand
  • speaking to an elephant in Cambodia
  • getting sensual in Bali with a Spanish Yoga teacher, only to be beaten up by my Indonesian host when catching us
  • almost raped in Singapore only to then fall for my rescue host
  • 9 destinations
  • 5000 Euro budget
  • all as a Couchsurfer

 

The reader's outcome:

  • the desire to take their lives in their own hands
  • encouragement to follow their real desire
  • being able to break free
  • being inspired to change their direction of thoughts
  • educational insight about the spiritual world
  • and a good time reading an entertaining novel

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • A good book needs professional editing. Editing is calculated by word count and we are looking at est. $3500 - $4500 AUD for the full book.

 

ALMOST THERE - YAYYY

 

  • Graphic Design. Every book needs a cover, and parts of the story of how my heart changed from a black-spiky-solid-rock into a glooming open heart are documented. We are looking at $1200 AUD.
  • Copywriting, to apply the editing amendments but keeping my tone of voice, we are looking at est. $2500 AUD.
  • A marketing campaign to spread the word about the book is est. with $5500 AUD.
  • Merchandise $3500 AUD.

 

You'll see there is so much more to it, however, getting half the money with this project will take a tremendous weight off my shoulders. Being an expat with restricted earnings opportunities due to my Visa regulations limits my own financial input.

 

Our perks are designed to give back. This is the subline of the book altogether.

 

Every Dollar counts, no amount is too little.

 

Thank you

Up to $20 AUD, we'll give you a personal shout out on social media, telling the world how amazing you are for engaging in our project.

($15 US, Euro 13)

At $35 AUD, your name will be stated in the "Thank you" section of the book.

($25 US, Euro 20)

At $50 AUD, we will share a link with you to choose your favorite image from this journey as a full resolution download. Get yourself a great image for your home or office or as a gift for a beloved person.

($35 US, Euro 30)

At $100 AUD, you'll get the 1st three chapter exclusively via an eLink, after the editing process is completed.

($70 US, Euro 60)

At $150+ AUD you will get a hand signed paperback copy sent to you.

($110 US, Euro 95)

At $500+ AUD You'll get all of the above + an invitation to the book launch party if you are from the Sydney, Australia area and a personalized branded "Off I Go..." travel package incl:

Signed Book, Tote bag, shirt in your size, travel mug, notebook, and a pen.

($355 US, Euro 315)

 

The Impact

 

With your support, we will get the book out into the world and start transforming hearts and minds.

 

You will be part of:

  • helping readers to be encouraged to ask themselves if that’s all life has to offer.
  • helping to teach the reader about a lifestyle adjustment and the power of mindfulness.
  • helping me to give back and fulfill the promise to hundreds of enquiries.
  • helping to give others the courage to live their dream.

MORE PEOPLE SHOULD BE DOERS rather than followers.

 

Risks & Challenges

There is no risk for the backers. I offer full transparency and will send out Newsletters after the crowdfunding is finished.

Once you've helped me to get enough money to professionally edit my book, I will send my final draft off as soon as I have received the funds.

The editing takes usually 3 - 6 weeks. When my draft returns I will sit with my Copywriter to apply the editing amendments.

Next up, handing-in the edited version to my publishing house in Melbourne, AU and Atlanta, USA whom I am in touch with.

For the rare case, I will be turned down, after having already agreed to publish my book once it's edited, I will become the next J.K.Rowling and keep knocking doors... She knocked 51 doors.

Or I become the next Lisa Genova, who self-published "Still Alice" first and later was signed by Simon and Schuster.

This book will be in the shelves by August 2019!

Success Guarantee

The timing of consumers searching for answers is pivoting. 2019 and 2020 are forecasted to be the most profitable years in self-help books, yet. ***Forbes magazine 01/19

***

***

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are a professional and certified editor, copywriter, book agent or even a publisher, don't hesitate to reach out.

  • To all the amazing people, having gone through the effort and reading my pitch to this very point, get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools :)

And that's all there is to it.

 

Thank You for your support.

 

GERMAN VERSION:

Hallo, ich bin Caroline, Weltbürgerin und gute Laune-enthusiast.

Mein Buch ist autobiografisch. Es geht darum, meine verlorene Seele und mein Herz zu finden.

  • an meinem 30. Geburtstag, verlassen von der Liebe meines Lebens, einen Tag vor der Hochzeit meines besten Freundes in Cancun
  • 4 Monate später, mit nichts außer einem Rucksack und einem Teddybären los resien
  • Aura Leere in Nepal
  • Teilnahme an einem 18-tägigen Vipassana-Meditations-Retreat in Thailand
  • mit einem Elefanten in Kambodscha sprechen
  • in Bali mit einem spanischen Yoga-Lehrer sinnlich zu werden, nur um von meinem indonesischen Gastgeber geschlagen zu werden, als er uns erwischt hat
  • in Singapur fast vergewaltigt zu werden, um mich dann in meinen Retter zu verlieben
  • 9 Ziele
  • 5000 Euro-Budget
  • Alles als Couchsurfer

 

Was wir brauchen und was Sie bekommen

 

  • Ein gutes Buch muss professionell bearbeitet werden. Die Bearbeitung wird anhand der Anzahl der Wörter berechnet, und wir betrachten geschätzte $3500 - $4500 AUD für das gesamte Buch.
  • Grafikdesign. Jedes Buch braucht ein Cover, und Teile der Geschichte, wie sich mein Herz von einem schwarzen, stacheligen Felsen zu einem offenen Herzen verändert hat, sind dokumentiert. Wir haben einen Kostenvoranschlag ueber $1200 AUD.
  • Copywriting, um die Änderungsvorschläge anzuwenden, aber meinen Tonfall beizubehalten, etwa $2500 AUD.
  • Eine Marketingkampagne zur Bekanntmachung des Buches liegt bei $5500 AUD.
  • Waren $3500 AUD.


Sie werden sehen, es steckt so viel mehr dahinter, aber die Hälfte des Geldes mit diesem Projekt zu gewinnen, wird mir enorm viel abnehmen. Als Expat mit begrenzten Verdienstmöglichkeiten aufgrund meiner Visabestimmungen schränkt meinen finanziellen Beitrag ein.

Unsere Vergünstigungen sind dafür gedacht, etwas zurückzugeben. Dies ist die gesamte Zeile des Buches.

Jeder Dollar zählt, kein Betrag ist zu wenig.

 

Danke für die Unterstützung.

story:
In these books, you will find answers to questions about Consciousness, Twin Flames & Soul Mates, Kundalini, Chakras, Gifted Children, Fairies, Healing, Lightbodies, God, Creation, The Future, Inner Earth, Conception, Saints, Longevity, DNA, Marijuana, Free Energy, Famous Deceased, Stress, Prophecies, Prayer, Joy, Christian Sacraments, Alchemy, Dolphins & Whales, Symbolism in your Everyday Life, What the Trees Have to Say, What the Water, the Oceans, the Sky, and the Land has to say and more!

You will find answers about the Solar System, Crystals, Earth, Air, Evolution, Technology, Luck, Karma, Planes of Existence After Death, Time, Timelines, Ghosts, Spirits, Multidimensional Selves, Sacred Geometry and many more topics asked by people from around the world.

 

Short Summary

Every Saturday morning for years on the World of Empowerment podcast, Aingeal Rose & Ahonu discussed the cutting edge of consciousness. They recorded and documented it and want to publish it all in a 100-book series called, Answers From The Akashic Records. So far, 11 books have been published from their own resources, but they need your help to publish the rest and distribute this incredible resource out into the world.

There are 100 books in the series with 11 published so far (http://amzn.to/2FaJ1HL)

Please help us make it happen right here on Indiegogo!

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

The cost to publish is only $100 per book, (cheap when you consider ISBN's alone cost $125 each!) but by donating as little as $50 you can support this hugely beneficial effort that brings you deep into the world of empowerment, helping thousands of people move from mediocrity to magnificent, and from collective grief to greatness!


Along with the books, Aingeal Rose & Ahonu down-stepped from Spirit over 4,000 profound statements from the Akashic Records. These profound statements are sent twice a week to our patrons on all donation tiers, serving as a timely reminder of our human/spiritual magnificence.

 

The Impact

 

If you are looking for actionable, motivational and practical growth in conscious awareness, Aingeal Rose & Ahonu want you as a patron! Please see all our donation tiers so you can contribute where you feel you can be the most effective and help the most. Even from the first 11 books, the impact on readers is profound. Here's a sample:

"Thank you so much Ahonu and Aingeal Rose, your words emanate a beautiful warmth. So truly grateful you share this with your readers, how important to share this now! This is a group effort, you can feel it happening now!" ~ Houston, Golden Consciousness

"Thank you both so much for sharing this wonderful teaching and experience... the discoveries were very insightful." ~ Sue Padden

"No human words to describe the joy and gratitude I feel to you. I am forever grateful!" ~ Galina Gorodetsky

"I'm thrilled to experience The Akashic Records." ~ Anita Piejko

"I received a lot of confirmation and some new pieces to the puzzle. The information you shared was truly helpful. Thank you for the truly amazing woman that you are and the wonderful work that you do." ~ Margaret Wagner

"Thanks for your guidance. I loved all I learned" ~ Jean Clancy

"I am only on the introduction page but I know this is a journey which will be fruitful and exhilarating for my own development, growth, and life." ~ Pauline Maguire

"I have a huge smile in my heart that is spreading all over my body and I feel full of excitement for what is to come." ~ Susan Foley

"I am new to the understandings of our existence, I want to, and will be exploring more. Both my husband and I cannot put it down nor stop discussing its vast information. I feel we have been released and are open to a new world of understanding and joy." ~ Mona Hedin

 

 

At $100 for example, you get Volumes 1-10 of Answers From The Akashic Records immediately. For larger donations, you begin to get them all as they are published along with our weekly podcast where you will hear the downsides, the fears, the negative agendas and the pitfalls in our human struggle for understanding "Who am I?" and "Why am I here?" and always in every episode, we find the wonder, the joy, and the excitement as we all grow in spirit and love. But as a patron, you get much, much more!

 

Risks & Challenges

 

As with all endeavors, there are risks and challenges. We've met the first one already - we ran out of our own money after publishing the first 11 books in the series. Now you have the opportunity to be part of this great project and help us blaze past our own personal money limitations and bring the rest of this great collection of Answers From The Akashic Records to the world.

 

 

A further challenge is always distribution, but we have this covered. We've contracted with the largest book distributor in the world, Ingram, who will distribute this collection over 38,000 online and offline book retailers in every country on Earth. They are distributing it in all formats like ePub, Kindle, Nook, PDF and more, to major outlets like Amazon, Apple, Baker & Taylor Blio, Barnes & Noble Nook & many more.

If you've read this far you are obviously a seeker. We appreciate you and look forward to seeing you. Your support encourages others and helps share our collective mission of love!

 

Here is a little more information about us:


Aingeal Rose & Ahonu are Authors and Publishers of Books and Courses on Consciousness. With over 60 years combined experience, Twin Flames Aingeal Rose & Ahonu are trusted by clients around the world for their authentic down-to-earth approach. They have become known for empowering their clients and helping to raise the consciousness of the world through
✔️Powerful coaching, webinars, readings
✔️Potent courses, books, podcasts
specially designed for your ...
✔️Clarity
✔️Freedom
✔️Your conscious personal growth and
✔️Your conscious business success!

People say,
“I learned a lot more about myself.”
“I now recognize the beliefs and ways of thinking that were not serving me and keeping me from the spiritual growth I really want.”
“For the first time in my life, my life is supporting the highest expression of myself.”

Join us so you too can help others live, love and experience personal sovereignty, personal and business success through a delightful growth of awareness delivered personally and securely by us to you through this great portal to personal power! Love & blessings,

 


 

 

P.S. We understand some people just can't contribute money, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Here are other ways you can help:

 

  • Can you help to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign?
  • Why not use the Indiegogo share tools, or use your own social media accounts to share!

 

We appreciate all the help you can give in any way you can.

story:
My name's Roy, I'm a Husband to be, a Father and a full time musician. Life is good... but do you ever have those overwhelming sensations of nostalgia. A time when everything seemed easier but the world was bigger. A time in fact, when you were more vulnerable but felt safer. A time that now seems so long ago and the values we had seem so far way...?

The Backstory

Every generation has that notion and in the world of reboots and remakes and come backs it's a trait that seems to have no plans of disappearing. But what if we didn't have to rely on nostalgia and fond memories? What if we took the good things from our childhood, our teen years. The friends, the films and shows that defined us and a generation and brought them back into the fray with the advancements we now have around us. 

Well that's the melting pot of ideas that spawned the idea of "Maitland '95" for me! 

There are fantastic things all around us at present but I couldn't help feeling that more often than not the values, morals and plain old family based adventure and mystery were missing from that which we grew up with and helped shape us. There's no denying the amazing advancements in technology we have nowadays but nothing beat a two player computer video game where your best friend was actually next to you or going out after school and having to ask a dozen parents if their kid could come out to play otherwise you had to wait on the step for them to finish their tea. 

Well my Teen based Horror/ Adventure novel is very nearly finished and it's chocked full of call backs to the 90's, mystery, monsters, adventure. Taking inspirations from the shows and books from the day. All while keeping good ol' fashioned family values at it's core to hopefully inspire our kids and a new generation. 

I never dreamed I could write a novel but here I am and with nearly 350 pages ready to print and with your help we can turn this idea into an actuality. With your backing I can self publish and print the manuscript for "Maitland '95" and help bring the best of the 90's into the 21st century

 

Bringing Maitland To Life

So how do we bring the book into the world? The research, Artwork, time spent making the progress so far and initial book awareness has been covered by myself but with the backing by yourselves we can fund the printing and copy-editing. Funding the means to release the novel and it's launch later this year.

Regular updates will be added as I finish the last few sections of the book and hit various milestones and announcements.

If we meet the target goal, we will be able to publish the first 1,000 copies and distribute on digital medium; all further contributions will allow us to print further batches and distribute to Libraries and Schools aswell. 

 

Perks

There will be different "perks" for varying levels of contributions, this is a further way of me trying to display my sincere appreciation for believing in me and my work.

In the past you have supported my music, helping me reach international success with my original music "Going Global". Now I'd love to be able to write and release something new you can treasure and give YOU back that feeling you had as a child, maybe a new favourite book for your own child or maybe you were older and enjoyed the classic horror shows and movies of the time and just want to reconnect with something that simply enthralled you. 

 

Risks & Challenges

As with anything in life there are risks, HOWEVER just like the idea of bringing that warm fuzzy nostalgia feeling back to you with my work. I want you to feel safe and secure with your backing in this project.

All of the work has pretty much been done already and it has all been completed by myself alone, including artwork and promo and I will not be winding down anytime soon.

This campaign is purely to boost the project over that wall into a printed product that can be released to all of you lovely people.

Any shortfall on funding by the end of the deadline will result in smaller batches being run instead to honour all backers and then further work will be done by myself to make sure further prints can be released.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I know there are awesome people out there who want to help and even loose change makes a difference but I also appreciate that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

You can still get the word out and make some noise about the campaign, you can share the posts, links, anything helps spread the word and everything is valued greatly.  You can also follow Maitland on all major social media sites and apps such as Facebook, Instagram and Twitter all of which make it easy to share and spread the Maitland Love at the literal click of a button. 

Come have a look here: 

Facebook: www.facebook.com/maitland1995

Instagram: www.instagram.com/maitland1995

Twitter: https://twitter.com/maitland1995

Come have a look here: 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/maitland1995
Instagram: www.instagram.com/maitland1995
Twitter: https://twitter.com/maitland1995

story:
Living Daily: Alexander Technique for Parkinson's Disease

I have watched Alexander Technique make a visible difference to people with Parkinson’s Disease for over ten years now. In some cases, the improvements are extraordinary (click here to see CBC coverage of AT for PD!). When Alexander Technique students with PD visit their neurologists, they are routinely told: “you don’t look like you should”. Alexander Technique is not a cure, but it provides a way to preserve or recover the ability to function in normal daily living.

This book has been previewed, researched and discussed with people from across the spectrum of folks whose lives are touched by Parkinson’s Disease, from doctors and care-givers to other teachers and most importantly, with patients. It is a resource to help support their learning, and it is the product of 20 years of experimenting with how Alexander Technique can be adapted to make a difference for people with chronic illness.

Study Poster from WPC 2013

I have taken small pilot projects on the efficacy of Alexander for Parkinson’s to the last two World Parkinson’s Congresses. With your help, I will be presenting this book at WPC2019 in Kyoto, Japan this June. We need a large-scale study to make Alexander Technique an option for all patients. This book can serve as a protocol to help make that research goal a reality. In it I have also chronicled some of the progress made by my students with Parkinson’s, some of which is clinically significant, and all of which is a source of hope. Presenting it in Japan, where I have been invited to be a featured author, will provide tremendous exposure to potential research partners.

Study Poster from WPC 2016

A further advantage of having a multi-media book is that we can use it as a postgraduate training tool for other Alexander teachers. Working with Parkinson’s can be a daunting thing, and this book is a culmination of decades of teaching and thousands of hours of one-on-one time working with students as they struggle to manage the disease. We need more trained teachers, and with this book we can offer them a standardized way of adapting Alexander for Parkinson’s, and give them a resource for support as they help students tackle the hugely varied array of symptoms.

 

Our Goal

We need $9000 to get this book designed and accessible! We want it designed professionally so that it is easy to read and beautifully illustrated. It seems a small thing, but just having a book that is sturdy and lies flat when you open it almost doubles the print cost--I consider this an essential detail. Using only words to teach Alexander Technique is the difference between painting and sculpting. Therefore the book most have comprehensive photos and clear, simple sketches to help tell the story of your body. Your support will help me cover the costs of terrific photographers and a really talented, empathetic artist, as well as get the book laid out to the best possible advantage.

Further, I am delighted to be working with Bright Wing Media in Vancouver on not just a physical book, but to develop an e-platform for folks who are comfortable reading on-line. Not only is this company ethical and talented, but they have also developed ground-breaking technology that will revolutionize the publishing industry. You can purchase Living Daily as an e-book and read it on any device, from your computer, tablet to even your smart phone, without any special apps. Amazing! Furthermore, they are able to embed short instructional videos throughout the text. Adding video will bring in that extra dimension of showing you what I am talking about; short of being able to reach through the screen and put my hands on you, it is the best way to teach and support that I know of.

 

The Impact

I have a student with Parkinson’s who has been studying Alexander Technique now since 2007. Although her disease has progressed over the past twelve years, she is still able to overcome intense tremor and stand up completely straight, then move “like a normal person,” as she puts it. Her ability to manage her disease is fairly unprecedented and everyone who meets her, including medical professionals, are amazed by her deliberate gait, strong voice, and her ability to stand up to her full height moments after she has been curled right up by her symptoms. She needs more lessons in order to offset her advancing illness. I am hoping that having the book to refer to during the months I do not see her will help, but more importantly, I want to use it to procure research to help us learn what the best “delivery” of Alexander Technique is for people like her. With research will come funding for patients to have access to lessons in the same way they are offered subsidies for medication and other modalities like physiotherapy.

And that is only the story of one student. Her progress, and that of a number of other PD patients I have been working with now for several years, shows us that consistent Alexander work seems to slow the onset of the disease, and provide a greater quality of life and certainly a greater functional ability in daily living. Most importantly, it gives hope.

Since 2016, I have had the privilege of working with a patient who was in the advanced stages of Parkinson’s; he could not roll over in bed on his own, get out of a chair on his own, walk or stand unassisted. After three years of working with him, as well as training his wife to use Alexander principles to work with him daily, he has regained all those skills, and shows no sign of stopping. His height has restored from 5’5” to the 6’ of his youth. Patients in advanced stages have fewer and fewer opportunities available to them, and are often told to resign themselves to immobility and worse. It is really important we get them this resource to start down a path of hope—and can move on to get the research to take this work farther.

Our $9000 target will cover the cost of the art and design of the book, both hard copy and digital. All contributions are important, and all will further the development of Alexander Technique for Parkinson’s Disease. (Please note that the page layouts and photos you see here are only “mock-ups,” and not the final version.)

Publishing Timeline

May 2: Text Copy to Designers

May 14th: Indiegogo Campaign ends; list of Supporters added to manuscript

May 15: Manuscript PDF from Bright Wing to printers for Kyoto Edition (hard copy)

June 1: E-book Kyoto Edition goes live

June 4-7: “Book Nook” Presentation at the World Parkinson’s Congress in Kyoto

June 25: Updates/Revisions and Index added to manuscript files; (upgrades made automatically to e-book)

July 26: Print copy books available to ship

 

I will make this happen. You will receive whatever you order, and I will go to Kyoto and present the book even if we do not make our $9000 target. None of the funds we are asking for go to pay for my own time or costs, but I would very much like to be able to pay the project collaborators up front.

Simply pre-ordering the book here will be an enormous help. I appreciate any further support you are able to give, including sharing this information and campaign with people who may be interested. Thank you so much!

To follow this project, and to be added to my mailing list, please click here!

May 15: Manuscript PDF from Bright Wing to printers for Kyoto Edition (hard copy)
June 1: E-book Kyoto Edition goes live
June 4-7: “Book Nook” Presentation at the World Parkinson’s Congress in Kyoto
June 25: Updates/Revisions and Index added to manuscript files; (upgrades made automatically to e-book)
July 26: Print copy books available to ship
 

I will make this happen. You will receive whatever you order, and I will go to Kyoto and present the book even if we do not make our $9000 target. None of the funds we are asking for go to pay for my own time or costs, but I would very much like to be able to pay the project collaborators up front.
Simply pre-ordering the book here will be an enormous help. I appreciate any further support you are able to give, including sharing this information and campaign with people who may be interested. Thank you so much!
To follow this project, and to be added to my mailing list, please click here!

story:
What is SISU? 

Derived from a Finnish concept and cultural construct, the word, “sisu,” means not momentary courage, but the ability to sustain that courage in the face of adversity--something that minorities have to do every day. Our zine is independently produced by a group of friends from the University of San Francisco who all share similar and overlapping experiences and backgrounds. As we express ourselves through this zine, we are letting you inside our cultures and identities in order to give representation to voices in the shadows of society.

Why? 

As minorities, we do not always have the space to speak our minds, and oftentimes we cannot tell our own stories without them being twisted and reconstructed into ideas that do not truly represent us. Through our zine, SISU, we are making that space for ourselves and other creative minds.

Our aim is to share bits of who we are and what we love. We are the future of this nation and must be able to tell our own stories--Our loves. Our heartbreaks. Our growth. Our failures. Our breaking points. We will strive to demonstrate the true meaning of sisu by using our courage to dust ourselves off and overcome. We are standing up to speak what is on our minds, and in doing so we hope that we can inspire you to do the same.

What We Need & What You Get

All of us at SISU are college students and funds for all parts of production for the zine and merch come straight from our pockets! Funding a physical zine and merch is extremely expensive and you all can help us get some weight off our shoulders. Our goal of $2,00 will not cover all of our costs but it will for sure help us in a significant way. 

In return for your help, SISU wants to also give back and reward you with some treats. Feel free to read our perk descriptions for more in-depth information on what each bracket entails. 

Other Ways You Can Help

For those that are unable to donate, helping us by sharing the campaign through social media or by word of mouth is extremely helpful and appreciated. We also work hard on creating daily content on our Instagram - following us will make our day! Our Instagram is @sisu.zine.
