them find healing from the trauma and provide a road map to create the life they
desire.
My story will be introduced in the first chapter.  I was the victim of bullying for nearly 10 years beginning in third grade through my senior year in high school.  As a young adult, I was angry, bitter and struggled with low self-esteem and bouts of depression.  
It took another ten years after leaving the bullying behind for me to find healing and develop a better foundation for dealing with life.  Now, I want to help other victims.

Help publish this book and reach out to these victims. The
next steps include editing, layout, printing, marketing and publicity.
The
ultimate goal isn't just selling books. 
My goal is to speak at high schools, colleges and community groups.  I will bring attention to the long-term
damage that bullying causes, and help other victims with their issues. My story
will be used to show them that there is hope for a better future. I’ll listen
to their struggles and help them begin the healing process.
The total I am seeking is $6600, which will go to:  Developmental editing - $800 Copy editing - $400
ISBN numbers - $250

Professional Reviews - $450
Website design - $500

Printing 1000 copies and shipping - $2200

Marketing & Publicity - $2000

Perks Offered
There are three levels of perks offered to those who help get this book published.  Those who donate:

$25 - electronic copy of the book $50 - electronic copy and a signed print copy of the book
$100 - both of the above perks, plus a three week online seminar designed to help you get beyond obstacles from the past and create the life you desire.

I need approximately $4000 to get the book published and print 1000 copies.  The remainder of the funds I'm seeking will allow me to hire people to help with marketing and publicity.  If I reach the smaller goal, I can still publish the book and seek alternative methods to market the book.
I've Been Where These Victims Are: My experience as a victim, and a person who overcame the trauma make me uniquely qualified to help other victims.  I learned better ways to deal with the past, and how to create a  better future.   Challenges  Getting a book noticed with so many titles being published every year can be a difficult task.  Bullying is currently a very hot topic in the media and in schools around the country.  Right now, there aren't a lot of books written to help the victims after they leave the bullying behind.  I will fill a niche that is currently wide open.
I also have contacts at several local universities and in local media outlets  These contacts will allow me to get speaking opportunities, and help me get interviews at local TV stations and radio stations.   Other Ways You Can Help If you aren't able to contribute, you can still help by:  Spreading the word, especially using social media, email and word of mouth . You can share on most social media platforms by clicking on the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
English

I setup this donation campaign for an ex professor of mine who is publishing a book in Albania about the small town I was born at. The book is a summary of traditional folklore poetry and songs from that region that exhibit a greater understanding of culture going back in time. I would greatly appreciate any donation you can provide.

Thank you for your generosity and consideration.

Sincerely,

-Ylli Baku-


Albanian

CFARE ME SHTYU PER TE PROMOVUAR KETE LIBER?

Si nje Matjan i lindur dhe rritur ne Klos me behet shume qefi qe dikush mendon per kulturen dhe artin e kesaj zone. Varferia ka bere te veten dhe ka lene nje hapesire boshe ne drejtim te artit dhe kultures se pasur te trevave Matjane. Uroj me gjithe shpirt, qe ky liber te jete nje gur themeli dhe te nxjerre ne pah ato tradita shekullore qe koha i la ne kujtesen e njerezve te motshem.
Mbi te gjitha, eshte krenari te promovosh letersine, artin dhe folklorin e vendit tend.....


PERSE FLET LIBRI? - NJE PERMBLEDHJE E SHKURTER NGA GJOKE DABAJ:

Jam bashkautor me Valbonë Çollakun, ish-nxënësen time dhe tash profesoreshë e letërsisë në Shkollën e Mesme „Shaban Çollaku“, Klos. Në hyrje ka një parashtresë, analizë tematike e krijimtarisë popullore në trevën e Kryemates, shkruar prej meje para shumë vitesh dhe ripunuar vitet e fundit. Në vazhdim është lënda folklorike, këngët popullore, të mbledhura në vitin 2012 nga Shkolla e Mesme „Sh.Çollaku“.

Në kapitullin e parë janë baladat, këngët e kurbetit e nizamëvet dhe elgjitë. Gjithsej 23 këngë.

Kapitulli i dytë ka këngët historike, patriotike e të trimërisë. Gjithsej 13 këngë.

Pas këtyre vijnë këngët e djepit dhe të fëmijëvet. 18 këngë.

Këngët e dashurisë janë 84.

Këngët e dasmës, te vajza, janë 45.

Këngët e dasmës, te djali, janë 141.

Pas këngëvet të dasmës kemi vendosur këngët historike të kohëvet të reja. Janë 22.

Në fund kemi vënë vajet, vargje vajtimi në raste vdekjesh a vrasjesh, gjithsej 3 a 4.

Në kapitullin „Të ndryshme“ janë përfshirë ata krijime që, për shkak të subjektit, nuk mund të viheshin në asnjërin prej kapitujvet të mësipërm. Janë gjithsej 21.

Në tërësi, këngë të përfshira në këtë libër, janë rreth 370. Libri mbyllet me thënie të urta dhe me një prozë të shkurtër, e cila do të mund të shërbente si fillimi i një libri tjetër.

E veçanta e kësaj përmbledhjeje këngësh popullore është se që të gjitha janë shoqëruar me sqarimet përkatës, herë-herë analiza të zgjëruara, gjë që i ndihmon shumë lexuesit, sidomos lexuesit e rinj dhe ata që do të vijnë pas nesh.

Secili grup këngësh ka emrin dhe fotografinë e atij apo asaj që i ka thënë, si dhe emrin e fotografinë e asaj apo atij që i ka shënuar këngët. Edhe kjo është një veçori e këtij libri, sepse i përjetëson edhe me figurë autorët, duke i ruajtur ata për shekujt e ardhshëm dhe sidomos për studiuesit.

Thank you for your generosity and consideration.
Sincerely,
-Ylli Baku-

story:
"Miu Over Miami” isn’t simply a book, but the first in an interactive series. This picture book is an early reader designed for children ages 3 to 8. "Miu Over Miami" is beautifully illustrated featuring scenes of Miami's iconic landscape. 


You may be asking..."Why are you crowd funding?"

I have decided to self publish and self market this book! The money that we are raising is to cover the basic costs of self publishing the children's book "Miu over Miami." This particular campaign is to fund all costs of self publishing which include printing, marketing and illustrations.  The intention is to continue to  write and publish books to create an entire series! 

This isn't just another children’s book series featuring animals, but a captivating and engaging story line featuring vividly appealing illustrations set within unique cultural environments. Each book will deliver thought provoking messages and encourage child literacy while at the same time helping children to learn basic vocabulary for a second language. 


The Book & Characters: Miu Miu (aka Miumerton) is a quirky black house cat living in Miami with a very large tummy and an even larger appetite! Miu's superior sense of smell leads to wild adventures with his streetwise Spanish speaking feline sidekick Tabers the great! All the while the vibrant city of Miami serves as a backdrop to their feline antics.  Working alongside (very talented!) illustrator Clayton Young the goal was to really capture some of the most iconic Miami landmarks and incorporate them into this book. Miami has served as a source of creative inspiration to me as a writer and with this first book I wanted the illustrations to depict the true cultural essence that Miami is so famous for! 

The goal is to write and publish a series (the 1st book is complete and has illustrations to accompany it!) featuring Miu and Taber’s adventures while featuring vocabulary words from the Spanish language. With a deep love for writing, animals and children this series will shine through to children and parents alike. The intention is not to write another children’s book series featuring animals, but to truly captivate and engage people with vividly appealing stories set within unique environments, deliver thought provoking messages and encourage children to begin learning basic vocabulary for a second language. With globalization bringing together economies and societies we need to set the foundation for our children to become successful! Beginning foreign language instruction early sets the stage for children to develop advanced levels of proficiencies in one or more languages. Studies have shown repeatedly that foreign language learning increases critical thinking skills, creativity, and flexibility of the mind in young children. In today’s growing global economy it is important to teach our children to become cross-cultural, open-minded and multi-lingual! These are skills that need to be developed at a very early age.


The concept for this children's books series was created after years of living with a very stubborn and extremely unique house cat that was rescued off of the streets of Miami Beach. I found myself creating stories about what Miu would do if he left the house, followed his insatiable appetite and ventured out into the vibrant and rich culture of Miami.  Miu the cat is the main character in this children's book series and will feature a variety of books that incorporate his wild antics, street wise sidekick Tabs and their travels. 



The goal that we set is the minimum needed to cover the basic costs of self publishing/printing along with Indiegogo's fee. In addition it will cover paying our illustrator who has worked very hard on this project for over a year with no pay! With this first round of printing we will get 300 quality books printed. This children's book series is a culmination of my strengths, passions and goals. 


Community Partner: Read to Learn Books for Free
We believe in supporting our community and have partnered  with the Read to Learn Books for Free program. During our campaign if you choose to fund us you will see that there is the option starting at the $25 level and above  to donate your book/s to this grant-funded program. As we grow we want to support the community that we live in and support child literacy!
Read to Learn Books for Free is a grant-funded program in partnership with The Children’s Trust. Nearly half of Miami-Dade County 3rd graders fail to read at even basic grade level, and are 4 times more likely to drop out of high school. Studies have shown that access to reading materials is the first real step toward improving children’s literacy, but only 1 out of every 300 urban children has a book in their home.

story:
Short Summary

When the world is your framework, your roots and heritage become even more important; it determines one's identity. It has become my passion to combine my profession of fashion design with my insatiable urge for researching Persian culture, history and fashion (through costumes and images). I have been doing this research on Persian ancient women's fashion since 1998.

My ultimate goal is to publish a book that will be some of the results of my research as well as my design work with illustrations. The book must be published by October 1, 2015, to coincide with an exhibition on Persian history in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.

What We Need & What You Get

I need to raise $ 5,000 to publish my book, with this book I want to inform people more about the fashion of one of the oldest civilizations in the world.

$ 25  Free copy

$ 100  4 free copies

$ 500  20 copies or 10 copies and an exclusively-designed shawl with Persian motive by Maryam Entezami.


The Impact

My collection up till now contains over approximately 30 costumes from the Elam period to Pahlavi Dynasty. My first successful exhibition was "Iranian Folkloric Garments", presented in 1997 in the Museum of Anthropology in Leiden, the Netherlands.

As a result of my collection being based on ancient Persian women's costume, I have been invited to showcase my designs on the catwalk both nationally and internationally. I  have been interviewed by various tv channels, magazine and newspapers.

Since November 2013 my designs and research on Persian women clothing from Elam (3200 B.C) to Pahlavi dynasty (1979) have been the subject of a Dutch filmmaker's documentary "Unraveled". We are aiming to have it ready for the (IDFA) international documentary film festival Amsterdam and other film festivals  (2015).

My ultimate goal is to share my costumes, knowledge & insights to a bigger audience to make the richness of our Persian culture more tangible and visible. I hope you are willing to support me in this goal and to make it our joined effort.


Risks & Challenges

To ensure quality and transparency, I have asked a writer/editor friend of mine, Beth Hooper of Tower of Babel Communications and Publications (www.tobcp.com), who also has publishing experience to assist with editing and publishing. We have found a highly-skilled and qualified graphic designer, Kjeld de Ruyter of Puntspatie bv (www.puntspatie.nl), to assist with layout and publishing. Thanks to his skill and contacts, we are able to publish at a high level of quality worthy of the research, but yet in a cost effective manner. We are willing to share the estimates with you upon request.
Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not able to help me in financial means, you would really help me by getting the word out. I appreciate your support in all forms:  telling your friends about us through Facebook, website, email, twitter etc. Please use my  Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/persiancostume,  Website www.maryentez.com & INDIEGOGO  to spread the word!

story:
WE ARE FLYING! NOVEL PUBLISHED JUL 2016

READ MORE AT  http://parallel-spirals.webs.com/

Read my thoughts on this process here:


THE BOOK IS NOW LIVE - visit the website to learn more and to buy it


A story within a story within a story – each moving the other up a layer of the spiral

The boundary between friendship and sexuality

A confession – love of a vicar whom you can’t marry in church

The highest stakes – for it risks not only all in this world, but the next

When I realised that were I given a short time to live, I would abandon all other careers to publish my novels, I did just that. I’ve overcome near constant struggle to write on top of work and sometimes without any. It is finely honed work, not something swiftly scribbled, but a long process of allowing distance and then critical revisiting to craft this as well as I am capable.

Now it is time to put down my pen and send this into the world.

I don’t just want to have written a novel and publish, I don’t want to just sell well.
I want to write a classic.

My feeling about this story has never waned – in the 25 years I’ve been a serious writer, nothing else has made me this expanded, excited.

After hearing that only 8% of submissions were accepted and that I would receive only 8% of the profits less agents' fees, have no control over the final book and have to do much of the marketing myself anyway, I decided to self publish. I wanted to take publishing back into authors’ hands. No-one was going to share my passion or invest so much in editing or promoting; no-one would care as much.

For as M&S said in their campaign – there is no plan B.

Writing’s not my hobby, my sideline; it is who I am and what I do.

I want to fulfil the life begins at 40 model, and have spent so much of my previous years in preparation. Now it is time to fly. Please help me with my wings.

Here's a link to the book's pitch and its beginning:

http://parallel-spirals.webs.com/

It’s the story of synthesis of sexuality and faith, of accepting oneself and becoming whole: sometimes humorous, sometimes painful, often challenging and always honest - a work I believe is important for those on the journey and those who would unwittingly hamper it for others.

It is also hugely important to me, not just for the personal resonance of the content, but as a writer who has fought austerity and other obstacles to create this work, in the hope that launching this is a way to self sustaining and to the fulfilment I have long sought.

If I get beyond the amount, I have the sequel (all written) and also my living costs – I only earn through my writing and art, and often this has been very little. Until this book is published and garners sales, my income is very limited and so any extra funds will help me establish my work

story:
Who am I?

I’m graduated in French literature from the University of Sofia. Working for two decades as French translator and radio journalist, I always wrote albeit sporadically, but I understood the difficulty of the craft and the need to improve my skills. So I enrolled in four on-line courses in creative writing at Barnes & Noble, I’ve read some books and started to implement what I have learned in my writing, experimenting in different genres. Gradually, I realized that my passion turned imperceptibly in a vocation I was taking seriously.

Afterwards I started uploading my short stories in my blog in Bulgarian language and the response from the Bulgarian readers was great. Some of my stories were published in four collections: To Defeat Your Destiny, The Lucky Guy, The Dream Of Ouroboros, And Rome Remained Free. Meantime I met other Bulgarian writers. One of them is Iva Kassabova and together we created the novel Let Be Adventure. The novel was published in 2013, we had a great launch party and a book tour in Bulgaria and it was well received by the readers and attracted the media attention. Now I have more than eighty short stories, I’m finishing my second novel and I’m working on the idea of a third.

Why I need your support?

I would like to present my stories to a wider audience, to see how I’m doing at a worldly level, but that being Bulgarian, I write in my native language. I know what it means to really master a language and I know my English is not on the required literary level. So, to do things professionally, I have to hire a professional Bulgarian to English translator to give you the opportunity to get acquainted with my stories, a proofreader, a cover designer and a website designer. I managed to hire a translator for three of them that you can read through the links below, but for the rest I need your support.

The Free Will

Zama

The Lucky Guy


Why should you support me?

Bulgaria is an old country, there were many different cultures and unknown legends – I based my novel on one of them. In the mean time this is a modern country with ancient roots and, despite the difficulties of today, successfully mixes past and present. That’s exactly I do in my writing, although I don’t write only for or about Bulgarians. Even if some of my characters come from different places and different times, the stories I write are comprehensible for anyone no matter where they are from and where they are living. In the meantime I lean on that mix between past and present I mentioned above and I have what to say with my work.

How I’ll use the collected amount

As I mentioned above, to do the things professionally I have to hire a professional translator, a proofreader, a cover designer and website designer. I will manage to hire the cover designer and the proofreader myself but to translate my best short stories with approximately length of 90 000 words I need $ 9 900. I secured $ 1 000 for the website designer but I lack another $ 1 500, in total $ 11 400. If the campaign succeeds partially, I intend to create a website and to hire the translator and the proofreader for the corresponding amount of short stories. If the campaign exceeds the desired amount, I’ll be able to hire them for my novel too, gathering the rest by myself.

Other ways you can help

If you can’t contribute, but you would like to support the campaign, please spread the word about the project. Share the link for the campaign on your social media page, or email it to friends and family.

Thank you for your attention and your support. Have pleasant moments with my stories.

~~~~~~~~~

Кой съм аз?

Завършил съм френска филология в СУ „Св. Климент Охридски”. От две десетилетия работя като преводач и радио журналист и винаги съм писал, макар и спорадично, но разбрах трудността на занаята и необходимостта да усъвършенствам уменията си. Затова изкарах четири онлайн курса по творческо писане към „Barnes & Noble”, прочетох някои книги по темата и започнах да прилагам наученото в писането си и да експериментирам в различни жанрове. Постепенно осъзнах, че тази моя страст незабелязано се е превърнала в призвание, към което подхождах сериозно.

След време започнах да публикувам разказите си в първия си блог на български и реакцията на читателите беше много добра. Някои от тях бяха издадени в четири сборника: "Да победиш съдбата си", "Щастливецът", "Сънят на Уробороса" и "И Рим остана свободен". Междувременно се запознах с други български писатели. Един от тях беше Ива Касабова, с която заедно създадохме първия си роман „Да бъде приключение”. Романът беше издаден през 2013 г., имахме чудесна премиера и турне, романът бе добре приет от читателите и предизвика вниманието на медиите. В момента имам над осемдесет разказа и завършвам втория си роман.

Защо се нуждая от Вашата подкрепа?

Бих искал да представя разказите си пред по-широк кръг читатели, да разбера как се справям на световно ниво, но пиша на родния си език. Зная какво означава човек да владее добре един език и си давам сметка, че английският ми не е на нужното литературно ниво. Затова, за да мога да направя нещата професионално, трябва да наема професионален преводач от български на английски, за да могат повече хора по света да се запознаят с моите разкази, коректор, дизайнер на корицата и дизайнер за професионален сайт. Успях да наема професионален преводач за три от разказите си, които можете да прочетете на английски чрез линковете по-долу, но за останалото ми е необходима вашата подкрепа.

The Free Will

Zama

The Lucky Guy

Разказите на български можете да откриете на:

http://malkiatprintz.blogspot.com/

Защо да ме подкрепяте?

България е древна страна, в която са съществували много различни култури и неизвестни легенди. Същевременно, това е модерна страна с древни корени и въпреки проблемите на деня, успешно смесва минало и настояще. Точно това правя чрез писането си. Макар че героите ми са от различни места и времена, разказите ми са разбираеми за всекиго, независимо откъде е и къде живее. Едновременно с това, се опирам именно на тази смес от минало и настояще и имам какво да кажа с творбите си.

Как ще използвам набраните средства?

Както споменах по-горе, за да направя нещата професионално, трябва да наема професионален преводач, коректор, дизайнер за кориците и уеб-дизайнер. Ще успея сам да наема коректор и дизайнер за кориците, но за ад преведа най-добрите си разкази с приблизителна дължина от 90 000 думи, са ми необходими 9 000 USD. Осигурил съм и 1 000 USD за уеб-дизайнер, но за това не достигат още 1 500 USD, общо – 11 400 USD. Ако кампанията успее частично, ще изградя уебсайт и ще наема преводач и коректор за съответното количество разкази. Ако кампанията надхвърли търсената сума, ще мога да преведа и романа, като ще осигуря за това останалите средства.

Други начини, чрез които можете да помогнете

Ако нямате финансова възможност, но желаете да подкрепите кампанията, Ви моля да разпространите информацията за нея. Публикувайте линка към кампанията в социалните мрежи или го изпратете на свои близки и познати.

Благодаря Ви за вниманието и за подкрепата. Желая Ви приятни моменти с моите разкази.

story:
Horn of the Kraken

We at Pendelhaven publishing are very happy to announce our second Fate of the Norns novel: Horn of the Kraken. We are both excited and eagerly looking forward to publishing a line of novels that expand and decorate the mythic tapestry of the Fate of the Norns Viking universe.


The sun and moon have been devoured by the cosmic wolves casting the world into Fimbulwinter. Men prey on each other to survive. Into this world comes a war of brothers.

During the sword age of Ragnarok, the Viking apocalypse, a group of heroes must steal the Horn of the Kraken from Hakon, the bastard pretender to the throne of Norveig. This mighty and magical artifact summons a terror from the deep, and the current target is the longship fleet of Jarl Erik Bloodaxe!

Can a karl’s son unite a band of champions and face a threat that endangers the future of Midgard? 

The Norns have decreed that he is to lead a Seith witch, who is plagued by ghosts, a near giant Galdr, with the power of the Runes, a Maiden of Ratatosk, mischief shield maiden who may be more trouble than she’s worth, and an Ulfhednar, wolf warrior and master hunter.

Follow this fellowship as they embark on an epic adventure filled with danger, political intrigue, love, monsters, alliances and betrayals.


Story & Characters

The tale unfolds in western Midgard. Hakon has allied himself with the Christian King Aethelstan in order to overthrow the eldest of the late King Harald's sons- Erik Bloodaxe.

Fjorn son of Geldnir, Karl of Orkney desires nothing more than to pursue his studies as a skald in peace and defend Orkney from the forces of Hakon, bastard pretender to the thrown of Norveig. Everything changes when Fjorn learns that the man he calls father is not his sire. Now his blood ties him to a lineage encompassing Jarls and the gods; forcing him to become a hero and choose between half brothers.

The warband includes:

Sigurlina was born of a line of powerful seithkona; she was shocked into her powers at age twelve when she witnessed crusaders murdering her mother and destroying her village. Her Grandmother trained her until the old woman’s death three years later. Sigurlina’s potential outstrips her control making her a danger to herself and others. She is now the only survivor of her line charged by her ancestors with avenging them against the crusader assassins infesting the north lands.

Audun Bear Friend: drawn to study and adventure and born into a sea faring family Audun studied as a navigator form childhood and took up the study of the Runes becoming a Galdr in his mid teens. He longs to see all of Midgard and holds that faith is personal and that you must judge others by their actions not their words. He had no enemies until crusaders attacked his ship and slaughter his crew. Now he is sworn to vengeance and will use all his power both as a man and a Galdr to end the crusader’s tyranny.

Ragna, born the daughter of a Karl who sided with Aethelstan in his invasion of Wessex. In her youth she learned Latin, as well as several other languages. When she was nine the crusaders executed her father for preaching religious tolerance. She was made a thrall in her own home. Taken in a Viking raid she served in Karl Geldnir Oar Snapper’s hall where her skills with languages earned her a place in Geldnir’s confidence and later heart. When Geldnir’s beloved wife died Ragna took to his bed, but more importantly to his heart giving him something to live for. When Geldnir died Ragna was freed and sent off to Finnmark. Ragna wants a luxuriant life, sees men as play things and meal tickets, but is fiercely loyal to those who show her kindness and regard. If there is an angle you can rest assured that Ragna is working it. She distrusts almost everyone at first and hates crusaders for their hypocrisy and greed.

Vidurr: Ulfhednar, wolf warrior, raised by his pack to be as comfortable on four legs as two. An expert hunter and trapper. He was a husband, father, loyal son and follower of Surt until the crusaders burnt his village, slaughtered his kin and left his father crippled to suffer the straw death. Vidurr has nothing more to lose and has sworn revenge against the crusader scum that killed his pack. If he must, he will align himself with the Aesir followers, because the crusaders are the greater threat.

Kjorn: Sworn bondsman to Fjorn Kjorn is loyal to a fault. A competent, though unimaginative, seaman who has seen more of Midgard than most dare dream exists. Fond of a horn of mead and a good meal he is also a stalwart fighter and a semi-reformed scoundrel. Crusaders have stolen the peace of the island or Orkney where he intended to wait out his years in relative comfort. Now he is called to action again for love and loyalty and a chance at a good death.

An un-edited sample chapter is provided for your reading pleasure: http://fateofthenorns.com/stuff/Indiegogo-Final-Sample-Chapter-1.pdf


Fate of the Norns

Fate of the Norns is a Viking universe created by Andrew Valkauskas. It is packed with over 20 years of authentic and epic Viking lore. Started in 1993, it began as a table-top RPG using 10-sided dice. It faithfully incorporated Viking history and mythology all the while creating a very unique and compelling game world. In 2006 the game world had reached a revolutionary and evolutionary stage. Fate of the Norns evolved into the Ragnarok brand, with the world setting fast-forwarding to the Viking apocalypse- Ragnarok. Fate of the Norns: Ragnarok replaced dice with Futhark rune-stones in an effort to innovate the table-top RPG genre and in order to marry the game with the most evocative prop possible for a Viking game!

Since the 2012 Kickstarter, Fate of the Norns: Ragnarok has produced several new books: "Fafnir's Treasure" (126 pages of exotic locales and adventure), "Core Rulebook" (367 pages or lore encompassing both the realm of mankind as well as the realms of the gods, giants and dwarves), "Denizens of the North" (424 pages of people, locales, magic and stories all based in the realm of the Vikings- Midgard), a book devoted to the runes called "Diviner", the first novel "Seith and Sword", as well as "Gulveig", a Viking themed card game where you bid, bluff and score your way to victory. If you love everything Viking, you'll love Horn of the Kraken!

As crowdfunding backers, you will see that the reward tiers encompass a vast variety of books and games. Experience the Norse pantheon of gods and giants drawn directly from the Poetic and Prose Eddas. Take part in Viking adventures that parallel those found in the Icelandic sagas as well as the Heimskringla. Take this opportunity to snatch up some great Viking and literary bundles for your reading/playing enjoyment.

Official website: http://www.fateofthenorns.com/

Some of the pledge levels on the right will net you many more books:

Diviner: A complete guide to the Futhark rune set, including history, meaning, powers and divination.

Fafnir's Treasure: A quickstart adventure where you and your friends can go from zero to hero in an evening of fun and camaraderie.

Core Rulebook: The all-in-one book that contains everything you need to play Fate of the Norns: Ragnarok.

Horn of the Kraken artwork is brought to you by the very talented Natasa Ilincic.


About the Author

Stephen B. Pearl is an established Canadian novelist and a Pagan priest who has studied the metaphysics, magical practices and cultures of the Ancient Egyptians, Celts, Norse and, to a lesser extent, the Greeks, Romans and various other Pagan peoples. He was a member of the Society for Creative Anachronism for nine years and has fought long sword and shield, long sword, sabre, epee and foil as well as gaining proficiency with a short bow. In his time he has made suits of armour, sailed through a north Atlantic storm, on a modern ship, and worked as a professional psychic, which involved dealing with spirit entities.  He instructed classes on the use of the Norse Runes and in psychic self defense.  He brings all this and more to his writing which ranges from the science based, deep into the metaphysical without ever losing sight of the fact that the purpose of fiction is to entertain.

Official website: http://www.stephenpearl.com/
Some of the pledge levels on the right will net you many more books:

“Sorrow’s End” (short story): Love never dies, but it does evolve. A dead spouse arranges for a chance meeting of two broken hearts so they can find healing and take another chance on love.

“Yule Fire” (short story): New Lovers release the guilt of moving on; embracing new life and love.

“Seeds Sown” (short story): A couple lets go of the past to make room for the future.

“The Hollow Curse” (novel): Soul mates are cursed to be forever separated by a gulf of years and social norms until they live a life and raise a child together. The curse plays our over several lifetimes showing itself to be hollow, for love is the power beyond all powers.

“Slaves of Love” (novel): Race, an ex-cop PI, must rescue Astra, his secret love interest, from the crime syndicates of the twenty second century. He succeeds but the syndicates become aware of Race’s existence and seek revenge for an undercover mission Race performed when he was a cop.


Project Risks & Costs

We have a solid track record of writing, editing, designing and printing books; 6 successful Kickstarters funded and delivered. A sample showing you the fruits of our labour can be found here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5A6ouWJRl9k

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fcrmD69CrEA

The risk for this project is minimal, and we are likely to hit an earlier date due to the current advanced state of the manuscript.

The backer funds will go towards editing and print layout costs as well as producing artwork and maps. With your support, the Fate of the Norns world will be able to grow in scope and depth, taking the mythic and making it legendary!

comes a war of brothers.
During
the sword age of Ragnarok, the Viking apocalypse, a group of heroes
must steal the Horn of the Kraken from Hakon, the bastard pretender
to the throne of Norveig. This mighty and magical artifact summons a terror from the deep, and the current target is the longship fleet of Jarl Erik Bloodaxe!
Can a karl’s son unite a band of champions and face a threat that endangers the future of Midgard? 
The Norns have decreed that he is to lead a Seith witch, who is
plagued by ghosts, a near giant Galdr, with the power of the Runes, a Maiden of Ratatosk, mischief shield maiden who may be more
trouble than she’s worth, and an Ulfhednar, wolf warrior and master hunter.
Follow this fellowship as they embark on an epic adventure filled with danger, political intrigue, love, monsters, alliances and betrayals.




Story & Characters
 

The tale unfolds in western Midgard. Hakon has allied himself with the Christian King Aethelstan in order to overthrow the eldest of the late King Harald's sons- Erik Bloodaxe.
Fjorn son of Geldnir, Karl of Orkney
desires nothing more than to pursue his studies as a skald in peace
and defend Orkney from the forces of Hakon, bastard pretender to the
thrown of Norveig. Everything changes when Fjorn learns that the man
he calls father is not his sire. Now his blood ties him to a lineage
encompassing Jarls and the gods; forcing him to become a hero and choose between half
brothers.
The warband includes:
Sigurlina was born of a line of powerful
seithkona; she was shocked into her powers at age twelve when
she witnessed crusaders murdering her mother and destroying her
village. Her Grandmother trained her until the old woman’s death
three years later. Sigurlina’s potential outstrips her control
making her a danger to herself and others. She is now the only
survivor of her line charged by her ancestors with avenging them
against the crusader assassins infesting the north lands.
Audun Bear Friend: drawn to study and
adventure and born into a sea faring family Audun studied as a
navigator form childhood and took up the study of the Runes becoming
a Galdr in his mid teens.  He longs to see all of Midgard and holds
that faith is personal and that you must judge others by their
actions not their words. He had no enemies until crusaders attacked
his ship and slaughter his crew. Now he is sworn to vengeance and
will use all his power both as a man and a Galdr to end the
crusader’s tyranny.
Ragna, born the daughter of a Karl who
sided with Aethelstan in his invasion of Wessex. In her youth she
learned Latin, as well as several other languages. When she was nine
the crusaders executed her father for preaching religious tolerance.
She was made a thrall in her own home. Taken in a Viking raid she
served in Karl Geldnir Oar Snapper’s hall where her skills with
languages earned her a place in Geldnir’s confidence and later
heart. When Geldnir’s beloved wife died Ragna took to his bed, but
more importantly to his heart giving him something to live for. When
Geldnir died Ragna was freed and sent off to Finnmark. Ragna wants a
luxuriant life, sees men as play things and meal tickets, but is
fiercely loyal to those who show her kindness and regard. If there is
an angle you can rest assured that Ragna is working it. She distrusts
almost everyone at first and hates crusaders for their hypocrisy and
greed.
Vidurr: Ulfhednar, wolf warrior, raised
by his pack to be as comfortable on four legs as two. An expert
hunter and trapper. He was a husband, father, loyal son and follower
of Surt until the crusaders burnt his village, slaughtered his kin
and left his father crippled to suffer the straw death. Vidurr has
nothing more to lose and has sworn revenge against the crusader scum
that killed his pack. If he must, he will align himself with the Aesir followers,
because the crusaders are the greater threat.
Kjorn: Sworn bondsman to Fjorn Kjorn is
loyal to a fault. A competent, though unimaginative, seaman who has
seen more of Midgard than most dare dream exists. Fond of a horn of
mead and a good meal he is also a stalwart fighter and a
semi-reformed scoundrel. Crusaders have stolen the peace of the
island or Orkney where he intended to wait out his years in relative
comfort. Now he is called to action again for love and loyalty and a
chance at a good death.
An un-edited sample chapter is provided for your reading pleasure: http://fateofthenorns.com/stuff/Indiegogo-Final-Sample-Chapter-1.pdf

  Fate of the Norns 
Fate of the Norns is a Viking universe created by Andrew Valkauskas. It is packed with over 20 years of authentic and epic Viking lore. Started in 1993, it began as a table-top RPG using 10-sided dice. It faithfully incorporated Viking history and mythology all the while creating a very unique and compelling game world. In 2006 the game world had reached a revolutionary and evolutionary stage. Fate of the Norns evolved into the Ragnarok brand, with the world setting fast-forwarding to the Viking apocalypse- Ragnarok. Fate of the Norns: Ragnarok replaced dice with Futhark rune-stones in an effort to innovate the table-top RPG genre and in order to marry the game with the most evocative prop possible for a Viking game!
Since the 2012 Kickstarter, Fate of the Norns: Ragnarok has produced several new books: "Fafnir's Treasure" (126 pages of exotic locales and adventure), "Core Rulebook" (367 pages or lore encompassing both the realm of mankind as well as the realms of the gods, giants and dwarves), "Denizens of the North" (424 pages of people, locales, magic and stories all based in the realm of the Vikings- Midgard), a book devoted to the runes called "Diviner", the first novel "Seith and Sword", as well as "Gulveig", a Viking themed card game where you bid, bluff and score your way to victory. If you love everything Viking, you'll love Horn of the Kraken!
As crowdfunding backers, you will see that the reward tiers encompass a vast variety of books and games. Experience the Norse pantheon of gods and giants drawn directly from the Poetic and Prose Eddas. Take part in Viking adventures that parallel those found in the Icelandic sagas as well as the Heimskringla. Take this opportunity to snatch up some great Viking and literary bundles for your reading/playing enjoyment.
Official website: http://www.fateofthenorns.com/
Some of the pledge levels on the right will net you many more books:
Diviner: A complete guide to the Futhark rune set, including history, meaning, powers and divination.
Fafnir's Treasure: A quickstart adventure where you and your friends can go from zero to hero in an evening of fun and camaraderie.
Core Rulebook: The all-in-one book that contains everything you need to play Fate of the Norns: Ragnarok.
Horn of the Kraken artwork is brought to you by the very talented Natasa Ilincic.


   About the Author


Stephen B. Pearl is an established Canadian novelist and a Pagan priest who has studied the metaphysics, magical 
practices and cultures of the Ancient Egyptians, Celts, Norse and, to a lesser 
extent, the Greeks, Romans and various other Pagan peoples. He was a member of 
the Society for Creative Anachronism for nine years and has fought long sword 
and shield, long sword, sabre, epee and foil as well as gaining proficiency with 
a short bow. In his time he has made suits of armour, sailed through a north 
Atlantic storm, on a modern ship, and worked as a professional psychic, which 
involved dealing with spirit entities.  He instructed classes on the use of the 
Norse Runes and in psychic self defense.  He brings all this and more to his 
writing which ranges from the science based, deep into the metaphysical without 
ever losing sight of the fact that the purpose of fiction is to 
entertain.
Official website: http://www.stephenpearl.com/
  
Some of the pledge levels on the right will net you many more books:


“Sorrow’s End” (short story): Love never dies, but 
it does evolve. A dead spouse arranges for a chance meeting of two broken hearts 
so they can find healing and take another chance on love.
“Yule Fire” (short story): New Lovers release the 
guilt of moving on; embracing new life and love.
“Seeds Sown” (short story): A couple lets go of the 
past to make room for the future.
“The Hollow Curse” (novel): Soul mates are cursed to be forever separated by a gulf of years and social norms until they live a life and raise a child together. The curse plays our over several lifetimes showing itself to be hollow, for love is the power beyond all powers.
“Slaves of Love” (novel): Race, an ex-cop PI, must rescue Astra, his secret love interest, from the crime syndicates of the twenty second century. He succeeds but the syndicates become aware of Race’s existence and seek revenge for an undercover mission Race performed when he was a cop.

  Project Risks & Costs 

We have a solid track record of writing, editing, designing and printing books; 6 successful Kickstarters funded and delivered. A sample showing you the fruits of our labour can be found here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5A6ouWJRl9k
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fcrmD69CrEA
The risk for this project is minimal, and we are likely to hit an earlier date due to the current advanced state of the manuscript.
The backer funds will go towards editing and print layout costs as well as producing artwork and maps. With your support, the Fate of the Norns world will be able to grow in scope and depth, taking the mythic and making it legendary!

story:
Route 57: Issue 13

Hello and welcome to our campaign.

We are excited to launch our third printed edition of Route 57, the University of Sheffield's creative writing journal. 

Each copy contains 241 pages of cutting-edge creative writing, typeset and designed by Swiss studio Go! Grafik. They have created a modern, minimalist aesthetic three years running, and have created eleven striking illustrations inspired by selected lines from the journal.

These original illustrations have been made into risograph postcards and posters, so you can spread Route 57 far and wide. 

Aims

The funds raised from this campaign will go towards next year's issue, and with your help we hope to reach our target of £2000.

Supporters of the campaign will be rewarded with exciting perks. Look to the left for more details.

Why should you support our cause?

We believe strongly in facilitating accessible art. Sheffield is home to an influential creative writing scene and our publication shines a light on some of the wonderful writing this city has to offer. This is now our third print issue and all our previous issues have been made possible by crowdfunding.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't in a position to contribute, have no fear. You can still help us out by spreading the word and sharing our campaign on social media.

https://www.facebook.com/Route57UoS/

https://twitter.com/RouteFiftySeven

https://www.instagram.com/route57_13/?hl=en

story:
The Bias Magazine - A Project of the Institute for Christian Socialism

** Thanks to donations to our first IndieGoGo campaign, we were able to raise $1,810 for our writers and website needs. We're grateful for your support! We're now attempting to raise a second round of funds. **

The Bias Magazine is the inaugural project of the Institute for Christian Socialism and the premier voice of the Left in American Christianity. Cutting across the routine conventions of the Church and religious academy, we are the distinctive radical and ecumenical voice on politics, culture, economy, and environment. Your funding supports the production and labor costs for print and digital editions of The Bias. The print edition publishes twice a year, with digital content appearing regularly every week. 

We need to fundraise $5,000 to sustain and build the work we've begun. Can you consider a gift to help us grow this year?

Why The Bias? Why Now?

The Bias is designed to respond to the absence in the religious publishing landscape of a distinctive leftwing and socialist voice. The Bias will give voice to the conviction that the Christian Church and its theology cannot be accurately understood in our time apart from its material conditions. The absence of any significant representation of the political Left within the Church, academy, or religious and theological media only exacerbates these conditions. The Bias will speak to the intersection of church life and Left politics, better represent the church within the politics of the Left, and help nurture new social formations, within the church and society at large

Readers of First Things, Sojourners, and Christianity Today will find a unique voice and perspective presented in our pages, and will stand as a Christian iteration of publications like Jacobin, Catalyst, Dissent, and New Left Review, while remaining distinct enough in its format from these other programs to offer consistent brand and market differentiation.

What can I expect to find in The Bias?

The Bias will begin as a digital publication. We have begun planning to grow into a print magazine while continuing to generate quality digital content. The Bias will explore issues of politics, culture, economy, and environment from an ecumenical and radical perspective. Each published issue will present a guiding theme. For example, one issue may focus on “Race,” “The Left and Religion,” “Climate Change,” or “Labor.” While each of these themes is responsive to contemporary news cycles, the editorial voice and presentation will approach them in an “evergreen” fashion, so that every issue will be fresh and relevant for many months after initial release. This same relevance will also be sustained by the regular content posted to the magazine’s website every week.

The magazine format will allow for the publication of a number of notable voices from across the fields of contemporary theology, ethics, textual study, and religious history. Every piece published will emphasize fine writing and original, unconventional analysis of the intersection of Christianity with contemporary social, political, and cultural life. The reader can expect certain types of regular commentary, but both the print and online formats will allow for a great deal of flexibility in terms of themes, topics, and outlook. Cultural commentary, film and music criticism, and human-interest pieces will also be regular features of the magazine.

The production cycle for our print magazine will be seasonal, with new writing appearing each week online. Essays and commentary will be curated and solicited by editors overseeing topics such as:

  • Politics
  • Economics
  • Environment and ecology
  • Anti-racist and feminist movements and theory
  • The Religious Right
  • Political theology
  • History of Christian socialism
  • Film, art, and literature

What does my donation help with?

In order to make The Bias a reality, we need your support to:

  • Purchase technology and website tools to support the digital presence of The Bias
  • Compensate writers and editors for their quality work
  • Expand our artistic capacities by compensating radical artists

For this funding cycle, we need to fundraise $5,000 to sustain our initial work. If you would like to make a large gift and/or would like to explore partnership as a publisher, seminary, denominational organization, or religiously-focused philanthropy, we welcome the opportunity. Please email us at contact@christiansocialism.com.

The impact of your donation

Your contribution now makes a difference. You are helping us to establish a firm foundation forThe Bias and to develop additional material manifestations of the vision of God’s new creation: a society marked by the interdependent health of our common earthly home, the shared enjoyment of our common wealth, and the just participation of all in our common social and political life together.   

The Bias is just the start. Our Solidarity Projects and Convivia are emerging even now. The vision has its time. It will not delay.   

Other ways you can help

Every gift counts from $5 to $50 to $500.

If you can't donate today, it doesn't mean you can't help in other ways.

  • Get the word out about our fundraising campaign by sharing with your networks
  • Help connect us with organizers, ministers, theologians, and other workers at the intersection of Christianity and left politics
  • If you are interested in working with ICS, The Bias, and especially if you'd like to write for us, please send an email with "Contributor" in the subject line to editor@christiansocialism.com

In Solidarity!

story:
Story of My Book

Practical Happiness comes from the collected knowledge and experience of over 39 years of working with individuals and companies to bring about their maximum performance and efficiency. This book includes many of the tools and techniques I teach to my clients every day.

Many of you who know me have indicated that as soon as this book was done, you wished to purchase one of the first copies. Here is your chance!

---

My name is Dale Kershner, and I am the author of Practical Happiness. I wrote this book because there are a lot of people out there who are having a difficult time remaining up beat and happy during our current times. Due to the pandemic, folks have a heightened sense of isolation, loneliness, despair, and depression. This book provides practical, real life tools and techniques to create happiness and optimism wherever and when ever you wish to. 

Practical Happiness brings you to the reality that happiness is not a result of your environment, but a conscious or unconscious creation of the individual. In addition, the book provides several habits to take on that will help ensure that your life will be a more ready place for happiness and tranquility.


This book is for anyone who has struggled to be optimistic and happy. For people who are interested in taking control of the way they choose to interact with the challenges presented to them in society. The pathway is simple, but perhaps not altogether easy. If you are up to the challenge, read on.

The Book - Practical Happiness

The book is written in 23 easy to read chapters:

Practical Happiness begins with the premise that our emotions are some we invent. Sometimes we are aware of the creation, sometime we create them because we have formed habits of emotion.

The book then explores various aspects of a happy life and how to modify your emotional responses using neuroplasticity and behavioral repetition. Most chapters include both the discussion of the behavior as well as an action to take to modify your choices to comply with the life you wish to create.

This book is life altering.

 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with Blooming Twig Publishing. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing this book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

The editor I am working with to revise and publish my book in December 2020.

The cover design of my book (the mockups you see currently are a placeholder)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats)

The launch and promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.

Creation of the E-learning site in conjunction with the book to facilitate the chapter homework.

Creation of the Joy Society site. A social network for consumers of practical happiness


When I raise $5,000, I will publish. 

When I raise $6,000, I will publish the audiobook. 

When I raise $8,000, I will create the e-learning site.

When I raise $10,000, I will launch the Joy Society social network.
 

 

About the Author


For more information you can connect with Dale at Dale@DaleKershner.com, on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.


Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backers, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with Blooming Twig to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
 

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #PracticalHappiness and tag me as well as my publisher, Blooming Twig Publishing, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to five friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or direct message on social media.


Thank you so much for of all of your trust, love and support!

All my best,
Dale

story:
"This Handbook is like Wikipedia for Biomimicry and Nature-Inspired Design..."- Yanko Design

"This visual reference book for designers includes hundreds of forms, patterns, and colors extracted from natural things like fruits, veggies, insects, fish, and more, providing a new source of creative inspiration..."-The Awesomer 

The Nature of Form won The Design Intelligence Award (DIA) 2020, and  got placed in DIA TOP 100 list.

Designed to do for nature-inspired design what the Pantone Shade Card did for colors, the Nature of Form handbook captures and carefully documents as many as 1454 forms, patterns, and colors, all pulled from flora and fauna.

 

The book was created by a group of multidisciplinary designers to act as exhaustive reference material for biomimetic design. By breaking down a variety of natural examples by form, pattern/texture, and color, the handbook puts all the nature-based form inspiration you need at your very fingertips. Created to help designers and artists across multiple disciplines, the book painstakingly documents a variety of plants and animals, creating an easy-to-access database of their forms, patterns, and dominant colors. These examples could save you hours of research on Wikipedia or Pinterest (or any other place you go for research) by simply giving you a sort of Yellow-Pages of organic design. 

 

 

The book’s multiple examples come with images, forms, silhouettes, color values and palettes, and even physical attributes that help spark the imagination and get those creative juices flowing. Whether you’re an industrial or transportation designer looking for aesthetic cues, or a graphic designer looking for patterns, logo inspiration, or even color palettes, the Nature of Form puts a veritable encyclopedia of nature-inspired design in the palm of your hand.

 

“Nature of Form for Designers” is a self-published design book co-created by UDLAB and distributed by Fablab Innovation, USA. Designed to be a go-to reference book, Nature of Form makes it easy to conceptualize, detail, and design effective and aesthetic products by tapping into the world’s largest design database… Nature itself

 

This book features an exclusive original collection of Forms, Textures & Colors, derived from Nature. The forms are classified into characteristic attributes as well. We reckon nifty use of this data in the fields of Product Design, Graphic Design, Textile Design, Fashion Design, Transportation Design, Animation, Artistry, other Creative disciplines, & certainly, by an Inquisitive Individual.

 

We are building a system that looks at form development from a new perspective. This product is one of its kind, inception never seen or heard of before. It's indigenous, it's disruptive and moreover, the best part is it powers the originality within a person. This product is one, but many at the same time. It makes you wonder. Each reader can manifest their own meaning into it, giving us the possibility of numerous derivatives from one single book.  We bring to you an avant-garde subject, the ‘Nature of Form’, and the assets we fabricated with much diligence.

Inside the Book: A collection of extractions of Organic Elements from Nature into Forms, Textures, and Colors. Total: 1454 Entities, 432 forms + 231 Patterns +791 colors

 

On top of our Nature of Form design theme, for every design book we sell, we will plant a tree through One Tree Planted, a nonprofit organization dedicated to the reforestation of our planet! 

Featured On

 

 

 

Book Specs

The 192-page publication intends to inspire and teach designers how to use various natural metaphors in the Design. The use of the derived elements is up to the designers, whether they want to use them in various designs, ideation, sketching, drawing, 3d modeling, 3d patterns, or something entirely anew. The elements can be used in fields of furniture, lighting, product design, fashion, automotive, styling, architecture, typography, etc.

The book consists of 150 organic elements, classified into 10 categories.

Flowers x 12

Aquatic Animals x 16

Vegetables x 20

Land Animals x 13

Non-Living x 12

Insects x 18

Leaves x 16

Fruits x 19

Birds x 15

Trees & Plants x 9

 

 

 

 

The Book is subjective to the context of its use. To say, if you're

A product designer, you may use the forms and textures of the Starfish in creating a grip texture on your products. Or Shape for various products design.

A graphic designer, you may find the color schemes and the textures useful in producing good illustrations and compositions.

An automotive designer, you may use the attributes to find the power curves for your next automobile sketch.

A textile designer, you may find the naturally coupled color theme and the symmetrical forms of the Starfish to tessellate and create a spread.

a UI/ UX designer, you can use the color themes to contextually generate a more realistic web experience.

An Engineer/ a Modeler, you can feed your creative end by converting the 3D textures into meshwork and derive stress and strength parameters.

A Student, You can use for your science projects to various artwork project.

It simply makes your process of inspiration hunt easier. The aforementioned users are from our limited source of knowledge. The uniqueness of this product lies in the fact that it is one, but many at the same time. The reader can manifest his/ her/ their own meaning into it.

 

Since its genesis, we have devoted around 3780 hours into making Nature of Form what you see today as a finished(pilot) product.

In the full length of 325 days, there were around 250 thousand strokes drawn.

Around 2,200 selective forms were digitized out of the many that were manually drawn.

The conclusion/ upshot of all that rigorous exercise was the achievement of  432 forms, 231 Patterns, and 791 colors.

We further comprehended all the forms between 9 attributes, by linking a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 5 attributes to each form.

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

If you like the FAB LAB INNOVATION BRANDED PRODUCTS, the only risk you're bearing is that of missing out on a true piece of delight by not backing it! On a serious note, as with any new project, designing, printing, and shipping has many moving parts. We have a great team that is very experienced in the details of creating and delivering a high-quality product; they are dedicated to making this project a success. We have thoroughly researched and worked with a very good professional vendor. We are working with an incredible manufacturing partner and feel confident in the work they will produce for our backers. We understand the unique challenges that come with this type of product and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that may arise.

story:
About the Deck

The Wisdom of the Serpent Oracle Deck is filled with transformative guidance drawn from the unique characteristics, behaviors, and mythologies of the world's serpents.  This deck is easy to connect with right out of the box.  You can choose to use the accompanying guidebook—which will offer both information about each serpent and its behavioral characteristics, and guidance based on those characteristics—or not. The cards will guide you regardless.

  • 52 beautiful collage-style cards that work together to offer wisdom and guidance for life and its various challenges.
  • Independently produced by the deck’s creator.  This deck will not be sold on Amazon.
  • 3” x 5” Premium 300gsm cardstock with smooth finish.
  • Sturdy 2-piece box if we reach the goal of 500+ decks.
  • Made in the U.S.A.
  • Eco-friendly packaging (no plastic shrink-wrap).
  • Made with love and divine guidance by a creator who is passionate about helping others along their paths to creating and living a life they love.

The Energy of the Wisdom of the Serpent

  • Snakes often elicit fear but they are truly wondrous beings from whom we can learn a great deal about transformation and shedding what no longer serves us just as serpents shed their skin so they can grow and evolve. 
  • The serpents chosen for this deck are those whose characteristics, behaviors, and mythologies present a window into our own lives.  By looking within and recognizing how the serpents’ wisdom can assist us we, too, can grow and evolve by shedding what no longer serves us in our lives.
  • The collage colors chosen to accompany each serpent symbolize emotions and intuition evoked by the serpent, its colors, and its characteristics.
  • Serpent wisdom can assist us with our own spiritual journeys, both within and in the world, and can help with shadow work, spiritual enlightenment, and being of service to others.  Most important, serpent wisdom can facilitate loving ourselves and our own unique characteristics, quirks, and idiosyncracies.

What I Need and What You Get

In order to birth this deck into reality:

  • $17,500 funding will pay for copyright, licensing, and use of the serpent images, printing costs for the cards that include hard-copy proofs, two-piece boxes, printing of the guidebook, shipping costs, and labor. 
  • There are two individual perks--a signed 8x11 professional quality print of the King Cobra card signed by the creator and a 30-minute face-to-face individual reading using the deck--as well as a perk that combines the two.
  • If we don’t reach the goal, decks will still be printed, however we will not get the two-piece boxes because a minimum order of 500 is required for that.  Funding will still pay for the use of the images, the decks, and the guidebooks.  Two-piece boxes will be substituted with tuck-boxes (like what a typical deck of playing cards comes in), which can be included regardless of the number of decks funded.

The Impact

By contributing to this campaign, you will enable the creator to embark on her dream of becoming a spiritual entrepreneur and dedicating herself to helping others build and live a life they love living:

  • “The planet doesn’t need more successful people.  The world desperately needs more peacemakers, healers, restorers, storytellers, and lovers of all kinds.” ~Dalai Lama
  • My 25-year award-winning academic career as a college professor has provided me with the unique skills to teach, guide, and mentor others.  This project will allow me to do this in a much more meaningful way.
  • A successful campaign will enable me to leave the corporate/academic rate race and truly dedicate myself to making a difference in the world by helping others survive and thrive in these uncertain times.

Risks & Challenges

The risks and challenges associated with this campaign are simply getting the word out about the deck and generating interest and excitement.

  • I currently have a large Instagram following of people who enjoy my daily tarot and oracle readings. 
  • I will leverage my social media presence to generate interest and to share progress throughout the deck’s creation.
  • I will create this deck whether or not this campaign is successful.  The only question will be whether I can secure enough funding to recoup the expenses I have already incurred (licensing fees for the images, as well as time and labor spent creating each beautiful card).

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that in the current political and economic climate, many of you just can't contribute.  But that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please spread the word about this deck and make some noise about my campaign to help me generate interest and excitement.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to help me spread the word!

About the Creator

 

I am an extremely left-leaning hippie liberal feminist who has friends and relatives from all walks of life, all political leanings, and all religious backgrounds.  I have been a college professor for twenty-five years.  My scholarship and teaching have focused on two distinct areas:  1) images and impact of women and minorities in American media, and 2) women’s political rhetoric, specifically the rhetorical activities of Eleanor Roosevelt.  I have received awards and recognition throughout my career, both as a teacher and a scholar.  My students have always appreciated my open-mindedness and my willingness to help others, to guide them, to mentor them, to always be open and inclusive, and to provide a safe space for them to grow and become their authentic selves.  I now want to do the same in the real world, free from the politics of the academy.

My father was a chemist who had always dreamed of being a herpetologist, so I grew up in a house filled with a variety of creatures including snakes, lizards, rodents, cats, and dogs.  From kindergarten through second grade, I had a pet rat named Chipper Sunshine that I adored.  I'm a crazy cat lady and have had cats for as long as I can remember.  More recently, I had a ball python named Milena, a bearded dragon named Isis, and a chameleon named Camille.  I currently have a Calico cat named Cleopatra and an American Bully (related to pit bulls but not a terrier) named Riley.  I love all the world’s creatures and believe that we would do well to better understand and preserve the animal kingdom.

I am not an artist in the traditional sense.  I am a creator.  I have a B.A. in Theatre and dreamed of a Broadway and Hollywood career, but my son was born on the first day of my final undergraduate semester and, being a single mother, I quickly realized how expensive kids are and knew that living the life of a starving artist was not what I wanted for my son.  So I pivoted and chose a different career path that still allowed me to share my talents and to be in front of people (except I got to be smart, too, without being criticized for it).  My son is now a Board-Certified Chiropractor with advanced certification in Chiropractic BioPhysics, living and practicing at 100% Chiropractic in Tampa, Florida.  If you need a chiropractor, go see him!! :) And now that he is successful in his own career, I have the opportunity to follow a path that is more aligned with my spiritual goals and life purpose.  I am a teacher and always will be; it’s innate.  But I want to use my skills and talents differently.  And I want to be able to channel my creative talents, something I have not been able to do in academia.

I have been practicing tarot and oracle for many years and there are many fantastic decks out there but none focus exclusively on the wisdom of serpents.  Snakes are truly unique creatures, some venomous, some docile, some large, some small, some bright and colorful, and some bland.  But all are remarkable and each has its own behavioral quirks. I will soon have another Ball Python and I hope to obtain a license and certificate to own an Eastern Indigo.

By contributing to this campaign, you will allow me to birth this deck into the world and share a unique perspective on spiritual transformation that is currently lacking.  This deck will guide users through a unique transformative experience, one I have experienced myself. This deck can be used individually or in combination with other oracle or tarot decks.  Not everybody understands oracle cards.  Tarot and oracle cards are not dark magic.  They are simply tools for self-realization and self-actualization that provide cues and clues to help us identify our own inner thoughts, experiences, and dreams.

My dream is to be of service to others live a life they love living and one way I can do that is by creating this deck to help guide them on their path.
