story:
Globally every 39 Seconds someone dies by Suicide!

By the time you finish reading this campaign, eight more people have ended their lives. 

To this very day I still have battles with thoughts of suicide. However, with Just One Reason by my side I am a survivor! It is my own personal mission to share with you my story what continues to save my life in those crucial dark moments, so that other lives can be saved.

In the days and months after my first encounter with suicide, it dawned on me to ask the question why I did not end my life. In my darkest hour, I became aware of just one reason why I was not ready to leave this planet. At the time, my reason seemed a little crazy. However, Just One Reason was enough! 

 

What a HUGE little book! B Goldman NSW

 

Over the next few years each time the rollercoaster of depression and sadness had me at another tipping point, I would discover a new reason not to end my life. This became a pattern. This easily learned strategy keeps me alive to this day! 

I realised if this works for me, it can work for anybody. And it does! 

I now need to share this simple solution with the world. So, I have poured my heart out, bared my soul, agonised over the content, the photos, my fears of what if the book fails, what if my kids do not like it and five years later, this book is now a reality! 

 

And what a powerful little book it is! 

 

Only 20% of the worlds population can read english! 

In March this year Covid-19 struck. A blunt realisation sadly set in for me. Not everyone who considers suicide can read English. This book needs to go global urgently and be translated into AS MANY LANGUAGES AS POSSIBLE!  This simple technique is so easy to learn it now needs to be shared in as many languages as possible!

 

Gave one to my 21-year-old son who suffers from depression. He just came around to tell me how much the book is helping him, and he is feeling much more positive in his outlook.

J Shugg NSW

 

THE PROBLEM:

 

Suicide is a global problem. Just One Reason is a Global Solution!!

 

Covid-19 has brought the world to a standstill; the horrendous side effects continue. Suicides directly related to Covid-19 are soaring internationally all around the globe. Every neighbourhood near you will have people thinking about suicide! It really is a silent and deadly problem!

 

Suicide prevention needs YOUR help! 

Just One Reason is a powerful and practical tool, designed to keep people alive.

 

 

THE SOLUTION:

Translation is a very costly process. Firstly, a language gets translated from one language to another, then it has to be reverse translated independently to make sure it is accurate. I never thought in my wildest dreams this little lifesaver of a book would have the potential to help millions of people around the world. I’ve been an Australian Surf Lifesaver for over 35 years. I never thought I could have a global impact, saving lives away from the beach.

To get started, it is my goal to translate this desperately needed book into French, German, Japanese, Russian, Arabic, Spanish, Mandarin, even Bulgarian.

There is not a country or culture in the world that is immune from suicide. 

Just One Reason teaches you in less than 10 minutes, how to discover your one reason to live. The book is designed to be small in size so you can take it with you, wherever you go. You never know when you might need it to get you through to the next day.

 

The English edition is printed, in stock and ready to be shipped worldwide. 

By supporting this campaign, YOU are helping to save lives!!

 

 

THE PERKS:

There are numerous choices of perks. Every multiple book order includes EXTRA FREE COPIES of the book. You will be amazed, just as I have been, how appreciative people are to receive this book! It’s likely the most powerful self-help book ever created! And best of all it can be easily read in in the time it takes to have a coffee... by anyone... who can read English!

The book is written from my lived experience, so it is very easy to digest.

If you can afford a large order of books but are unsure where to distribute, we can help. Globally, frontline emergency workers are in a suicide crisis. Paramedics, nurses, firepersons, doctors, police are taking their lives more than any time in history. 

The stress of Covid-19 is taking a huge toll. 

Every person supporting this translation campaign will be contacted by me personally. I can dispatch your books as per your request.

You may choose to have the books donated to a local school, a hospital, or an emergency department in your community, the ultimate choice is yours. 

It has never been more important than now to help save a life! Please select a donation right now and rest assured you have played a huge part in saving someone’s life.

 

What your funding supports:

  • Translation of the book into multiple languages
  • Once our goal is 50% complete, the translations will commence.
  • Individual cover design for each language
  • ISBN for each language
  • Production, printing and distribution
  • Strategic online marketing
  • An aggressive PR strategy
  • Events to raise awareness

 

The more we can raise, the QUICKER we can promote this solution and ultimately save lives on a global scale. 

 

 

The impact:

  • Every book can save a life 
  • Once our goal is 50% complete, the translations will commence.
  • A low-cost global solution
  • Distribution to community centres, libraries, schools, hospitals, workplaces, sports clubs and emergency departments
  • The reader becomes their own medicine
  • Translate the book into many languages, making the book more accessible to more people

 

Risks:

  • The risks have been eliminated. The first book is already written, produced and funded 100% by me. 
  • Zero! I deliver! I've been getting the job done!!
  • I am passionate about leading global change on suicide prevention. 

 

Your support goes beyond the great perks you receive. Your support also includes sharing this campaign, book and video everywhere with everyone you know. An easy way to achieve this is through the Indiegogo share tools provided, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and of course word of mouth! 

 

What you will receive: 

  • A signed copy of the book with every order shipped immediately!

 

 

Amazing Feedback in first 7 days of release.

Gave one to my 21-year-old son who suffers from depression. He just came around to tell me how much the book is helping him, and he is feeling much more positive in his outlook.

J Shugg NSW

 

What a HUGE little book!

B Goldman NSW

 

The book is like magic! I have just read each and every page! A gem of a book Stuart. Absolutely amazing!

Meggsie NSW

 

Raw and unfiltered. A powerful practical tool! 

Dr Scott Pearson - B Med, MD, DCH, FRACG, General Practitioner

 

Most people find writing very therapeutic but don’t actually get around to it! Having this book right in your pocket removes that barrier. It’s so good!

S Radford QLD - Mental Health Support Worker

 

 

My Story

A number of years ago when I was in my darkest hours and suicide seemed the best solution, I discovered a simple technique that I soon relied upon week in week out that kept me alive. For five years I wondered over and over, why is suicide increasing and why hasn’t there been a miracle solution? Then along came another mental breakdown for me combined with agonising physical pain, I again reached for my simple technique! 

Just One Reason is now a suicide prevention and rescue toolkit designed to get a person past the dangerous hour where impulse overtakes reason.

This simple and powerful solution is only a 10-15 minute read, pocket sized so it can be on hand to be read over and over again. When people are in their hour of need there is no time to read a 300-page self-help book. Perhaps there is no one around to call.  This pocket-sized book is now your survival buddy who you can talk to 24/7 and carry with you wherever you go. Its pocket size is also intentional so the book can be kept discreet while reading and discreetly given to someone you feel can benefit from Just One Reason. 

In 1985 I first became an Australian Surf Lifesaver. My passion for helping others and serving my community is still with me today. 

In January after yet another bout with the dark spaces, I finally mustered the courage  to bring my book and lifesaving technique into reality. Through my local surf club, a friend’s daughter helped bring the book to its first draft and the journey has continued on. 

Making the book affordable literally means hundreds of thousands of lives can be saved annually around the world by having access to the most cost-effective suicide prevention toolkit in the world EVER!

Whether you help with one book or one thousand books, every book will help save a life somewhere. This book when you receive it, you will realise it has been designed to be robust and last a lifetime with its stiff outer cover wrapped in linen. 

Your help today will contribute to the book being translated into multiple languages. As the crowdfunding campaign takes life, it will mean books can start to be circulated globally. 

 

Once our goal is 50% complete, the translations will commence 

 

In Australia and likely other parts of the world there is an old saying "if you want something done - give it to a busy person". This describes me to a tee. I am one of those people that simply rolls up my sleeves and gets things done! Translation of Just One Reason is my next project and I cannot wait to see books being circulated around the world. Once Covid-19 restrictions are lifted, I look forward to also sharing my story and technique far and wide in person. 

If you have read this far, I am honoured you gave me your precious time. I will be equally honoured if you continue this campaign with me. If the timing is not right for you right now to fund a quantity of books, you can still help immensely by sharing this campaign with your social media friends and family. 

Thank you,
Stuart ONeill
story_txt:
Globally every 39 Seconds someone dies by Suicide!By the time you finish reading this campaign, eight more people have ended their lives. To this very day I still have battles with thoughts of suicide. However, with Just One Reason by my side I am a survivor! It is my own personal mission to share with you my story what continues to save my life in those crucial dark moments, so that other lives can be saved.In the days and months after my first encounter with suicide, it dawned on me to ask the question why I did not end my life. In my darkest hour, I became aware of just one reason why I was not ready to leave this planet. At the time, my reason seemed a little crazy. However, Just One Reason was enough!  What a HUGE little book! B Goldman NSW Over the next few years each time the rollercoaster of depression and sadness had me at another tipping point, I would discover a new reason not to end my life. This became a pattern. This easily learned strategy keeps me alive to this day! I realised if this works for me, it can work for anybody. And it does! I now need to share this simple solution with the world. So, I have poured my heart out, bared my soul, agonised over the content, the photos, my fears of what if the book fails, what if my kids do not like it and five years later, this book is now a reality!  And what a powerful little book it is!  Only 20% of the worlds population can read english! In March this year Covid-19 struck. A blunt realisation sadly set in for me. Not everyone who considers suicide can read English. This book needs to go global urgently and be translated into AS MANY LANGUAGES AS POSSIBLE!  This simple technique is so easy to learn it now needs to be shared in as many languages as possible! Gave one to my 21-year-old son who suffers from depression. He just came around to tell me how much the book is helping him, and he is feeling much more positive in his outlook.J Shugg NSW THE PROBLEM: Suicide is a global problem. Just One Reason is a Global Solution!! Covid-19 has brought the world to a standstill; the horrendous side effects continue. Suicides directly related to Covid-19 are soaring internationally all around the globe. Every neighbourhood near you will have people thinking about suicide! It really is a silent and deadly problem! Suicide prevention needs YOUR help! Just One Reason is a powerful and practical tool, designed to keep people alive.  THE SOLUTION:Translation is a very costly process. Firstly, a language gets translated from one language to another, then it has to be reverse translated independently to make sure it is accurate. I never thought in my wildest dreams this little lifesaver of a book would have the potential to help millions of people around the world. I’ve been an Australian Surf Lifesaver for over 35 years. I never thought I could have a global impact, saving lives away from the beach.To get started, it is my goal to translate this desperately needed book into French, German, Japanese, Russian, Arabic, Spanish, Mandarin, even Bulgarian. There is not a country or culture in the world that is immune from suicide. Just One Reason teaches you in less than 10 minutes, how to discover your one reason to live. The book is designed to be small in size so you can take it with you, wherever you go. You never know when you might need it to get you through to the next day. The English edition is printed, in stock and ready to be shipped worldwide. By supporting this campaign, YOU are helping to save lives!!  THE PERKS:There are numerous choices of perks. Every multiple book order includes EXTRA FREE COPIES of the book. You will be amazed, just as I have been, how appreciative people are to receive this book! It’s likely the most powerful self-help book ever created! And best of all it can be easily read in in the time it takes to have a coffee... by anyone... who can read English!The book is written from my lived experience, so it is very easy to digest.If you can afford a large order of books but are unsure where to distribute, we can help. Globally, frontline emergency workers are in a suicide crisis. Paramedics, nurses, firepersons, doctors, police are taking their lives more than any time in history. The stress of Covid-19 is taking a huge toll. Every person supporting this translation campaign will be contacted by me personally. I can dispatch your books as per your request.You may choose to have the books donated to a local school, a hospital, or an emergency department in your community, the ultimate choice is yours. It has never been more important than now to help save a life! Please select a donation right now and rest assured you have played a huge part in saving someone’s life. What your funding supports:
Translation of the book into multiple languages
Once our goal is 50% complete, the translations will commence.
Individual cover design for each language
ISBN for each language
Production, printing and distribution
Strategic online marketing
An aggressive PR strategy
Events to raise awareness
 The more we can raise, the QUICKER we can promote this solution and ultimately save lives on a global scale.   The impact:
Every book can save a life 
Once our goal is 50% complete, the translations will commence.
A low-cost global solution
Distribution to community centres, libraries, schools, hospitals, workplaces, sports clubs and emergency departments
The reader becomes their own medicine
Translate the book into many languages, making the book more accessible to more people
 Risks:
The risks have been eliminated. The first book is already written, produced and funded 100% by me. 
Zero! I deliver! I've been getting the job done!!
I am passionate about leading global change on suicide prevention. 
 Your support goes beyond the great perks you receive. Your support also includes sharing this campaign, book and video everywhere with everyone you know. An easy way to achieve this is through the Indiegogo share tools provided, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and of course word of mouth!  What you will receive: A signed copy of the book with every order shipped immediately!  Amazing Feedback in first 7 days of release.Gave one to my 21-year-old son who suffers from depression. I have just read each and every page! A gem of a book Stuart. Absolutely amazing!Meggsie NSW Raw and unfiltered. A powerful practical tool! Dr Scott Pearson - B Med, MD, DCH, FRACG, General Practitioner Most people find writing very therapeutic but don’t actually get around to it! story:
About the Story

Not so long ago, I knew the path my life would take. Housewife. Mother. A noble calling, yet predictable, ordinary.

Then out of nowhere came a strange proposal...innocent...intriguing. Abruptly, my course was altered, whisking me from the security I'd always known to a new town, another life far from home. As I struggled to hold to my end of the agreement, I didn't see that all I loved was slowly crumbling.

Wings in the Storm is the true story of mistakes realized too late, of everything lost, of the fight to get it back, and of rebuilding a life far different from before. It delves deep into frailties and vulnerabilities, yet it’s peppered with touching moments, valued friendships, humorous stories, and glimpses at the everyday beauty that surrounds us. From dark beginning to uplifting ending, it explores the defeats, victories, scars, healing, and richness that have come from my walk through brokenness.

 

Why It Matters

Yet, at the core of the book are struggles not unique to me. People everywhere have gone through hardships that set them spinning and changed their lives forever.

Early Wings in the Storm readers say they were captivated by the story and refreshed by its raw honesty about doubts and questions they, too, faced. More importantly, they found strength and encouragement in the truths reflected throughout its chapters.

This book is for anyone who’s endured heartache or loss. For anyone who knows someone who’s hurting. For anyone who enjoys a real-life story that’s sure to entertain, uplift, and challenge.

Come with me on the adventure. Chances are, you’ll find yourself somewhere in the pages of Wings in the Storm.

 

How You Can Be Part of the Story

But before you can make it yours, this book has to be published; and getting it from manuscript to print is a process of great investment, both time and money. That’s where you come into the story.

Help me publish Wings in the Storm. Contribute today, and be one of the first to own a copy, or be among the few to own a signed hardcover edition. Click on the perks at the right to read their descriptions, and choose the one that best benefits you as well as this project. Choose your favourite, or back the project without a perk. Either way, when you contribute, you help bring Wings in the Storm to life.

And while you're browsing, keep in mind, shipping to Canada and the US is already included in the price, and shipping worldwide starts at only an additional $10.

Thank you for your gracious support.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether or not you’re able to contribute, please tell your family, friends, and contacts about Wings in the Storm. Invite them to the campaign via the link at the top of this page. And please share the campaign on your social media networks using the share tools at the top of this page.

Thank you for helping spread the word.

 

Where Does the Money Go?

The Wings in the Storm campaign is raising funds to cover publishing costs, including

  • book cover design
  • back cover copy
  • interior layout
  • revisions
  • online distribution
  • shipping

If the goal is exceeded, additional funds raised will go to furthering production and promotion, such as

  • editing
  • printing
  • marketing
  • travel expenses

 

Risks

Risk to you is minimal. Wings in the Storm is already in the hands of a professional publisher; publication is already set for February 24, 2021. However, there’s always a chance something unforeseen could hinder production. I’ll update you immediately if publication or shipping dates change. Should an item in your perk become unavailable (excluding limited-numbered perks that have sold out), I'll contact you to offer an appropriate substitute.

If you need help regarding your contribution or your perks, you can reach me at wingsinthestorm@outlook.com.   

 

About the Author & the Book 

I'm Sandra Grace, author of Wings in the Storm.

In my early elementary school years, I dreaded creative writing assignments. I just didn’t get it. One day, my third-grade teacher asked us to write a story about a time machine—we could step back into the past or race ahead to the future. The idea intrigued me. Creativity sparked to life, and my pencil flew across the page. My pre-historic adventure surprised my teacher, and her encouragements that day started my life-long love of writing.

Wings in the Storm is my first creative non-fiction book. It started over seven years ago with a bus ride that forever changed my life. In those beginning days, alone and determined, I knew something big was coming. I wanted to write the story. I just didn’t know what the story was yet.

So I kept journals and letters to record one event after another. Life happened, and piece by piece, my story came together, rich and colourful; and it begged to be written. When I finally sat down at the keyboard, it all spilled out as I relived it.

For a year, this book was my full-time job, and I’m excited about the finished product.

Experience it for yourself. I hope you enjoy reading Wings in the Storm as much as I enjoyed writing it for you.

I'd love to hear from you. Please use the "comment" button at the top of this page, or contact me privately at wingsinthestorm@outlook.com

story:
Nutzen für die Leserschaft:

  1. Erfolgsversprechende Lösungen zur Belebung der Bergregionen werden präsentiert, z.B. die Erfolgschance für den Alleingang versus eine Allianz der grössten Ferienorte werden verglichen;
  2. Eine neue Art von Wirtschaften wird dargestellt, worin Wertgenerierung zugunsten der Umwelt und Communities die Erfolgsbasis bildet. Eine kleine Illustration davon: Abfall auf dem Berghang wird im Sommer in einer festlichen Stimmung unter Freiwilligen gesammelt und durch eine lokale Künstlerin für eine Ausstellung im Kunstmuseum des Dorfes verwendet; 
  3. Das Buch dient als eine Art Kochbuch, womit jedes Unternehmen in jeder Branche ihr eigenes Erfolgsrezept ableiten kann aus einer individuell bestimmten Mischung im Kunden-Angebot von Status, Allrounder-Nutzen, Variabilität, Lifestyle und Sinngebung.

 

Erfolgsgründen / Verwendung:

  1. Das Buch stützt sich auf Recherchen zum Bergmarkt in Graubünden mit Fokus auf die Erfolgsgeschichte der Weissen Arena Gruppe und Reto Gurtner in Flims Laax Falera. Eine Kostprobe: Die entscheidenden Rollen der Digitalisierung sowie einer Personalführung, worin Mitarbeitenden über die eigenen Grenzen wachsen, werden erläutert;
  2. Die Erfolgsfaktoren werden identifiziert durch die Anwendung meines bewährten Rahmenwerkes namens 5-D Wert Management, welches schon in Büchern zu Amazon und Autofirmen verwendet worden ist. Als Illustration: das grösste Kundensegment im Markt zieht aufgrund ihrer über die Familien-Generationen hinaus aufgebauten Präferenzen den Allrounder-Nutzen von Davos/Klosters vor. Für mehr zu diesem Rahmenwerk siehe www.5dvalue.com;
  3. Eine Vielzahl an Personen und Organisationen werden sich für das Buch interessieren:
  • Unternehmer sowie Führungs- und Fachpersonen werden das Buch als Quelle von Ideen für das eigene Geschäft schätzen;
  • Kantonalämter, Gemeinden und Politiker werden das Buch in ihrer Entscheidungsfindung zur Wirtschaftspolitik mitberücksichtigen;
  • Tourismusvereine und NGOs werden Ansätze zu einer verantwortungsvollen Belebung der Bergregionen aus dem Buch ableiten können;
  • Studierende und Professoren in Betriebswirtschaftslehre und Tourismus werden die methodischen Ansätze und Erfolgsbeispiele im Buch in ihrem Fachstudium integrieren.

Die Crowdfunding-Kampagne ist der erste Schritt in einem systematischen Vermarktungsplan – inkl. Social Medien, Printmedien und der Bearbeitung von Buchhandlungen - welche Aufmerksamkeit auf das Buch ziehen und Interesse daran wecken wird. 

 

Warum das Buch

Bergregionen stehen heute vor mehreren Herausforderungen, z.B. fehlenden wirtschaftlichen Perspektiven, Einwohnerschwund und Klimawandel. Als Kind in Amerika war ich von den Bergen fasziniert und besitze seit 25 Jahren eine Zweitwohnung in den Alpen. Ich identifiziere mich sehr stark mit ihnen und will die Region beim Meistern der Herausforderungen unterstützen. 

Das Buch bietet viele originelle Lösungen für meine geliebten Bergregionen, um sich in der rasch wandelnden Wirtschaft und der dynamischen Gesellschaft zu behaupten. Plakativ ausgedrückt, der Antrieb zum schonenden Wachstum liegt nicht „auf dem Berg“ sondern „im Tal“; beispielsweise: 

  • Aufbau von sogenannten MICE-Anlässen – Meetings, Incentives, Conferences und Exhibitions – für Geschäftskunden gefördert durch innovative Digitallösungen, welche die Abläufe der B2B-Kundschaft erheblich erleichtern und die Erlebnisse bereichern; 
  • Gruppierung von nahliegenden Ferienorten in einem Regionalverbund, die dadurch erfolgte Ressourcenteilung  würde Kosten senken und durch die Weiterentwicklung der Alleinstellungsmerkmale jedes Dorfes die Attraktivität des diversifizierten, jedoch vereinten Verbundes und somit die Umsätze gesteigert werden;
  • Aufbau von Arbeits- und Wohnplätzen, welche durch die Verschmelzung der Grenzen zwischen Arbeits-, Frei- und Ferienzeit die Menschen anziehen.

Wirtschaft und Gesellschaft allgemein stehen vor gewaltigen Herausforderungen. Die im Buch geschilderte neue Art von Wirtschaften ist eine wichtige Antwort zu vielen verbreiteten Herausforderungen heute. Zur Illustration davon:

  • Alle bekennen sich zur Nachhaltigkeit, während die Weisse Arena Gruppe den Weg in die Zukunft mit einem Stretch Target zeigt: der erste selbstversorgende Ferienort in den Alpen zu werden. Dafür steht einen umfassenden 7-Punkte-Plan. Dass Nachhaltigkeit und die damit verbundene Förderung der Biodiversität zentral zum Firmenverständnis sind, wird durch die Verleihung einer Markenname – Greenstyle – als Kennzeichnung für sämtliche solche Aktivitäten unterstrichen. Gleichzeitig ist die Marke ein klares Signal, dass Nachhaltigkeit und Biodiversität zentral zum Marktauftritt des Unternehmens sind;   
  • Ein einfaches und bekanntes Beispiel, welches selten mit der notwendigen Konsequenz wie bei der Weissen Arena Gruppe umgesetzt wird: Das Beziehen von Rohmaterialien und Nahrungsmitteln aus der Gegend senkt nicht nur die Transportemissionen, sondern fördert auch die lokale Wirtschaft, intensiviert das regionale Bergerlebnis für die Berggäste und stimuliert Innovationen im Bau oder Lebensmittel, welche auch ausserhalb der Bergregion einer Nachfrage dienen könnten – also, eine Wertsteigerung für mehrere Communities.

Ich will diese Geschäftsart, welche bei weiteren Unternehmen in der Schweiz, Europa und der Welt feststellbar ist, fördern und vorantreiben.Das Buch dient als Bezugspunkt für Gleichgesinnte in einer Community of Interest für zukunftsweisende Lösungen in den Bergen bzw. in der Wirtschaft, welche gleichzeitig gesellschaftlichen Nutzen stiften.

 

Team

Ich bin als Autor die treibende Kraft für das Buch. Ich studierte Sozialwissenschaften an Yale, Harvard und die London School of Economics. Seit 30 Jahren lebe ich in der Schweiz, wo ich Erfahrungen in der Unternehmensberatung, u.a. bei KPMG, und ebenfalls in der betriebswirtschaftlichen Aus- und Weiterbildung, u.a. bei Universität St.Gallen, Swiss Business School, Business School Lausanne und Zürcher Hochschule für Angewandte Wissenschaften, gesammelt habe. Für mehr zu meiner Person siehe

https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjamin-wall-53620a4/

Ich bin tatkräftig unterstützt durch:

  • PR-Team der Weisse Arena Gruppe, welches die Fakten zum Unternehmen im Buch geprüft haben. An dieser Stelle ist hervorzuheben, das Buch ist vollkommen aus meiner eigenen Initiative entstanden und die Analyse und Schlussfolgerungen darin stammen gänzlich von mir. Die Weisse Arena Gruppe hat ihr Einverständnis zum Buch gegeben, übt jedoch absolut keinen redaktionellen Einfluss auf den Inhalt ausser dem Fact-Checking;
  • Eine versierte Lektorin; 
  • Somedia Verlag, der das Buch veröffentlichen wird. Dank der Edition Rüegger verfügt der in Graubünden angesiedelte Verlag über einen grossen Erfahrungsschatz betreffend Bücher zu wirtschaftlichen Themen in den Bergen. Für mehr zu Somedia Verlag siehe

https://www.somedia-production.ch/referenzen/somedia-buchverlag/

 

Realisierung des Buches / Budget 
Das Buch wird per Ende 2019 fertig geschrieben und in der ersten Hälfte von 2020 veröffentlicht. Das Buch wird hochqualitativ mit farbigen Grafiken fertiggestellt.

Das Budget für die Fixkosten des Buches sowie für die Kosten der Kampagne ist wie folgt:

Who are The Needling reporters?

The Needling's intrepid and completely unbiased reporters provide Native Seattle-area residents, newcomers, California carpetbaggers and people born here sometime in the last century earnestly inauthentic analysis of local news and culture. 

What You Get

Three levels of support

  • Level One: $5 - Receive a 3" Needling sticker so durable its designated dishwasher safe if put on mugs, etc. 
  • Level Two: $10 - 3" sticker from above + 3" Needling flat magnet you can slap on your car, the fridge or your favorite head plate. 
  • Level Three: $15 - 3" sticker +3" magnet + Full color, 8-page limited print edition of The Needling on quality bookstock paper

The Impact

Your support helps The Needling:

  • Expand fake news reporting in other media (audio/video)
  • Attain quality photography/graphics
  • Maintain website
  • Maintain software subscriptions 
  • Show writers some love (aka alcohol, book by Brene Brown, whathaveyou)

FYI

Although sticker and magnets are guaranteed for your support, we are aiming for at least 300 limited print edition requests to fund printing. If we do not meet that goal, funds for the print edition may be refunded.

Other Ways You Can Help

Send any hot fake news tips to Submit@TheNeedling.com.

story:
Short Summary

I have been a dancer my whole life. I love to move, breathe, and enjoy everything God gave us. When trauma hit me, I thought I would never dance again. I slowly lost my function; I could not walk without pain. In this slow decline, the inner sense of, "I will never be able to do the things I love again (tennis, dancing, and snow skiing)" hit me and depression set in. I am here to tell you that you can regain function, heal old injuries, overcome fear, and go back to the things that you love. I did it. Somatics works. The healing is real and gives you a sense of hope. This book gives you the tools that you need to begin the healing process. Let the beautiful Somatic movements unwind the deep, hidden, and tight muscles. As you begin to unwind, you will have a sense of hope and freedom that you have not felt since you were younger!

 

The Impact

My goals for the greater impact of this book are:

  • To be used as a guide for individuals to navigate their personal healing 
  • To give insight to those who are suffering about what’s needed for holistic transformation to happen in the body
  • To take part in the healing of humanity – making way for joy, peace, and wellness for everyone

  • To be used as a recipe for the health of your own personal body, nervous system and brain, and for spiritual encouragement

  • To be used as a resource for trainers, therapist, chiropractors, caregivers and  psychologist to share the healing movements with clients

  • To be used by groups who have suffered trauma to begin the divine healing movements together

  • To be part of the larger movement of healing the cry for help in every heart 

    The heart of a person
    The heart of the city
    The heart of a nation

  • To be of service to the healing of humanity, leading the way to true freedom, peace, joy, health and wholeness.

    Freedom from anxiety
    Freedom from fear
    Freedom from trauma

    2 Peter 1:3

    God's Divine power has given us everything we need for life and godliness through the full knowledge of the One who called us by his own glory and excellence.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I am raising $33,000 to fund all aspects of the editing, publishing, printing and distribution of Divine Unwind! 

Here's my budget in more detail:

  • Publishing & Editing $15,600
  • Videography $1,400
  • PR & Publicity $5,000
  • Printing & Distribution $11,000

My stretch goal is $35,000!

 

Support Levels Explained

Pledge US$ 5-10 

For those of you who want to be part of this divine healing movement, but don’t need any reward in exchange, your encouragement and support are so incredibly appreciated.

Thank you for giving this book a boost!

 

Pledge US$ 15 or more: Divine Unwind e-book* 

Receive the e-book download and dive in to this movement 3 months before anyone else! 

*Estimated delivery date October 29, 2019 

 

Pledge US$ 25 or more: Divine Unwind signed soft or hardcover copy* 

This level includes a signed-with-love paperback or hard cover book of Divine Unwind. The book is the perfect size for passing between hands, slipping into a purse, or sliding across the table to a friend in need.

Thank you so much for your support and bless you. 

*Estimated delivery December 2019. Just in time for Christmas! 

 

Pledge US$ 50 or more: Divine Unwind book bundle 

3 in 1 for all the love! With this reward, you’ll receive a first edition, signed-with-love paperback or hardcover book of Divine Unwind, the e-book download 3 months before anyone else, and the Divine Unwind Dance MP3. 

Thank you for wanting to bring the Somatic Healing work to thousands of hurting people. 

 

Pledge US$ 100 or more: Book release party and book bundle* 

Come join the fun at Linda’s book release party!!! You will receive a signed-with-love paperback book, e-book, and Divine Unwind Dance MP3. 

We will explore easy dance movements that heal the body. I’ll collaborate with a professional DJ to curate an unforgettable experience for everyone! Secret place to be announced. Receive a soft cover book, movement video, and an MP3 of the Divine Unwind Dance. Dress your divine best!!! We will get a photo shoot backdrop and take pictures for all fun!! I am so excited to dance and unwind with you! No experience necessary.

*Limit 100 people 

 

Pledge US$ 300 or more: Private session and book bundle 

Receive 1 1/2 hour private FaceTime or Skype Somatic session with Linda. You will also receive an e-book, paperback book, and movement video of the Somatic Intelligent Movements directed by Linda Anna.

Thank you so incredibly much for your generosity and love! 

 

Pledge US$ 600 or more: 3 private sessions and book bundle 

Receive 3 Private 1 hour FaceTime or Skype sessions with Linda! You will also get the e-book, paperback book, movement video of the Somatic Intelligent Movement series, and an MP3 of the Divine Unwind Dance.

Thank you, are so loved and appreciated! 

 

Pledge US$ 2000 or more: Speaking event (for San Diego county)

Linda Anna will speak on the topic of healing and restoration at your church or organization. This includes a mini Divine Unwind workshop for all attendees on the Divine Unwind Movement series for healing the whole body. You will receive a 1 1/2 hour session, 5 paper back copies, and 5 Divine Unwind movement videos. Contact Linda at somalinda@gmail.com.  

Thank you for your generosity, love and support to see this pioneer work revealed to help thousands! My deepest thanks to you.

 

Pledge US$ 3000 or more: Speaking event (for California)

Linda Anna will speak on healing and restoration at your church, wellness center or organization anywhere in California, plus travel, food, and lodging expenses. This includes a mini Divine Unwind workshop for all attendees on the Divine Unwind Movement series for healing the whole body. You will receive a 1 1/2 hour session, 5 paper back copies, and 5 Divine Unwind movement videos. Contact Linda at somalinda@gmail.com.  

Thank you for all your love and support. Together we can do anything! 

 

Pledge US$ 4000 or more: Speaking event (for the United States)

Linda Anna will travel to speak on healing and restoration at your church, wellness center, or organization anywhere in the United States. This includes a mini Divine Unwind workshop for all attendees on the Divine Unwind Movement series for healing the whole body. You will receive a 1 1/2 hour session, 5 paper back copies, and 5 Divine Unwind movement videos. Contact Linda at somalinda@gmail.com.  

I would love to visit your state and certify a local to teach the divine unwind movements to bring healing and restoration to the people in your area. Contact Linda at somalinda@gmail.com. 

Thank you so so much for seeing the vision and expressing your support and gratitude!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

For those of you who want to be part of this divine healing movement, but can't financially contribute, you still can help! Please help get the word out about this campaign. Use any of the content and images on this page to share it with your friends and communities, and direct them to this page!

Don't forget to check us out on Instagram @somaticlife_linda

 

About the Author

Linda has over 35 Years Experience as a Health and Wellness Professional. She is certified as a Personal Fitness Trainer by the American Council on Exercise (A.C.E.) and is certified as a Clinical Exercise Specialist. Her final certification is as a Hanna Somatic Educator (H.S.E.) and Practitioner by the Novato Institute for Somatic Research & Training since 2003.

 

 Linda is an exceptional teacher! She awakens the amazing healing power that is within each one of us. She has been a health and wellness coach for 30+ years starting with Jack Lane in the 80's. Linda discovered Somatics when she was 40 with many old injuries, head injury, car accident, broken bones etc. Linda began her 20 year journey with this astounding work that has healed and restored function, balance and coordination in her body. Linda appears much younger and moves more effortlessly at age 60...AMAZING? she can do the same for you! ⭐️

story:
Short Summary

I'm a children's/teen's fantasy author who has been writing since I could hold a crayon. When I was battling cancer as a young boy, fantasy stories were my escape, and it is important to me to offer that same comfort and sense of adventure to a new generation of young readers. I've been working on this particular book series for a few years now. While the first book is doing well, I could use some help releasing the second book, which ties up the loose threads in the series. A few quick facts:

This particular series is important to me because it features a Latinx family as the heroes. It is important to me that young Latinx readers feel seen and represented in authentic and positive ways, empowering them to grow as heroes in the "real world!"

If you want to know more about the series, you can read the blurb for the first book on Amazon.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funds will go toward the cost of production for a Kindle and paperback version of BRAMBLES IN THE WISHING WELL. I am self-published by choice, and for consistency, I want to keep the same editor and designers I used for the first book. Based on the cost of production for the first book, I estimate the following:
    • Cover Art: $600 (March 2020)
    • Professional Edits: $1600 (Fall 2020)
    • Interior Formatting: $375 (December 2020)
  • For your contributions, I offer the following perks:
    • A preview of the first three chapters
    • Signed character prints, which have already been designed
    • A copy of the book when it is released in 2021
    • Your name in the acknowledgments as a valuable contributor
    • Your name in a future book as an actual character
    • Coffee/Lunch/Skype Session
  • If I surpass my goal, additional funds would go to the cost of promotion: table fees for conventions, online ads, etc. It also secures the ability for me to continue writing and publishing after this book is released!

The Impact

  • The first book, ROSES IN THE DRAGON'S DEN, has been granted a New Apple Literary Award and is under consideration for a Wishing Shelf Award. It has garnered strong reviews and positive reception from children, parents, and school librarians.
  • There are still important strides to be made in including strong Latinx characters in fantasy, especially for children. We're getting there, but I simply want to add my voice, wherever it might be heard!

Other Ways You Can Help

You don't have to buy a book or donate to a campaign to show support. There are many small, free ways to make big differences. Here are just a few:

  • Spread the word. Share the campaign, or share the first book in the series!
  • Leave a review if you've read the first book already. Reviews boost a book's visibility, and they help other readers decide if they might enjoy it! Remember, reviews don't have to be long.
  • Request the first book at your local library.

I've poured my heart into these books and hope you'll help me close them with a strong finale! Thank you!

story:
Author's Website: https://aventurasenesl.com/

 

 

 

 

Roqui’s Pandero Beat is a multicultural book celebrating the musical genre of plena from Puerto Rico. Roquí is a coquí frog who wants to play plena on the pandero drum. He tends to focus on a repetitive musical beat throughout the story. While he does move to the U.S. mainland, he still holds on to his dream of performing as a pandero drummer, yet he's worried his small size will get in the way. As the story evolves, Roquí encounters classmates who play a similar music genre (bomba) and almost gives up on his dream. His perseverance and attitude shape the ending of the story.

The Sounds of a Pandero Drum

When I think about children’s books I read when growing up, there were very few characters who represented the Latinx culture. I wish I saw more books that included music I could relate to, food, language, or even scenery. 

When children grow up not seeing themselves or their culture in books, it signals their culture is not worthy of representation. 

In a study done by Cooperative Children’s Book Center 2019, there were more children's books published featuring an animal main character than children's books featuring a Black, Native, Asian, or Latinx character. Let’s work on changing that. 

My goal is to tackle this challenge by adding to the diversity in publishing and children’s books by creating this multicultural book featuring a Latinx character.

As an educator, I am depending on this campaign to help fund the book. Being on a teacher salary means using my savings to fund this dream. By contributing to my campaign, you will help expand multicultural literature into your home and/or school. 

Meet the Author

Delia Ruiz is an educator and writer. Writing a children’s book has always been a dream for her and with Roquí’s Pandero Beat, it will finally become a reality. Her inspiration for creating this book was rooted in sharing the Puerto Rican culture with her future children. "When the time comes to have children, I want them to value both mine and my husband's cultures. I want them to  celebrate the music that comes from the island and know those roots are part of them too." You can follow her journey on Instagram @aventuras.en.esl or Facebook as Aventuras En ESL

Meet the Illustrator

Luis Patiño is an artist based in Grapevine, Texas.  Luis has known Delia since high school and jumped on board to illustrate his first book. Luis is known for his watercolor style and designed the entire book using this medium. Some of his favorite things include plants, hiking, and enjoying the benefits of traveling. You can follow his journey @nino_planta.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, help us share out this Indiegogo link to anyone who might be interested!

  • Share out info on the book & tag @aventuras.en.esl for a shoutout! 

FAQ

  • What is IndieGoGo? 

IndieGoGo is a crowdfunding platform where creators raise funds from the general public to bring creative projects to life. Indiegogo is not a donation, charity, or a loan. You are paying for a product from a small business you support because you want to see it come to life!

  • How do I order the book?

​To order the book; (1) Select a PERK from the right-hand screen and choose “Get This Perk” OR Click the Pink "Back it" button to donate with or without perks; (2)  Review your order and add any additional perk “add-ons”(3)  Select ”Proceed to Checkout”  (4) Create an account (or log in if you already have an account), or continue as a guest. (5) Type in your shipping and payment information > Select ”Submit Payment.” DONE!

  • How can I order a reward more than once?

To order the same reward (perk) more than once, select the Pink "Back it" button and increase the pledge amount accordingly. For example, for (3) stickers enter $30 because each one costs $10. Then make sure to send me a comment on Indiegogo (This way I know you want three of the item selected and you weren't just donating extra, because that is an option too).

  • When will I receive the book?

Books will be shipped out in early April. My goal is to have your book(s) to you as quickly as possible with immediate turnaround. Please note Covid might affect USPS shipping. 

  • More questions?

Check out the FAQ tab on IndieGoGo, leave me a comment on Indiegogo, or email me directly at aventurasenesl@gmail.com

As the story evolves, Roquí encounters classmates who play a similar music genre (bomba) and almost gives up on his dream. His perseverance and attitude shape the ending of the story.
The Sounds of a Pandero Drum





When I think about children’s books I read when growing up, there were very few characters who represented the Latinx culture. I wish I saw more books that included music I could relate to, food, language, or even scenery. 
When children grow up not seeing themselves or their culture in books, it signals their culture is not worthy of representation. 
In a study done by Cooperative Children’s Book Center 2019, there were more children's books published featuring an animal main character than children's books featuring a Black, Native, Asian, or Latinx character. Let’s work on changing that. 
My goal is to tackle this challenge by adding to the diversity in publishing and children’s books by creating this multicultural book featuring a Latinx character.









As an educator, I am depending on this campaign to help fund the book. Being on a teacher salary means using my savings to fund this dream. By contributing to my campaign, you will help expand multicultural literature into your home and/or school. 




Meet the Author
Delia Ruiz is an educator and writer. Writing a children’s book has always been a dream for her and with Roquí’s Pandero Beat, it will finally become a reality. Her inspiration for creating this book was rooted in sharing the Puerto Rican culture with her future children. "When the time comes to have children, I want them to value both mine and my husband's cultures. I want them to  celebrate the music that comes from the island and know those roots are part of them too." You can follow her journey on Instagram @aventuras.en.esl or Facebook as Aventuras En ESL
Meet the Illustrator
Luis Patiño is an artist based in Grapevine, Texas.  Luis has known Delia since high school and jumped on board to illustrate his first book. Luis is known for his watercolor style and designed the entire book using this medium. Some of his favorite things include plants, hiking, and enjoying the benefits of traveling. You can follow his journey @nino_planta.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, help us share out this Indiegogo link to anyone who might be interested!
Share out info on the book & tag @aventuras.en.esl for a shoutout! 

FAQ
What is IndieGoGo? 
IndieGoGo is a crowdfunding platform where creators raise funds from the general public to bring creative projects to life. Indiegogo is not a donation, charity, or a loan. You are paying for a product from a small business you support because you want to see it come to life!
How do I order the book?
​To order the book; (1) Select a PERK from the right-hand screen and choose “Get This Perk” OR Click the Pink "Back it" button to donate with or without perks; (2)  Review your order and add any additional perk “add-ons”(3)  Select ”Proceed to Checkout”  (4) Create an account (or log in if you already have an account), or continue as a guest. (5) Type in your shipping and payment information > Select ”Submit Payment.” DONE!
How can I order a reward more than once?
To order the same reward (perk) more than once, select the Pink "Back it" button and increase the pledge amount accordingly. For example, for (3) stickers enter $30 because each one costs $10. Then make sure to send me a comment on Indiegogo (This way I know you want three of the item selected and you weren't just donating extra, because that is an option too).
When will I receive the book?
Books will be shipped out in early April. My goal is to have your book(s) to you as quickly as possible with immediate turnaround. Please note Covid might affect USPS shipping. 
More questions?

Check out the FAQ tab on IndieGoGo, leave me a comment on Indiegogo, or email me directly at aventurasenesl@gmail.com

story:
THE BOOK

"Hugo’s Perfect Picnic” is a story about Hugo, the giant gorilla, and his search for the perfect picnic spot. But with every spot he finds, there is always something that doesn’t seem quite right. As one disappointment leads to another, Hugo feels like he'll never find the perfect picnic spot. In the end, with the help of his friends, he learns that perfection isn’t the most important thing in life. 

 

“Hugo’s Perfect Picnic” features 40 pages of cool art, fun rhymes, and colorful characters in an all-ages story. If you love giant monsters, then this book is perfect for you! Let me introduce you to Hugo and his giant monster friends who are featured in this story. 

 

STRETCH GOALS

If the project reaches certain funding goals, special perks will be unlocked for all backers at no additional cost. Each book comes with a free bookmark. Share this project with others so everyone can benefit!

 

ESTIMATED SHIPPING

Below is an estimate of shipping that will be charged to all backers after the campaign funds. These estimated rates were provided by my fulfillment company and are subject to change. If you are a backer outside of the US, consider splitting the shipping costs with others by picking one of the multipack perks.

*International backers, you may be subjected to an import tax by your local post office/courier before the package will be released to you. This tax is not included in the cost of the pledge.

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

I have the base cost of the printing which will be done in the US. I am listing this campaign on Indiegogo to help improve the quality of the book, provide a buffer for printing costs during COVID, and to increase the print order to reduce the printing cost per book. Also, l would like to offer this short campaign for my fans who use Indiegogo instead of Kickstarter.

THE TEAM

My name is Nolen Lee, and I’m the creator of my own brand, Punching Pandas®. Over a decade ago, I left my career as a structural engineer to pursue a career in art. Since then, I’ve done freelanced comics for Disney, commercial illustrations, and video games in addition to my own work. I have a passion for creating original art and stories that have a ton of fun and a lot of heart.

By contributing to this campaign, you will be supporting creative new and original work instead of tired old rehashes and reboots. Craving something new and exciting? Then back this campaign already!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

One of the challenges that this project faces is the raising enough to meet the printer’s minimum order quantity (MOQ). I have priced the tiers as low as I could to ensure that I meet the MOQ while providing reasonable prices to my backers.

story:
Short Summary

Clark Coolidge's monumental Selected Poems: 1962-1985 began at the instigation and the desk of the poet Larry Fagin, and we first got wind of it through Jeffrey Young in 2010 at a memorial service for Michael Gizzi at the Matt Tannenbaum's The Bookstore in Lenox. Two years later Station Hill's close participation began on this 492-page collection, carefully selected with Coolidge's help and covering the first 20-plus years of his writing life. Larry and Clark wanted to do this project with us in part because of Station Hill's 35-year involvement with new poetry - publishing the earliest books by Hannah Wiener, Bernstein, Mac Low as well as John Cage, among many notable others - but also because we published Coolidge's poetic compatriot Bernadette Mayer (Studying Hunger Journal and, subsequently, Eating The Colors Of A Lineup Of Words: The Early Books of Bernadette Mayer).

So, five years later, we are very close to realization. Larry and Clark had finished their editing in late 2014, and it was passed on Miles Champion, whom Station Hill commissioned to make a clean transcription of all the poems. It was then passed back to Larry Fagin, and Michael Gonzales put the book into its initial InDesign format, which subsequently was perfected by Susan Quasha. Larry and Clark chose for the cover image a 1967 line drawing by Susan Coolidge of Clark at his drum set when he was playing in David Meltzer's band Serpent Power.  The Selected includes an introduction by Bill Berkson, entitled "The Spools of Clark Coolidge," recounting Coolidge's coming up and influences as well as eloquently expressing the visionary nature of his poetic enterprise.

We now are very close to having a finished, press-ready book, for which in part we returned to Miles, commissioning him to review and make final changes, which he has accomplished with characteristic acumen. We have advanced praise from John Ashbery (see below), Lyn Hejinian and Ron Silliman. We have even made an advance, uncorrected proof of the book, an image of which is above.

Here's a slice of what Berkson says of Coolidge's work: “From the heights each poem appears to take its own peculiar plunge. The insistent musings, discriminations, glees, puzzlements, irritability, those sardonic driveby
puns, and philosophic remarks that register almost as stage whispers without
claiming any prior authority, all signify a powerful affection for the world as encompassed, and ultimately, Clark’s will to articulate that fabled specific infinity
he has had his eye on, the ‘quest to know anything, write everything,’ the Chapel
Perilous of these poems.”

Further, we would make some claims:

  • Clark Coolidge is securely among the giants of contemporary poetic practice
  • Into the foreseeable future this Selected Poems will be among the significant promontories from which that magnitude will be glimpsed
  • Much of the experimental  whirring of the last 50 years are a footnote to or at best elaboration on the works of Clark Coolidge (maybe)
  • Reading Coolidge's work is to "come back, this time enclosed, trim in
    paper. Plain sky part of sewn perimeters. Gurries and wobblances. The handtorch shows the tune its rock to turn."

What We Need & What You Get

We need $4,300 to do a  thousand-copy print run of the Selected. We have already spent $2300 on set up costs, which happily went to Miles Champion to type and proofread the contents; and to date, our in-kind contributions to this project total about $2,000 - not including what Larry Fagin has contributed over the years combing Coolidge's poems for the Selected. Out of pure cussedness (as Ted Berrigan would have said) we've rounded that $4,300 figure up to $5,000 to help defray  a little of what we've paid out.

We are asking for $100 donations to this project, for which you will have your name inscribed in this historic big book - and, preferably, on a dedicated page if there are enough donors at this level. (Remember, you can use your own name, institution or anybody or thing you see fit.) Don't miss out on this galactic opportunity!

For a further $35 - or $135 - you will also get a copy of the book with no shipping charge.

Or you can prepay $40 and immediately receive the Selected  - shipping included in U.S. -  when it comes off press.

Donations are tax deductible!

The Impact

In our lives there are few opportunities to participate in seismic literary launches, and this is one of them. Or as Ashbery writes: "Is it possible that while we were listening to Clark Coolidge’s quiet but insistent calls to order over all these years, he was becoming a monument of Rushmorian proportions? As though one were to look out one’s kitchen window and discover the colossal head of George Washington in the backyard."

    Risks & Challenges

    At this crossroad we have the Selected very close to press ready, but our monetary resources just aren't there at this writing to meet it. If we can gather even a percentage of our need, duty bound we can make this happen. Again, we hope that you will recognize and answer this historic call.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Not all of you will be able or want to assist financially, but nevertheless you may get the word out! 

      Please pass the word!

      And that’s all there is to it.

story: Alberto Ricasoli has completed the manuscript for his first graphic novel. Now, he needs your help in order to publish it and share his story with the world. As a new author, Alberto is self-publishing and needs help with the costs in order to hire an artist and then publish the book. The book is a supernatural story with a new, fresh take on vampires. Lucas is a self-proclaimed fan of the genre and felt that vampire fans didn't really have a good story to enjoy, so he set out to give them one. Please help him make this dream a reality!

story:
The Project

Hi!

My name is China Dennington. I'm a 15-year-old author living in Phoenix, AZ. At age 14, I published my first novel, Standing (Book One of The Waterblaze Trilogy).

Writing is my passion. I love how emotions can be translated into the rhythm of words. I believe that good writing is a powerful tool for change. I write science-fiction and fantasy because my imagination is always running wild with possibilities, sometimes improbable and sometimes more obtainable than you might think.

I need your help reaching two goals this summer.

First, I would like to go to a program called the Teen Writer's Conference on June 18th to meet other young writers like myself and continue to develop my skills. It's in Utah though, not right across the street, so I need some help making it there. I need at least $2,400 to make it to the writer's conference. Can you help me? It would be appreciated!

Next, I need your help to publish the second book in The Waterblaze Trilogy, "Cadence". Cadence is finished and ready for the publishing process, and you can help me get it into print this summer!

What We Need & What You Get

The Goals

The first $2,400 raised toward my goal will cover my trip expenses:

  • Airfare for me and an accompanying adult
  • Hotel
  • Meals
  • Conference fee
  • Ground transportation
  • Other travel related expenses

The last $3,250 raised toward my goal will cover publishing expenses for Cadence, including:

  • Professional artwork
  • Proofreading
  • Formatting
  • Printing costs
  • Inventory
  • Promotional materials
  • Initial advertising
  • ISBN numbers
  • Web domain and hosting

*(Indiegogo fees have been factored into goals.)

*Any funds raised over and beyond this campaign goal of $5,650 will be applied toward promotional tours and publishing costs for the final book of The Waterblaze Trilogy.

The Perks

In addition to my undying gratitude, see the sidebar for the awesome perks you get for each level of giving!

Other Ways You Can Help

Share! Share! Share! Facebook, Instagram, Twitter— you know what to do. People listen to you, so if you believe in my project, then please— spread the word!

Thank you for your support!

story:
Hi,

My name is Melissa A. Salmon and I am a global citizen! Like many of you I understand all too well the ills, struggles, pain and yet the magnificence of life. Having lost many loved ones, from close friends to even my dad, from battling and struggling with bone cancer, to surviving what could have been a near death car crash, to overcoming depression, to now tapping into my greatness and finding the positives in life. I now have an unwavering appreciation for God's divine  power; the gift of life is truly a blessing to be cherished.  I am a 'thriver', who has discovered my gift(s), now poise with sharing them with you.

'The World Awaits your Greatness' book seeks to provide motivation to readers, in every word that is digested; broken down into 13 concise chapters, for an easy read. In the simplest way, the book encourages us to tap into our greatness and then to share that greatness with the World so that you can positively impact others. I am extremely passionate about this book because it is a powerful tool for motivation, that has helped me in more ways than one-- discovering my greatness, and I truly believe that many others will be able to benefit from this book in a profound way as well.

I truly appreciate you for visiting this page, but I must admit that I cannot do this without your help. Join me, let us empower lives for the better and contribute to the development of our global citizens!

I am asking for funding of $ 4800 to assist with the cost of self-publishing. The cost will include:

Typesetting
Cover design
Copy editing
Proof reading
Printing
Digital file/ebook

I am offering different perks for your contribution(s), from a personal thank you message, to receiving a free ebook sample and even having your name listed on the 'thank you' page in the book. Should my targeted goal not be reached, all the funds that have been raised will still go towards the associated publishing cost.

I fully comprehend that self- publishing has many challenges, however, together with your help and positive energy we can succeed. Please help to spread the word about this campaign by sharing it on all platforms.


One love,
Melissa

story:
Helft einem kleinen Indie-Verlag, das erste literarische UND illustrierte Backbuch heraus-zubringen! Mit Rezepten von Bäckermeistern und aus Cafés, die auch Du backen und besuchen kannst... (english: bottom of the page or video!)

Ulla, Trude und Magda, die Figuren aus dem Büchlein "Die drei Damen" gehen auf eine Reise zu vielen verschiedenen Cafés und bringen Rezepte zum Nachbacken mit. Das gesamte Buch im 21 x 21 cm Format mit ca. 50 bis 60 Seiten wird illustriert. Ihr könnt uns unterstützen und mit entscheiden, wie es aussehen wird und welche Rezepte noch hinein sollen. Cafés können außerdem eine Geschichte als Dankeschön bekommen und tauchen so in dem Buch auf, nicht nur namentlich, sondern zusätzlich mit Adresse und Bild im hinteren Teil.


Wir sind ein kleiner, unabhängiger Verlag, gegründet 2015 von mir, Svenja Hirsch. Ich bin freie Autorin aus Hamburg und arbeite mit Katarina Kühl, Illustratorin, an diesem Projekt. Im April ist die erste Geschichte von den drei Damen erschienen und dazu Postkarten mit Rezept. Mir ist es wichtig, dass alle Produkte seriös und wertig sind. Daher ist der Verlag als Marke eingetragen und hat alles, was dazu gehört wie z. B. ISBN-Nummern. Außerdem sind unsere Produkte immer ein bisschen anders und haben diesen kleinen Kick namens Hintergedanken. 

Von großen Zwischenhändlern wurde mir gesagt, dass wir mit dem Verlag nur dann Chancen hätten, von ihnen vertrieben zu werden, wenn wir höherpreisige Produkte anbieten können. Aber ganz ehrlich: Wir würden es aber auch so machen! Weil wir Lust darauf haben und es Spaß macht, etwas so Schönes zu gestalten, woran schon jetzt viele Leute Freude haben und wir bisher auch NUR (ja, das stimmt!) positive Rückmeldungen bekommen haben. Dass auch die Händler uns mögen, seht ihr an der Liste "Wo ihr uns bekommt" auf unserer Webseite... 

Für die Verwirklichung eines weiteren, besonderen Projektes und dessen Produktionskosten. Die sind für so ein Buch im Format 21 zu 21 cm nicht günstig: Etwa 3500 Euro kostet eine Auflage von 500 Stück und dann soll das Buch vorab ja auch noch vernünftig lektoriert werden. Ein bisschen Geld geht vielleicht auch noch in die Backprodukte, sodass wir garantieren können, dass all die Rezepte auch funktionieren - und richtig lecker sind! ;) 

Da haben wir uns ganz viele feine Sachen ausgedacht - zum Beispiel den Eintrag als Unterstützer im hinteren Teil des Buches (wenn ihr wollt), eine Einladung zur Buchvorstellung mit Kuchen-Buffet in Hamburg, kleine, feine Dinge aus dem Verlag wie zum Beispiel die erste Geschichte von Ulla, Trude und Magda ... Oder natürlich das Buch, sobald es fertig ist! Signiert oder auch nicht, wie ihr wollt.
Bestimmt mit, was euch gefällt und was nicht. Wir teilen kleine Eindrücke aus der Geschichte und Gestaltung mit euch.

Cafés, Bäckereien und auch Blogger und andere können außerdem mit einer Geschichte und Rezept ins Buch kommen! Werdet genannt oder seid eines der Cafés, in dem Ulla, Trude und Magda Platz nehmen und schlemmen! Wenn ihr Lust habt, das fertige Buch später bei euch zu verkaufen, bekommt ihr den gängigen Händlerrabatt eingeräumt und könnt so sogar noch ein bisschen etwas daran wieder "zurückverdienen". Fragen und Ideen, wie ihr uns sonst noch unterstützen könnt und mögt einfach an: waeldchenverlag@gmail.com

Ich habe 2011 meinen Master in Deutschsprachige Literaturen abgeschlossen, anschließend eine Sprecherausbildung mit Auszeichnung absolviert. Seitdem arbeite und schreibe ich als freie Autorin in Hamburg.

- seit 2015 freie redaktionelle Mitarbeit bei Sehnsucht Deutschland, Reisemagazin
- freie Mitarbeit beim Klönschnack, Magazin für die Elbvororte
- Texte im Corporate Publishing Bereich u. a. für das sportspaß Magazin und die
   Schreiberschaft, Nina Conze
- Lesung von Alexander Hoffmanns Glosse "RC Bröckedde", RC Lüneburg u. a.
- Lesung am Literaturhaus Hamburg von "Zwischen Möwen und Delfinen", eigene
   Kurzgeschichte
 
Seit 2015 bin ich Mitglied im writer's room Hamburg und im September erscheint meine Kurzgeschichte "Im Gefrierschrank" in der Anthologie "Böses Lächeln - Scharf geschossen mit der Kamera". Mehr von mir gibt es hier: www.frauhirschtext.de 

Katarina hat 2014 ihr Examen an der Bildkunst Akademie Hamburg mit Bestnote abgelegt und bereits Illustrationen bei Hutmachern in New York hängen!
 
- Illustrationen für GEOmini, Ausgabe 4/2013 und 6/2013
- in "Mein Wedina - Liebeserklärung an ein Hotel"
- ganzseitige Illustration in "Meat Popsicle"
- Coverillustration "Der Keksdieb" von Alexander Hoffmann, Lesekeks
- bemalte Schuhe und Illustration für Hutmacherin Anya Caliendo, New York

Im September erscheint ein Artikel über ihre Arbeit in dem Magazin "Threaded", New Zealand und das amerikanischen "The Eclipse Magazin" hat auch schon angeklopft. Mehr: www.katarinakuehl.de

Dann machen wir es trotzdem! Deshalb haben wir uns für Indiegogo entschieden, weil es nur hier die Möglichkeit gibt, Unterstützung in jedem Falle zu bekommen, selbst wenn es nicht die 4.000 Euro werden. Dann werden wir es noch einmal bei Nordstarter/Startnext versuchen und ziehen den Betrag von hier mit hinüber. Das Projekt findet aber auch bei einem Scheitern dort in jedem Fall statt, dauert dann nur etwas länger. Euer Dankeschön bekommt ihr in jedem Fall!

Und: Jeder Euro hilft uns weiter!

Kleine Verlage funktionieren am Besten über Mundpropaganda: Erzählt von uns und sagt eurem Lieblingscafé um die Ecke, dass es diese Aktion gibt! Teilt unsere Seite auf Facebook oder wo ihr sonst noch so unterwegs seit. Sprecht in eurem Unternehmen von uns, schwärmt auch der Presse etwas vor ... und, und, und!

Be part of the first literary bakerybook with great illustration! With recipes from master bakers and real coffee shops/ cafés! To be honest: We are from germany and will print it in german. But there is a perk, where you can get a very, very unique version of the book in english. More about us? Watch our video! There we have some subtitles for you to understand, who we are. If you like the idea, but our english version is to expensive: We are happy about every good will and every Euro. So tell other people about our small publishing company (maybe you have some german-speaking friends?) and the three ladies or spend one Euro for a big THANK YOU! Thank you very much!  Your WäldchenVerlag
story_txt:
Helft einem kleinen Indie-Verlag, das erste literarische UND illustrierte Backbuch heraus-zubringen! Mit Rezepten von Bäckermeistern und aus Cafés, die auch Du backen und besuchen kannst... (english: bottom of the page or video!)

Ulla, Trude und Magda, die Figuren aus dem Büchlein "Die drei Damen" gehen auf eine Reise zu vielen verschiedenen Cafés und bringen Rezepte zum Nachbacken mit. Das gesamte Buch im 21 x 21 cm Format mit ca. 50 bis 60 Seiten wird illustriert. Ihr könnt uns unterstützen und mit entscheiden, wie es aussehen wird und welche Rezepte noch hinein sollen. Cafés können außerdem eine Geschichte als Dankeschön bekommen und tauchen so in dem Buch auf, nicht nur namentlich, sondern zusätzlich mit Adresse und Bild im hinteren Teil.


Wir sind ein kleiner, unabhängiger Verlag, gegründet 2015 von mir, Svenja Hirsch. Ich bin freie Autorin aus Hamburg und arbeite mit Katarina Kühl, Illustratorin, an diesem Projekt. Im April ist die erste Geschichte von den drei Damen erschienen und dazu Postkarten mit Rezept. Mir ist es wichtig, dass alle Produkte seriös und wertig sind. Daher ist der Verlag als Marke eingetragen und hat alles, was dazu gehört wie z. B. ISBN-Nummern. Außerdem sind unsere Produkte immer ein bisschen anders und haben diesen kleinen Kick namens Hintergedanken. 
Von großen Zwischenhändlern wurde mir gesagt, dass wir mit dem Verlag nur dann Chancen hätten, von ihnen vertrieben zu werden, wenn wir höherpreisige Produkte anbieten können. Aber ganz ehrlich: Wir würden es aber auch so machen! Weil wir Lust darauf haben und es Spaß macht, etwas so Schönes zu gestalten, woran schon jetzt viele Leute Freude haben und wir bisher auch NUR (ja, das stimmt!) positive Rückmeldungen bekommen haben. Dass auch die Händler uns mögen, seht ihr an der Liste "Wo ihr uns bekommt" auf unserer Webseite... 



Für die Verwirklichung eines weiteren, besonderen Projektes und dessen Produktionskosten. Die sind für so ein Buch im Format 21 zu 21 cm nicht günstig: Etwa 3500 Euro kostet eine Auflage von 500 Stück und dann soll das Buch vorab ja auch noch vernünftig lektoriert werden. Ein bisschen Geld geht vielleicht auch noch in die Backprodukte, sodass wir garantieren können, dass all die Rezepte auch funktionieren - und richtig lecker sind! ;) 







Da haben wir uns ganz viele feine Sachen ausgedacht - zum Beispiel den Eintrag als Unterstützer im hinteren Teil des Buches (wenn ihr wollt), eine Einladung zur Buchvorstellung mit Kuchen-Buffet in Hamburg, kleine, feine Dinge aus dem Verlag wie zum Beispiel die erste Geschichte von Ulla, Trude und Magda ... Oder natürlich das Buch, sobald es fertig ist! Signiert oder auch nicht, wie ihr wollt.

Bestimmt mit, was euch gefällt und was nicht. Wir teilen kleine Eindrücke aus der Geschichte und Gestaltung mit euch.






Cafés, Bäckereien und auch Blogger und andere können außerdem mit einer Geschichte und Rezept ins Buch kommen! Werdet genannt oder seid eines der Cafés, in dem Ulla, Trude und Magda Platz nehmen und schlemmen! Wenn ihr Lust habt, das fertige Buch später bei euch zu verkaufen, bekommt ihr den gängigen Händlerrabatt eingeräumt und könnt so sogar noch ein bisschen etwas daran wieder "zurückverdienen". Fragen und Ideen, wie ihr uns sonst noch unterstützen könnt und mögt einfach an: waeldchenverlag@gmail.com





Ich habe 2011 meinen Master in Deutschsprachige Literaturen abgeschlossen, anschließend eine Sprecherausbildung mit Auszeichnung absolviert. Seitdem arbeite und schreibe ich als freie Autorin in Hamburg.

- seit 2015 freie redaktionelle Mitarbeit bei Sehnsucht Deutschland, Reisemagazin- freie Mitarbeit beim Klönschnack, Magazin für die Elbvororte- Texte im Corporate Publishing Bereich u. a. für das sportspaß Magazin und die    Schreiberschaft, Nina Conze- Lesung von Alexander Hoffmanns Glosse "RC Bröckedde", RC Lüneburg u. a.- Lesung am Literaturhaus Hamburg von "Zwischen Möwen und Delfinen", eigene    Kurzgeschichte Seit 2015 bin ich Mitglied im writer's room Hamburg und im September erscheint meine Kurzgeschichte "Im Gefrierschrank" in der Anthologie "Böses Lächeln - Scharf geschossen mit der Kamera". story:
Hey everyone! I'm Sean Overman and I'm asking for your help to publish my first  book! 

It's my novel called City of Angeles and Discontent. It's about a young professional  living in LA. He deals with the struggles of a dead end job and wants to live the American  dream. In the process, he breaks up with his fiancée of five years, dates vigorously in the city, finds a wife, then cheats on her too with multiple women. His is a path to self discovery or self destruction, but he doesn't know which. He also uncovers the truth about his dad's death and sees how that has affected him as a young man.

My Story

I come from a modest family. My dad was a brilliant man, but I lost him to tragedy when I was quite young. Thus, my mom raised a family of five on a bank teller's income until my siblings and I moved out to college. With little income and support, no dad to offer advice, love and care, I struggled through my life.

I've always wanted to write a book, but never knew I had the courage in me to do so. In high school, I was told by  friends that I was a good writer, but never pursued it. I was a troubled kid and often turned to drugs and alcohol as a way to cope. Eventually my past landed me in trouble and I knew that enough was enough. I needed to shape up and change my life. Eventually, on the verge of graduation from high school, I got the idea to be an FBI agent  and went to college to chase my dreams. 

I  moved to LA with only $200 in my pocket and everything I owned in my tiny little hatchback.  After years at the university, I obtained my bachelor degree and figured I'd be a cop in no time. Boy was I wrong. I turned down many full time gigs for work, hoping to be a police officer. 

I earned a career at a non profit org, where I've been for nearly a decade and work with probation youth and foster kids.  After so many years there, though I love my work and steering kids towards the right path on a daily basis, I figured I needed to guide myself and follow my one true love and art: writing.

Through a side gig, hustling at nights on a podcast, I developed a passion for discussing my favorite TV shows, writing news and gossip and interviewing my favorite actors.Through the podcast, I made a powerful connection who was interested in my ideas and suggested I write a book for her company.  At that point in my life, I had neither the time nor the belief in myself that I needed.

My Book

Two years later, I finally put pen to paper, fingers to keyboard and wrote to my heart's content. At first, I didn't know what I had written. I rewrote, cut, pasted annotated and consolidated everything I had. I culminated it into a compelling story about a young man living his life in a big city to find happiness. I emailed my old publisher contact. She was open and willing to evaluate my manuscript and give me excellent advice.  I shared my project and manuscript completion to a seminar headed by the founder of my podcast with 50 other cohosts present, to which I received a round of applause. I was surprised and a little embarrassed, but I received praise, support and great advice from everyone there. The founder has written two books herself and encouraged me to stay the course. 

Further, at the seminar I got a great contact from two authors. One of which, has published over 20 books. I'd like to think of her as my mentor. She continues to give me great advice on the book publishing industry. It's sad, but it can be just as cut throat as the TV and film business. Luckily, I've gotten the courage and taken steps to self-publish.  I've asked many friends for help with social media and marketing strategies, cover art, to read it, proofread and give me encouragement on my journey. Thanks to my mom, family, friends and my loving wife for supporting me on this journey. Yet, I want to thank others out there. 

Your Help

Some of the biggest challenges I face are: 1) finding an editor to help with my book and make it the best it can be, which can cost thousands of dollars, 2) self publishing my own book to get printed copies out to my readers, 3) marketing the book to a wide audience via radio, TV, social media, and podcasts.

So here I am, turning to you dreamers out there. If I can inspire you with my book, a passage, a quote, a phrase or a sentence that I wrote, then I'll know I made an impact in your life. 

Therefore, I need your help to get this book off the ground, get it into the hands of others and make an impact in lives. Even if you can't donate, please let others know about my campaign. Share it on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook and any other social media. Heck, even by word of mouth and snail mail! Many thanks and much gratitude in advance for making an author's dream come true!


Sean Overman
