A holistic approach to fitness through creative and spiritual practices for the experience of self-knowledge, health and joy. 
Personal true stories of a heart in search of true expression – the challenges, the triumphs, the love, the wonder, the joy. Strength training in a program of spiritual growth. 
Ideas of how romantic relationships can become a door to spirituality. 
The Fit for Joy Fitness Center – a project in progress which readers will be contributing to its realization. 
The importance of using your creativity to connect with the deepest part of yourself.
 The vital importance of living a life guided by the heart.  
You will be able to identify the connection between fear, anxiety, unhealthy habits and the matters of the heart.
TABLE OF CONTENTS "THE SNOWFLAKE"  SAMPLE  STORY FIT FOR JOY: The Center Project The Fit for Joy Center is a project that relates to the ideas and practices presented in this book. It is devoted to physical, spiritual fitness and creative practices aiming to bring forth the life force within the human heart. It espouses fitness, healthy eating, soul expression, meaningful creative works, ideas and training.The staff will be made up of volunteers who stand for a life of authenticity guided by the heart. They can be personal trainers, nutritionists, meditation teachers, chefs, yoga, and dance instructors, and of course, artists: writers, painters, musicians, poets, philosophers and others.Book sales will help to build the first "fitness of the heart" space.All early supporters and backers will be updated by email on the progress of center project. You are all part of this dream!It will be a non-profit facility"BRINGING TOGETHER WHAT WAS MEANT TO BE APART." MORE ABOUT THE CENTER HERE ​ HOW WILL FUNDS BE USED  The funding goal is the amount we need to produce and print 250 copies. CreateSpace is working with us - An Amazon Distributor  - Services provided include copyediting, structure editing, black and white interior design, kindle conversion, paperback printing.  Breakdown of costs:  CreateSpace with Amazon Distribution: $2,868   //  Main Editor: $2,500 / Illustrator: $2,700 // D3 Architect - Center Images: $760. // Book Cover and e-Book Color Interior Design: $439. // Printing cost: x250 books = $1, 710 //Grand Total: $10.977 ADDITIONAL  FUNDSThe extra funds we get from you by exceeding funding goal we'll use on producing a full-color hardcover. We will also use on publicity to get the message out to as many hearts as possible. Any super extra contribution will go toward building our Fit for Joy Center! HOW TO ORDER USING ANY CARDIndiegogo accepts credit or debit card, not only Pay Pal, but uses it to proceed with your purchase.Here is how to do it:1. Select your perk.2. Fill in your shipping information and select “Continue to Paypal.”You will not have to log in to Paypal or create a Paypal account.3. Under “Choose a way to pay” on the Paypal screen, select “Pay with a credit or debit card.”4. Fill in your card information and complete your purchase. PERK DETAILS AND NOTES1- $2. -  FROM THE HEART DONATION - A personalized "Thank You" by email.2- $7. -  FIT FOR JOY DONATION - A personalized "Thank You" by email.3- $11. -  E-BOOK  - Worldwide 4- $22. - BOOK - Worldwide5- $44. - BOOK and E-BOOK - Worldwide6- $220. - CENTER DONATION - Worldwide ** All PERKS INCLUDE: an invitation to be part of my Whatsup or Skype conversation group. Also, as an acknowledgment of your support I would love to post your name and/or headshot on my website. If you also would like this, please email your photo; by doing so, you'll be giving me permission to post and mention your name publicly. *Note:  Black and white illustrations for all copies.** ILLUSTRATIONS: the sample illustration here is full-color but we can only print black and white on book for now. Extra funds will be used to produce full-color hardcover copies. UPDATES I will be posting updates frequently here, on www.FITFORJOY.org and on both: FACEBOOK FIT FOR JOY BOOK and VALERIA TELES.  MEET THE FIT FOR JOY TEAMREAD ABOUT THE TEAM and  MEET PRE-CAMPAIGN SUPPORTERS  
FIT FOR JOY BRAZIL  FIT FOR JOY  IN FRANCE"To follow the heart is an adventure of living a life that has been there for you all along."When my heart felt like leaving New York to go somewhere else to do some rewriting and editing for Fit for Joy I sent a message to many of my friends all over the world. One of the first replies I got within minutes read:  "Yes and yes, you can stay in my house in Paris for as long as need to work on your book. My lovely friend ANA FREN has made my journey of writing my first book as spiritual and interesting as it could be!! Thank you again and again....!! :)"WE CAN'T UNITE THAT WHICH WAS NEVER APART."For someone who has been listening to the heart in health and love for all my life, to conclude the final pages of Fit for Joy in The City of Love and Lights, could just be a natural path, but beyond my wildest dreams!! The enchanting and transcendent romantic atmosphere of Paris will mark my journey as an author that will be reflected on the pages of this book.Life is about the adventure of finding out who we really are. We must go where ever the heart takes us. Before landing in the City of Love and Lights, I made many other stops. The story I tell  will take you with me to all the cities of life I have been to. There is a marvelous and mysterious feeling that Fit for Joy has been carried and written within my being throughout life. It was born in New York, will be raised in France to become a citizen of the world! What is not to LOVE about life?!!! :)I'll be in France from October 15th, 2016 to January 15th, 2017. THANK YOU for coming with me!  I will be updating you often, here and on social media. Follow me on Facebook. 
PLEASE SHARE
It's important that this book and ideas get to everyone who believes in health, joy and love.Let's create together a movement from the heart toward a thriving life in a more united world!! :)  QUESTIONS?Please visit www.fitforjoy.org, send an email to valeria@fitforjoy.org or info@fitforjoy.org. THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!Much love,Valeria Teles I am a certified personal trainer and winning fitness competitor with more than 20 years in the fitness industry, both as a professional and an enthusiast. My background includes performance in dance and music. For the past two years, I have successfully presented Fit for Joy ideas and programs to clients and Meetup members in New York. This is my first book! :)

story:
ENGLISH / SPANISH

English

It is time to turn fiction into reality

From the age of 8, I declared myself a lover of letters and wrote my first poems to my mother. Over time I have accumulated many texts between poetry, novel, and theater. I know that with your support my texts will see the light to become the texts of all. I invite you to merge in my universe, and to know my story.

SUMMARY

My name is Reinaldo del Orbe, I am an actor, and a writer who won honorable mentions in international literature contests. But the most important thing is that I own a fantastic universe that I encourage to share. That universe has found refuge in the letters, those that you want to and you will read

In this campaign I want to present my book: "Ruido de Corazón", in which I dare to mix the theater with fantasy, creating a fantastic literature story that I am sure will touch you when you read it. This story has love, hate, romance, and why not? A little vengeance to give the subject seasoning. You will encounter fantastic beings, magical islands, and time games.

Do you want to know why you should support me? Because you are an indispensable part of this project. With your collaboration, the child who began to write will become an adult and will join the world of letters. Not only will you be sponsoring a book project, but a lifelong dream. Of course, you will read the book and give me your opinion, right?

What does the book "Ruido de Corazón" need?

The book consists of 59 pages (you will have more when you add their names) and 12,181 words in a 14 cm x 21 cm format. The story is telled in spanish language. For this dream in the form of a book you need the sum of $850 dollars, which will be distributed among the following sections.

Editing text: $180 (Pay per word)

Layout: $80.

Style correction: $115

Registration fee to the National Organization of Copyright (ONDA) : $20

Tax for the use of the cover photo: $85

Cover Design: $80.

Public Relations: $190.

Promotion: $100

REWARDS

US$1.00: Public appreciation through all social networks.

US$5.00: You will receive book progress from the book before it is published, and public thanks to all social networks.

US$10.00: Your name will appear on the last page of the book as thanks, you will receive advances from some scenes of the book, and public gratitude through all social networks.

US$15.00: You will receive a copy of the book, your name will appear on the last page of the book as gratefulness, you will receive advances from some scenes of the book, and public gratitude through all social networks.

US$20.00: You will have access to videos of dramatized readings. You will receive a copy of the book AUTOBIOGRAPHY, its name will appear on the last page of the book as gratefulness, you will receive advances from some scenes of the book, and public gratitude through all social networks.

US$100+: He will be the sponsor of the project and his name will be as a sponsor in the first pages of the book. You will receive a copy of the book signed by the author. Exclusive material of the author, and advance of next books. You will receive some videos of dramatized readings of the text. You will receive advance of some scenes of the book. Public thanks through the project fan page.

If I do not get the complete goal, the book will still be published, but in that event I ask you to wait a few more days than usual because maybe I should do the editing of the text, layout, correction of styles, etc. I'm a writer, not a publisher. This can take time. But I WILL CONTINUE TO PURSUE THIS ENTERPRISE...

IMPACT

⦁ Your collaboration will make more young people like me motivate themselves to write and/or publish the books they already have saved using this same method. A very successful contribution bringing my theatrical texts to the stage as an actor and director, which means that as a reader you will not regret it.

⦁ Support me and I promise that I will not let you down as a writer, besides, what is life but an opportunity to live taking a different risk every day?

⦁ Risks and challenges not only to me, but to humanity.

⦁ There are difficult challenges on the way to publishing the book, because it is expensive and no longer part of an industry as before. However, we can not let books die, we must continue to write and publish. That's why I'm counting on you.

⦁ To overcome the obstacles of the book I always take my texts to the stage in the theater, in this case with your help will be the first time I take it to paper.

⦁ To overcome the challenges that come with creating this piece,  I already have my first plan and you are crucial part of it. First your support, then we will continue to publish.

THINK YOU CANNOT HELP?

⦁ Of course you can, share this campaign in your social networks, send it to friends and family that you think they can support, any form of support is always welcomed and this is one of the most important ones.

Remember to use the tools of Indiegogo to share this campaign.

I COUNT ON YOU

Español

RESUMEN

  • Mi nombre es Reinaldo del Orbe, soy actor, y escritor ganador de menciones de honor en concursos internacionales de literatura. Pero lo más importante es que soy dueño de un universo fantástico que me animo a compartir. Ese universo ha encontrado refugio en las letras, aquellas que tú quieres y vas a leer
  • En esta campaña quiero presentar mi libro: "Ruido de Corazón", un libro en español en el cual me atrevo a mezclar el teatro con la fantasía, creando una historia de literatura fantástica que estoy seguro te conmoverá cuando la leas. Tiene amor, odio, romance, y ¿por qué no? un poco de venganza para darle sazón al asunto. Te encontrarás con seres fantásticas, islas mágicas, y juegos con el tiempo.
  • ¿Quieren saber por qué deben apoyarme? Porque ustedes son parte indispensable de este proyecto. Con su colaboración el niño que empezó a escribir se volverá adulto y se sumará al mundo de las letras. No sólo estarán patrocinando un proyecto de un libro, sino un sueño de toda la vida. Por supuesto, leerán el libro y me darán su opinión. ¿Cierto?  

¿Qué necesita el libro "Ruido de corazón"?

 
  • El libro consta de 59 páginas (tendrá más cuando agregue sus nombres)  y 12,181 palabras en formato 14 cm. X 21 cm. Para este sueño en forma de libro se necesita la suma de de 750 dólares, los cuales serán distribuidos entre los siguientes acápites.
  • Edición de texto: 180 dólares (Cobro por palabra)
  • Diagramación: 80 dólares.
  • Correción de estilo: 115 dólares.
  • Impuesto de registro a la Organizacion Nacional de derecho de Autor (ONDA) 20 dólares
  • Impuesto por el uso de la foto de portada: 85 dólares
  • Diseño de Portada: 80 dólares.
  • Relaciones Públicas: 190 dólares.
  • Promoción: 100 dólares

RECOMPENSAS

  • US 1: Agradecimiento público a través de todas las redes sociales.
  • US: 5 Recibirás avances de capítulos del libro antes que sea publicado, y agradecimiento público a través de todas las redes sociales.

  • US: 10 Su nombre aparecerá en la última página del libro como agradecimiento, recibirás avances de algunos escenas del libro, y agradecimiento público a través de todas las redes sociales.

  • US: 15 Recibirá un ejemplar del libro, su nombre aparecerá en la última página del libro como agradecimiento, recibirás avances de algunos escenas del libro, y agradecimiento público a través de todas las redes sociales.

  • US: 20 Tendrá acceso a vídeos de lecturas dramatizadas. Recibirá un ejemplar del libro AUTOBIOGRAFIADO, su nombre aparecerá en la última página del libro como agradecimiento, recibirás avances de algunos escenas del libro, y agradecimiento público a través de todas las redes sociales.

    US: 100 - en adelante: Será el padrino del proyecto y su nombre estará como patrocinador en las primeras páginas del libro. Recibirá una copia del libro firmada por el autor. Material exclusivo del autor, y adelanto de próximo libros. Recibirá algunos vídeos de lecturas dramatizadas del texto. Recibirá avance de algunos escenas del libro. Agradecimiento público a través del fan page del proyecto.

  • Si no logro la meta total, igualmente el libro será publicado pero en ese caso les pido que me esperen unos días más de lo normal porque quizás yo mismo deba hacer la edición del texto, diagramación, corrección de estilos, etc... Y como soy escritor, no editor. Esto puede demorar tiempo. Pero SEGUIRÉ... 

Impacto

  • Tu colaboración hará que más jóvenes como yo se motiven a escribir y/o publicar los libros que ya tienen guardados usando este mismo método. Un aporte no sólo a mi, sino a la humanidad.
  • He tenido mucho éxito llevando a cabo mis textos teatrales al escenario como actor y director, lo que quiere decir que como lector no te arrepentirás.
  • Apóyame y te prometo que no te defraudaré como escritor, además, ¿qué es la vida sino una oportunidad de vivir tomando todos los días un riesgo distinto? 

Riesgos y desafíos

  •  En el camino de la publicación del libro hay retos difíciles, porque es costoso, y ya no forma parte de una industria como antes. No obstante, no podemos dejar que el libro muera, hay que seguir escribiendo y publicando. Por eso cuento con ustedes.
  • Para superar los obstáculos del libro siempre llevo mis textos a escena en el teatro, en este caso con tu ayuda será la primera vez que lo llevaré al papel. 
  • Para solucionar los desafíos del reto de los libros, ya tengo mi primer plan y en el formas partes tú. Primero tu apoyo, luego seguiremos publicando. 

¿QUE NO PUEDES AYUDAR?

  •  Claro que sí puedes, comparte esta campaña en tus redes sociales, envíaselas a amigos y familiares que crees que puedan apoyar, Siempre es bienvenido cualquier apoyo y este es uno de los más importantes. Recuerden usar las herramientos de Indiegogo para compartir esta campaña.

CUENTO CONTIGO

story:
Short Summary

The goal of writing this book is to help the small business to build their own mini web sites by their own. There is no need to pay huge pile of money to have a valuable site that helps your business.

The final book price will be as follows:
- e-book - USD 45
- paper copy - USD 55

I work in the web development field for 11 years and have learned lots of tips and tricks for low energy web site building. Now the time has come to spread that knowledge and help people making their own web art.

The best possessions for us is our own-made. We are happy, have the full control on them and finally – we do not pay for them. I was very passionate when creating my first web site (http://dek.bg/?lng=en) as I did not hear anything about web development. It still works, 11 years later and gives back a good value.

What We Need & What You Get

I would need funding for preparing the book and for living that time without the necessity to take my attention to another work. Some expenses would be necessary for professional book finalizing – editing, correcting and printing.

You get a valuable product which will help you build your personal or business web sites, upgrade them and support them. And why not – become even professional in the field of web development. The most important – the book will tell you the thing in human language you can understand.

The Impact

My book will make peoples web presence easier and more colorful. They will have all-in-one “tool” for their work. They will learn how to find resources and ideas for further development in the web development field.

Risks & Challenges

The challenge here would be writing my first book. I am excited that I can spend my experience with the people. About the risks – I do not see any. You have my word you will be able to build your own web site and for sure – you will love it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Reading this means you are already helping me. I would be glad for any feedback on the campaign and if you like it, please share with your friends!

Thanks!

We are happy, have the full control on them and finally – we do not pay for them. I was very passionate when creating my first web site (http://dek.bg/?lng=en) as I did not hear anything about web development. It still works, 11 years later and gives back a good value.What We Need & What You GetI would need funding for preparing the book and for living that time without the necessity to take my attention to another work. Some expenses would be necessary for professional book finalizing – editing, correcting and printing.You get a valuable product which will help you build your personal or business web sites, upgrade them and support them. And why not – become even professional in the field of web development. The most important – the book will tell you the thing in human language you can understand.The ImpactMy book will make peoples web presence easier and more colorful. They will have all-in-one “tool” for their work. They will learn how to find resources and ideas for further development in the web development field.Risks & ChallengesThe challenge here would be writing my first book. I am excited that I can spend my experience with the people. About the risks – I do not see any. You have my word you will be able to build your own web site and for sure – you will love it.Other Ways You Can HelpReading this means you are already helping me. I would be glad for any feedback on the campaign and if you like it, please share with your friends!Thanks!

story:
About Me

My name is Kara Landhuis. I am a freelance writer and graphic designer. I was introduced to the concept of a "meet cute" in one of my favorite romantic comedies, The Holiday. I've always found it such a charming idea. I was introduced to the concept of "flash fiction" in one of my university creative writing courses. I'm an aspiring novelist, but I'm very happy to be creating my first book with the help of dozens of other writers and artists.

    The Stories

    The submissions that I have received are really fun and diverse. My writers have interpreted the theme with a lot of creativity. Flash fiction is an interesting genre. It seems like it would be easy to write a good story in fewer than 1000 words, but it's actually very difficult. Thus, it is a true joy to read well-written flash fiction. Here is a peek at some of the stories that will be included in this collection: 

    • A mail carrier delivers mail to an enchanted swamp
    • An Occupy Wallstreet protester and a businessman end up in the back of the same police car
    • A disillusioned clown shares a park bench with a mime

    This looks familiar...

    This Campaign is a re-launch. Meet Cute's initial Kickstarter campaign was unsuccessful for a number of reasons. Here's how this campaign is different:

    • Initially, I thought I would need to pay 50 contributors and produce a book that was 150 pages. After reviewing submissions, I found that I would be including fewer stories. Now, I am expecting to pay 30 contributors, and the book will have fewer than 100 pages. Accordingly, my funding goal has been halved.
    • Kickstarter's "All or Nothing" format was not appropriate for this project. If I raise enough support to approach my goal, this project will be completed with the help of personal funds. 

    What is the money for?

    Obviously, my Kickstarter failed. However, I have reevaluated the needs of the project and believe that this relaunch will be successful. Here is the breakdown of the needs of the campaign:

    • $350 - Paying contributors (writers and illustrators)
    • $600 - Printing
    • $400 - Shipping
    • $150 - Fees & Other 

    Other ways to help

    • Share this project with your writer and reader friends
    • Submit a story! Email themeetcutebook@gmail.com before December 30

    Thank you for your support!

story:
Summary

I teach performance measurement subject
for my undergraduate students.
I know what I teach is not always perfect
since they look confused quite often.

I know why they are confused,
because they have no working experience at all.
And I was not really amused
to see them sleep, I recalled.

Then I thought I should show them good examples,
to make them understand.
I am not quite humble,
to say that this is a very good plan.

Instead of using examples of the companies,
which they know nothing about,
I instead use our lives’ stories,
Something that makes them shout.

These normal life examples, you can guess,
turn out to be my new books.
I called it “the last jigsaw piece for success”, 
I really want you to have a look.

What the book is all about

You can have a look at the table of content below

What I Need & What You Get

I need your help to fund this book publishing campaign for printing 3,000 copies of the book. If I do not reach my goal, I will only be able to print enough for our campaign contributors. Nevertheless if this goal is exceeded, the additional funds will be used to lower the retail price of the book.

Your contributions will go to: 

Book cover design $200
Overall graphic design $1,000
Editors $2,800
Office supplies and software $500
Professional fees $700
Printing and delivery of books $4,000
Crowdfunding fees (5%) + Credit card fees (3%) $800
TOTAL: $10,000

You can contribute by choosing one of these perks

1) Bronze perks: with $7 USD contribution,  you will receive one signed copy of the book

2) Silver perks: with $12 USD contribution, you will receive two signed copies of the book

3) Gold perks: with $60 USD contribution, you will receive ten signed copies of the book plus free shipping to everywhere in the world

4) Seminar perks (Available for Thais only): with $150 USD, you will receive

  • Two signed copies of the book.
  • One ticket to attend one day seminar conducted in Thai on the topic of this book at hotel in Bangkok, Thailand on Sunday 30 October 2016 from 9 a.m. - 4 p.m. (venue to be confirmed)
  • Three previous signed copies of Thai books from the author (The Secret of Performance Measurement, You are wrong since you start to think, and the last piece of jigsaw for success in Thai version)
  • Available for Thais only.

The Impact

Readers of this book will have very limited risk but unlimited gain. The technique proposed in this book might help readers achieve their desired goals. The worst thing that can happen is only when they read it and do not act upon what is suggested in this book or already act but fail for some reasons. In both cases, it causes no harm to those readers at all (except their money for contribution, which is very little comparing to what they might gain).

I hope that if the project is successful. Not only it will help readers to be successful, but also will it inspire other lecturers to do the same and hence will benefit all of their students. You can be part of it.

Risks & Challenges

The funding will only be an obstacle that I have now. However I am quite certain that with all your helps, this barrier can be overcome.

Other Ways You Can Help

I do not have much promotional budget so if you cannot contribute (or even you can), I would appreciate if you can share this campaign to your friends via your social media. Thank you very much.

story:
Short Summary

I am not a political expert or a data analyst.  In fact in college I chose to study music; but I am an advocate of peace and unity.  I had a message that I wanted to get out and I put it in this book.  I put my all in to this in the hope that it'll reach people and they will seek change and a movement towards peace.

What We Need & What You Get

I need funding in order to get the book printed and shipped out to those that want to buy it.  As I am self-publishing this can be quite costly.  However, I know people want to get bang for their buck.  With that said I'm offering several perks including autographed books and t-shirts with purchases.

The Impact

This book is an entertaining take on how to solve race relations in the United States of America.  To me unity is key and that what this book illustrates how the black community can unify and the rest of the citizens of the country can unify to fix our current race relations.

Synopsis

During a time when America’s racial tensions are at an all-time high and the country is on the brink of a civil war, Rome is brilliant and believes he can make a difference.  The only problem is he is stuck in a street mentality and has no knowledge of how to be a true leader.  That is until he is transported to another dimension where there was no civil rights movement.  Now it is up to Rome and his companions to unite people around their fight for equality.  On top of that they have to figure out how to get Rome back to his own dimension so he can lead the cause there.

story:
Introduction

The campaign aims to finance publishing of the book, a contemporary erotic story “Zwierzak” (An Animalish Man) with the subtitle: How often do guys think about sex. The book is in the Polish language, and it is already publishing (editing stage) in Poland. By supporting the project, you can get an exclusive edition of the book.

English edition of "Zwierzak" is preparing, which will be available on Amazon Kindle. A new campaign for English paperback version will be created to separate both budgets clearly.

Polish fragment of the book: Zwierzak.epub

The Polish campaign is finished so you are welcome to order perks here. (Na wsparcie w złotówkach zapraszam na PolakPotrafi)

English fragment of the book: An Animalish Man.epub

What is the book about?

"Zwierzak" is an alternative erotic story with a crime thread. The idea for the book was born from the success of today's so-called provocative erotic romances. Moreover, from the questions asked yourself whether men identify with the characters of romances. What are the real needs of men? How often do they think about sex? Do the expectations from men are unnatural and go beyond their role in the evolution and society? Did we forget about the nature of humanity?

Let's imagine a guy who does not identify himself with the characters of romances. Let’s watch his life, deeds and thoughts. The narrative of the book intersperse with some original thoughts of the character about sex and things that men do, but not always admit it. The life of our hero, like every man, is mainly driven by a sex drive, which has to cope. It causes that our hero gets into troubles.

What do you get?

  • Special First Edition is available only for backers on crowdfunding platforms. The First Edition is exclusive and limited to 200 exemplars. It has a better quality of the paper and the cover. The author will sign each book.
  • Second Edition for wide distribution with the author's signature. The number of exemplars is dependent on the success of the project, so kindly support.
  • Special thanks to you, placed on social media, the author's website and the last page of the book.
  • Possibility to place your company logo (or name) on the back cover of the book. (After consultation).

Let's note that here is the only opportunity to receive the book with an author's signature.

All books are in the Polish language.

Why self-publishing?

First, good news for the readers, the low retail price of the book. I believe that books shouldn't be expensive. Estimated price of the copy (A5, approx. 70 pp.) is about 13 PLN ($3), so it is a cost of a Caffe Latte. It seems to be an affordable price, isn't it?

Better control over publishing process and its quality. The decent quality of the publication is achieved by editing the book in the same way as for the books from traditional publishers. For that process, the publisher PWN is responsible through their platform rozpisani.pl. Choosing that method, the author has better control over the edition; and the book has a chance to appear on the market and be evaluated by the readers, not the publishers.

The history of self-publishing is longer than we expect. Many respected writers self-published; Marcel Proust, Mark Twain, Juliusz Słowacki or Witold Gombrowicz. And many contemporary authors e.g. Katarzyna Grochola or Olga Tokarczuk release books through their publishing houses.

Budget

The anticipated budget is $1000. That will let to publish 500+ copies for wide distribution and promotion of the book on the Internet. The First Edition is in progress of publishing (editing stage), and the shipping is expected for May 2017. The printing of the Second Edition is planned for June 2017, as well shipping.
Collecting more funds will surely allow for a wider and more efficient distribution. So:
$2500 – publishing of 1000+ pcs., and promotion.
$5000 – publishing of 1000+ pcs., and promotion in stationary bookstores (which is extremely desirable :).

If we don't reach the goal, the book will still publish in a number of copies that the budget will let. 50 exemplars is a minimum for distribution, but the desirable number is about 1000 to reach most of the bookstores.

Why support the project?

With your help, a new and exciting book will appear on the market. You will become a patron of the literary creation and you will support a debut. Also, this is the only opportunity to purchase a Limited Edition copy of the book, not available in bookstores.

I hope you will support my project by selecting one of the perks. Every help is precious! Even if you decide not to choose a perk, please share the campaign with your friends and on social media. I am already thanking for your support!

Links

At the same time, there is a Polish crowdfunding campaign on PolakPotrafi.pl

For the updates check the campaign websites and social media. Also, you will find more information about the book on the following pages. If you have any questions, please contact me.

Thank you for your attention. Please support and share!

Twitter, Facebook, Author's page, Instagram, YouTube, PolakPotrafi.pl

story:
Je suis journaliste et écrivain. J'ai à mon actif deux recueils de nouvelles CORPS ET AME (Nei, 2001), et C'EST IDIOT D'AIMER (GoMedia 2011) et un roman IMAGINE (hora antes editoriale).

J'ai décidé d'écrire ce roman (Les voleurs de rêves), pour témoigner d'un conflit qui a eu lieu dans un pays d'Afrique il y a quelques années et dont les séquelles sont encore visibles et risquent de l'être encore pour longtemps. C'est ma façon de dire ATTENTION, plus jamais ça ! Il ne faut plus se laisser manipuler par des hommes politiques qui pour la plupart ne défendent que leurs intérêts égoïstes et se moquent éperdument de vous !

Le financement va servir à la mise en page et à l'impression de 1500 exemplaires.

Ce projet me tient beaucoup à cœur. A ceux qui ne peuvent participer au financement, je serais infiniment reconnaissant d'en parler autour d'eux. Bien entendu, des contreparties sont disponibles pour les participants, en terme d'exemplaires dédicacés et de mention dans le livre.

Je vous remercie !

story:
Short Summary

A new book that explores the connection between mental health + soccer. Through various individual vignettes, the book shows the connection, similarities, and journeys of mental health and how they related to soccer culture.  

About Me

I'm a soccer journalist who has dealt with mental health issues personally, so why not combined the two? I want to tell my story and the story of others; I want to show people that they are not alone

So far, the book is funny and poignant, sad and inspiring. Not because of me as a writer, but because of the stories I am being told.  

What We Need

So I am writing a book, why do I need money? Turns out, publishing costs a lot. Paying proofreaders, buying resources, coffee for interviewees, coffee for me, time, photocopying, printing, postage, paying an artist, These things add up. Plus taking time from other writing works to finish this piece. The cost may look like a lot, but I want to give this project everything, so hopefully you will understand why I need the support. 

The Impact

If one person reads this book and feels better, it will all be worth it. 

Risks & Challenges

Telling people's stories is always going to be a challenge, both for person reasons and because I am using someone else's voice. My biggest risk is doing this project justice and representing people to the best of my ability. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Other ways you can help give to the project:

  • Spread the word
  • Talk to me if you think you can contribute to the book personally 
  • Tell me if you can help in any other way 

Thank you so much!

Love and hugs,

Sonja Cori Missio

story:
Our Mission:  To connect youth with powerful peer stories of courage, ingenuity and inspiration, to remind them THEIR VOICE MATTERS and they have the ability to shape the future they want to see.

CAMPAIGN PURPOSE:

Give the gift of inspiration and hope this holiday season to youth in your life!

Help share the powerful peer messages within The Power of YOUth book to give more youth the confidence they need to embrace their talents and speak up for their voice.

A GIFT THAT KEEPS ON GIVING

We are proud to partner Big Brothers Big Sisters of Canada on this campaign to spread our message of hope and inspiration to youth who need it most. 15% of net proceeds raised through this campaign will be donated to Big Brothers Big Sisters of Canada’s mentoring programs. Currently servicing 40,000 youth in 1,100 communities, this money will help equip youth working to overcome their adversities with the resources and peer support they need to reach their full potential.

 

STRETCH GOAL:

Receive a FREE e-book - $20,000+: If we raise double our goal we will convert The Power of YOUth into an e-book with full size photos and quotes like our Deluxe Book, and provide all the backers that made it happen a FREE copy.

 

KEY TAKEAWAYS:

The Power of YOUth book not only celebrates exceptional young leaders, it uses their stories as a catalyst to inspire more young people to realize their potential.

  • Celebrating diversity this project empowers the voice of youth from 59 different countries, along with different cultural backgrounds including indigenous youth.
  • Showing you are never too young to take action for our future, our youngest leader featured is aged 6-years-old!
  • Gender inclusive there is equal representation of stories from young women and men, along representation of youth that identify as gender neutral and LGBTQI.
  • The youth profiled in this book have collectively raised over $26,236,483 for charity.
  • A project MADE FOR YOUTH BY YOUTH everyone involved in the creation of this book, including editors and graphic designers, are under the age of 25.

From advocating for mandatory GMO labelling to treating cancer with synthetic genes and inventing a pair of glasses that restore the sense of sight to the visually-impaired, the stories featured in The Power of YOUth will show you that YOUth are not just leaders of tomorrow, YOUth are leaders of TODAY.

The stories are divided into eight sections related to the life challenges and global issues today’s youth face.

 

The Power of YOUth comes in two different formats: Standard Paperback and Deluxe Hardcover

  1. The paperback is a regular black and white novel size. Compact and light, this version makes it easy to take the daily inspiration within the book with you wherever you go.
  2. The Deluxe Hardcover is a beautifully designed, 9”x12” hardcover book featuring 200 extra full size photographs and colour quotes to bring each story to life. A perfect addition to your coffee table, library, reception office and more.

 

 

FEATURE PERKS

 

INSPIRATION AT A GLANCE

WHY THE POWER OF YOUTH?

The Power of YOUth is not only be an opportunity to inspire youth through the experiences of young people like themselves, but it also showcases the incredible work of some of our world’s youngest leaders to raise awareness of their impact.

There are 1.8 BILLION youth under the age of 25 in the world, making us one of the largest youth generations in history. We have the influence to evoke mass change, but this requires us to first believe in ourselves.

This is more challenging than ever before, with today’s youth having the highest levels of clinical anxiety, stress, and depression than any other generation before. Suicide is currently the second leading cause of death among youth, claiming more than 30,252 lives per year. There are more than 825 million youth under 25 that live below the poverty line.

This needs to change. The Power of YOUth is the first step towards sending light and hope to our next generation of leaders. If the youth in this book can find the courage to speak up, seize their opportunities, and create a better future for them selves (and their peers), so can YOUth!

MEET THE CREATOR

My name is Kelly Lovell and I am a Youth Mobilizer.

What does this mean? My work focuses on using the power of media and business to create opportunities for youth to thrive. I spend my time motivating and mentoring my peers to pursue their passions while helping business and government stakeholders develop action plans that support the needs of the next generation.

From a prolonged stay in a hospital bed and overcoming mental health issues to discussing youth strategies with Heads of State and being a guest of honour and personally meeting Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, my story touches on all shades of the rainbow. (You can learn my full story inside The Power of YOUth book!).

Today, I am a 16 time award-winning motivational speaker and young social entrepreneur. Over the course of my journey, I have learned the power of passion to open doors, the necessity of resilience in the pursuit of ambition, and, most importantly, that our potential is limited only by our belief in ourselves and drive to achieve.

I created this project because I, like the ChangeLeaders in this book, believe in the power of youth. By showcasing the incredible work that they have done, I hope to inspire the next generation of young leaders, both domestically and internationally.

The Power of YOUth would not be possible without a community of supporters, advocates, and ChangeLeaders from all around the world.

I invite you to leave a lasting impression this holiday season and help me share the powerful peer messages within The Power of YOUth book with your community.

Infused with thought, heart, and inspiration, this book is a beneficial peer resource for aspiring young leaders of any age. It also makes a fantastic holiday gift to be passed on to siblings, children, nieces, nephews, and of course, the youth you reach through your work.

By backing this project, you are not only supporting this initiative, but are also investing in the talents and achievements of over 200 young leaders.

 

So, what do you say?

Inspire youth in your life create the future they want to see. ?

 

We hope that our book campaign reaches youth worldwide. You can help us by telling this book campaign to your friends and colleagues.
You can share this campaign page by using the Indiegogo share tools from the top right corner, below the financial counter.

story:
My third grade teacher had a poster with an apple on it that said: Everything I need to know I learned in Kindergarten. In Kindergarten we learn to be safe on the playground. We learn to play house and respect each others' personal space. We learn to share what is most personal to us, like prize toys and big tough feelings. But we’ve come to live in a world where it’s easy to forget what we learned in Kindergarten. It’s from that place that the idea for this Indiegogo publishing project arose.

“All This While F*cking” is an autobiographical memoir written by Kelsey Straight, which is set to be published in connection with this campaign on Valentine’s Day. 50% of the Indiegogo proceeds will go to three different charities sharing thematic connections to the book: Planned Parenthood (https://www.plannedparenthood.org/), Heads Together (https://www.headstogether.org.uk/), and Pronto (http://prontointernational.org/). Once the book is published, 25% of all profits from actual book sales will also be evenly divided between these three charities, in the form of direct donations and fundraising events designed to raise awareness around the issues at hand.

“All This While F*cking” is a true account of the three years the author spent living in Brooklyn and dating, compulsively, off Tinder. In the process of meeting and sleeping with an impressive diversity of strangers - over 200 dates and 100 one-night-stands - she was ultimately forced to meet and go to bed with herself – first on the page, and then in practice. The uncensored stories included within open the door to an array of personal and mental health issues that might come as a surprise to those closest to the author. But there are things we don’t talk about. It’s difficult to negotiate stigmatic issues into what is “right and normal” when those issues are also integral parts of who we are as human beings.

We have chosen to give a percentage of all profits to charity because art is there to help us. Art is the creation of what we need. In a society where art is valued more for how much money it makes than how many lives it might impact, and thus a world where art is often more commercial than human, it’s increasingly easy to forget this. I’m tired of hearing that my high school classmates have committed suicide. I’m tired of emotional censorship and the number of hearts that lose their way when we trade in compassion for judgment. I am exhausted by our culture of “self,” because it doesn’t work emotionally. Being there for others is the same thing as being there for ourselves. We used to live in packs or "troops". Now we live in connected digital profiles. I hope that in talking candidly and honestly about my own issues and experiences, it will give others the permission to do the same, both men and women alike, because at the end of the day, the only difference between us is that which we choose to create. We must choose to create things that bring us together instead of dividing us further. We must remember what we learned in Kindergarten.

So, please donate. It’s not the amount that’s meaningful; it’s act of donating itself. 50% of the Indiegogo profits will go to charitable causes, and the remaining 50% will go to actual expenses arising from the publication of the novel, including manufacturing costs for physical copies, copy-writing services, and marketing geared at raising awareness for both the book and the issues within. If you wish, you may indicate which of the three charities you’d like your donation allocated towards. It will otherwise be divided evenly between the three. The majority of donations will be sent directly to the applicable charity, but a portion of proceeds will also be used in fundraising events for these same issues. Tax receipts will be provided upon request.

Perks include everything from signed copies of the book, to branded All This While F*cking condoms, to Dating & Tinder Survival Guides written by yours truly, to a surprise date-night with a loved one in the city of your choice, to branded t-shirts and boxers, to your name mentioned in the book acknowledging your donation, or perhaps sharing a creative project you might be working on, or including a message to friend you’ve lost touch with. All backers also receive an invite to the launch party for the physical version of the book + any additional invites to fundraising events occurring in connection with the book over the next couple years. The more money we raise, the more fundraising events in different cities there will be.

Thank you for your time and support, and I hope you enjoy reading my deepest darkest secrets this coming Valentines Day.

Let’s find a way to be excellent together again.

story:
Would YOU hug a Hoggle?

My name is Stephanie Walker, and this is a Hoggle!

Hoggles are furry, friendly monsters who live all around us, but hide as they are quite shy. My debut children’s picture book, ‘Who Would Hug A Hoggle?’ shows the reader where they live, what they eat and how to make friends with them!

The book is both written and illustrated by me. As a mum and former English tutor, I am dedicated to creating quality children’s literature that is accessible, fun and sparks the readers imagination. To ensure my book meets that criteria I held test readings at my daughter’s school, where it was extremely well received by both the pupils and the teachers. I now often have children running up to me on the playground to ask me more about the Hoggles or to tell me about their Hoggle hunting adventures!

We have set a funding goal of £1,250, which covers the following:

- Appropriate art supplies such as Promarkers and bleed-proof paper to help me create the highest quality illustrations possible

- Self publishing costs set by the publishing company

- Shipping, distribution and marketing costs including events at bookshops and libraries

- Creating the perks for backers, which includes limited edition art prints, notecards and plush Hoggle toys

There are few risks involved with this project. The main concern is completing the project in a timely manner. However, I have thoroughly researched and planned this project and I am confident in the time scales I have set.

story:
Win Lush wrapped gifts!  

Win Have a Blast when you + 5 friends purchase a paperback!  

Also - everyone will be entered in grand prize of Lush Legend! 

 

 

 One Girl. A 2000 mile Journey. A mother far away.  

 

This novel touches the hearts of girls, teens and young women.  Girls see themselves in Elena, a young girl determined to see her mother once again and pursue her dream of becoming a fashion designer.

 

 

Girls Love this novel!  

The story of Elena resonated with young girls and teens.  Even mother's have commented that they love this story.

Here is one reason why.  

Elena bolts down Donato street, in downtown Guadalajara, desperately evading three bullies. She hurls herself behind a red sofa on a vacant lot, trying to evade their water balloons they brought to torment her. And drops her red book of designs.

 

In the darkness of that corner - with three bullies surrounding her, cowering deep behind the sofa, tucking in her stomach – so not to make a sound or breath  -- she closed her eyes for a few moments – and wished that her life were different. 

Elena dreamed of becoming a Princess -- living in a castle, with her mother, Carmen and her grandmother, Alma.  In her castle, she saw a gorgeous closet with beautiful dresses, purses and shoes, a softer than air, white, comfy bed with a matching luxurious white desk -- to sit and draw her creations.  She envisioned a big refrigerator filled lots of delicious food – and never to feel hungry or scared again.  Her vision of escape so real, so vivid  -- until she heard the cry of a furry animal – who could not speak.

 

How it will inspire young girls.

Girls and teens are immediately drawn to the story of Elena, a ten year old girl who aspires to be a fashion designer despite living in lack and struggle.

Elena plots to see her mother, and when her grandmother is struck with a mysterious illness, she boards a bus, alone, in search of a better life, with her puppy Princess Maria.

Elena draws out dresses and t-shirts in a three - story walk-up that she shares with her grandmother Alma.  Alma, a seamstress, saves leftover fabric from her customers and pins it to a curtain that divides their bedroom, giving Elena a chance to see her designs.  

With the help of her puppy, Princess Maria, Elena finds the courage to stand up to her tormentors, Ana, Tomas and Graciela. 

This one act of courage, sets Elena on a journey to see her mother and find out the mystery of her grandmother's illness. 

 

Here is Dr. Julio, the vet, as he discovers what is wrong with the puppy.

 

 

 

Meet Rey, the boy riding the bus, as he falls for Elena.  

 

He is taken off the bus at gun point - by the Federales.

 

  

Rey saves Andalucia from two robbers.  Here is what happened:

Rey gestured with his hand to lock the door and he fled the backyard, jumping over the fence with Andalucia, “Ba-a-a-a-a-a-a-,” stampeding out of their yard, onto the sidewalk, past the neighbors house and onto the street, holding tight to his precious cargo.

Mackie and Elroy, were in hot pursuit.   

 

 

 

 

 

 

Praise for my novel:

 

 

 

 

 

 

Book trailer perk hub:

THANK YOU for your interest in the book trailer.  I am particularly looking for dancers and singers.  Want to be part of a big splashy number and get IMDB credit? Then this perk is for you!

If you are under 18 you would need to bring a parent and have them sign a release form for you.

 

 

 

 

One of the main challenges will be the release date of the novel  which could be delayed due to the editing process or unforeseen circumstances. Another challenge worth mentioning is that budgets tend to change during the printing process.

Fortunately, I have drafted a very precise budget for the development of my novel Princess Maria and the Adventures of Elena to prevent any big changes from happening. If there are any significant changes in the plans, i will keep you updated! 

 

One way to be involved in our campaign is to purchase our exclusive perks, available only during this Indiegogo-campaign or by donating money by clicking the pink “back it” button next to our pitch video. However, if you wish to help us but cannot support our project financially, there are a lot of things you can do!  

LIKE us on Facebook on this link:  https://www.facebook.com/Princess-Maria-and-the...

FOLLOW Princess Maria and the Adventures of Elena on Instagram at this link:https://www.instagram.com/princessmariaadventur...

REFER YOUR FRIENDS, FAMILY & FELLOW PRINCESS MARIA FANS by sharing our campaign link by email or on Social Media by using the Indiegogo share tools or by sharing this short link:

WRITE A BLOG

GET CREATIVE Do you have another idea? Go for it!

SIGN UP to MY newsletter for the latest news by visiting my official Princess Maria and the Adventures of Elena at: www.lauraeileensanchez.com 

The official hashtag for this campaign is #PrincessMariaGoGo

 

Our Sponsors

V-dog is an amazing company and their food saved the life to my dogs!  

 

 

Laura E Sanchez, Author

s

My name is Laura E. Sanchez and I started writing my novel one Christmas day two years ago.   I believed I could be a writer.  I set about to write a wonderful story that would inspire girls.

It is really important and motivating for me to create a novel where the girl is the heart of the story and her life drives the action. 

I want to make a difference with my novel.  To inspire young girls everywhere - that their dreams are valued and cherished.  Giving lifelong success.

 

Princess Maria

The story of Elena, a girl who never gave up.

And Princess Maria, her cute little pup.
